column237: s IXUS 185 is a supremely easy to use pocket camera, with no compromise on image quality. Capture brilliantly detailed images and HD movies with one button press, while its automatic mode ensures the picture always looks as good as possible. Its slim and sleek design slips right into your pocket or bag, and Eco mode keeps you snapping for longer. With a versatile zoom for flexible near-or-far shooting, plus a host of fun creative features to let you express yourself artistically, this is a fantastically featured camera offering true point-and-shoot simplicity.&lt

column1: With a 20.0 megapixel CCD sensor, the IXUS 185 captures brilliantly sharp images, detailed enough for large scale prints or creative cropping, while the powerful DIGIC 4+ processor delivers super fast speed and functionality when handling both stills and movies. And Digital Image Stabilisation irons out blur to ensure ultra-crisp shots every time.&lt

A 28mm wide angle zoom lens ensures you capture every moment with ease. You can zoom in on distant subjects using the 8x optical zoom, or get even closer, without any loss of quality, using the 16x ZoomPlus.&lt

Auto mode does the work for you. It optimally sets all the camera settings depending on the picture (32 different scene settings are automatically detected), so you can be sure every photo looks as good as possible. All you have to do is concentrate on the shot, and click with confidence!&lt
Just one button press and you&#x27
column2: re recording in 720p resolution HD video for super sharp movie capture. With the optical zoom you can zero in and out on your subjects for a huge scope of creative shooting options.&lt

column1: The IXUS 185 comes packed with a huge range of creative features for you to add that additional layer of artistry to your snaps. Recreate the optical distortion of a fish-eye lens, make your stills and movies look like miniature scale models, shoot in moody monochrome, and more.&lt

The Face Detection feature detects multiple faces in a single frame and ensures they stay in focus, so that you can capture great shots of friends. It ensures they’re captured with optimum brightness and skin tones are natural in all lighting conditions.&lt
Eco Mode reduces battery consumption so that the camera can last longer without needing to be recharged, making it ideal for day trips.&lt
The IXUS 185 comes with a wrist strap, battery pack and charger so you&#x27
column2: re ready to go straight out of the box.&lt

column5: ll be able to focus in on your subject with precision and speed.

Or simply tap devices together to review and transfer photographs and videos to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

3,johnlewis-a81690cb3c494569d2cc0954ff750d05,Sony Alpha 7 R II Compact System Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 42.4MP, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED EVF, 5-Axis Image Stabiliser &amp
column8: s Alpha 7 R II takes detail, sensitivity and speed to the next level. A 42.4MP full frame sensor captures an even more comprehensive level of image quality. 5-axis stabilisation keeps your shots sharp, whether for stunning stills or Ultra High Definition 4K movies. Pictures are staggeringly detailed and lifelike. Easily share your work wirelessly with Wi-Fi and NFC, and customise the camera&#x27
column9: s function buttons for an individually tailored shooting experience. Show off the stunning potential of the remarkable sensor in this palm-sized wonder.&lt

column2: s first back-illuminated 35mm full-frame CMOS sensor, with a vast 42.4 megapixels, the A7R II ups the ante for  resolution and response. It enhances light collection, outputs data faster, and minimises the level of visual noise for stunning photography of breathtaking clarity. Powered by the BIONZ X processor the result is truer, more natural imagery of remarkable detail.  And with a highly sensitive ISO rating of up to 102400, low-light shooting is just as stunning.&lt

column1: Shooting in such fine detail, every shot needs to be super-stable. 5-axis image stabilisation is fine-tuned to match the 42.4MP performance so that zoom work, close-ups and night shooting are always reliably free of blur and even the slightest camera shake.  A fast Hybrid Autofocus system delivers superior speed and tracking performance. An amazing 399 AF points provide comprehensive cover of the image area. Such fast and smooth focussing works brilliantly for both continuous shooting of stills, and for 4K movies.&lt

Such a stunning sensor is optimised to bring out the full potential of hyper-detailed 4K Ultra HD Movies. And in Super 35mm format it processes every pixel without pixel binning for even sharper detail than typical 4K. Your movies exhibit every stunningly smooth and subtle detail of the natural world.&lt
An Electronic Viewfinder with ZEISS T coating offers huge 0.78x magnification and accurately shows how settings affect your images.&lt

Share your work effortlessly and wirelessly with built-in Wi-Fi and NFC. Simply touch the camera against an NFC-enabled smartphone or tablet to activate apps or share photos or movies - no extra cables, no complicated connections. Use Wi-Fi to upload to social networks or connect to a PC or compatible TV.&lt
The toughest A series camera that Sony have yet made, it&#x27
column2: s solidly engineered to excel in all conditions. A full magnesium alloy body is dust and moisture resistant, with an anti-dust system for protection when you change lenses. The grip and shutter button have been redesigned for optimal comfort and stability, while you can assign functions to customisable buttons for your own individually optimised set-up. &lt

4,johnlewis-af20b7435e7f8ba3b012ac3f4635df30,Nikon COOLPIX W100 Waterproof Digital Camera, 13.2MP, HD 1080p, 3x Optical Zoom, Bluetooth &amp
column7: Take your family photography anywhere with Nikon’s super-durable W100. This hardy bit of kit is not only waterproof, it’s shockproof and cold-resistant, letting you make memories from the beach to the ski slopes. Backed by seamless Bluetooth sharing, a top-notch 13.2MP sensor and razor-sharp Full HD video, you can’t go wrong with this all-purpose treat.&lt

column1: As the COOLPIX W100 is waterproof (to 10m), shockproof (to a drop of 1.8m), cold-resistant (down to -10°C) and dustproof, you’ll snap photos in any climate with absolute ease. You could take this camera snorkelling, skiing, or simply pop it by the pool without fear of splashes.&lt

This 13.2MP CMOS sensor pumps out DSLR-like pictures, at the touch of a button. Furthermore, you’ll hone in on your subject from anywhere with the nifty 3x optical zoom. With the Dynamic Fine Zoom, it’s even extendable to 6x, giving finer control to your shots. This camera has advaned autofocus too, using Target-Finding AF to ensure faces and other areas of interest look as razor-sharp as possible.&lt

Share your shots as quickly as you take them with Nikon’s SnapBridge tech. Using Bluetooth low energy (BLE), this camera can be linked to up to 5 smart devices at all times, and automatically transfer content as you shoot it. This way, you won’t need to fiddles with memory cards and cables to get your pictures and videos on social media.&lt

Shoot movies in ultra-crisp Full HD 1080p at the press of the dedicated record button. With other additions like the blur-reducing Electronic VR and fun Diorama effect, this is more than just a camera, it’s a camcorder.&lt

Give artistic polish to your shots with the wealth of built-in effects. These include Highlight Colours, where you can pop-out some colour in a monochrome shot, Fisheye and Toy Camera. Add Mascara, Whiten Teeth, lip stick and many more effects too, keeping your photography creative.&lt

5,johnlewis-026626e4e2e61182d5c137c8630c5bce,Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II Digital Camera, HD 1080p, 20MP, 4.2X Optical Zoom, DIGIC 7 Processor, NFC, Wi-Fi, 3” LCD Screen",cameras,pound,539.00,Canon,,True,"&lt
column3: With its huge sensor, compact profile and revamped interface, Canon’s G7 X II is perfect choice for pretty, probing street photography. Features like NFC and Wi-Fi complement DSLR-grade performance, while tactile control rings keep you in control.&lt

column1: This camera’s DSLR-like sensor and all-new DIGIC 7 processor ensures superb performance right up to ISO 12800. Its bright f/1.8-2.8 lens makes the most of available ambient light to deliver stunning colour-clarity, whatever the conditions. As the 4-stop Intelligent Image Stabiliser (IS) selects the optimum mode from 8 options to reduce camera shake, this top-tech shooter is perfect handheld or on a tripod.&lt

Hone in on the action, wherever you’re standing, with the ultra-wide-angle lens’ 4.2x optical zoom. Its large aperture lets you tinker with depth-of-field too, so you can craft beautiful bokeh shots with blurred background. Canon’s precision technology and advanced lens knowledge make every image sharp, whether it a sweeping landscape or intimate portrait.&lt

Initiate a Wi-Fi connection between the PowerShot G7 X II and a compatible smart device using the camera’s dedicated Mobile Device Connect Button. Once connected, the Canon CameraWindow app lets you control it wirelessly from up to 5m away, so you get into awkward angles comfortably or record wildlife from your sofa, for example. Furthermore, you can share you snaps in an instant through NFC by simply tapping a compatible device on the camera. This way, it will be much easier to keep your friends and family in the loop of your adventures.&lt

The high-spec LCD touch-screen uses sRGB colour reproduction for excellent colour accuracy, image clarity and contrast. Its 45º tilt screen and intuitive controls make the G7 X II easy-to-use and highly-effective at unusual angles.&lt

Building on the exceptional tech of its predecessor, the G7 X II has added a front grip and revamped control ring. This front-lever lets you select smooth or stepped rotation in an instant, while the grip makes the body more ergonomic. Furthermore, you’ll be granted creative control with the dual-function Lens Control Ring. This way, it’s even easier to handle, and tinker with, this camera.&lt

Experiment with advanced shooting modes and discover new creative possibilities. Hand-held HDR and Background Defocus modes capture multiple pictures in quick succession and merge them together for a professional-looking result. Star modes provide an easy route into capturing spectacular astrophotography.&lt

Shoot stunning clips in 1080p Full HD and capture epic moments with exhaustive detail. You can even make time-lapse movies, where long recordings, like a sunset, are sped-up with beautiful results.&lt
14-bit RAW files and Canon DPP software maximise quality during post-production and seamlessly integrate into your existing editing or printing workflows.&lt

column3: Debuts the super-fast DIGIC 7 image processor&lt
Bluetooth and NFC makes sharing seamless&lt
Suite of creativity options to play with&lt

column6: The Lumix G9 is precision designed to shoot the breathtaking beauty of the natural world. Super-fast shooting combines with stunning image quality to let you capture every moment, whether it be wildlife in action or amazing close-ups. Incredibly fast autofocus keeps track of the subject, no matter how speedy, while 20 frames-per-second burst shooting and the 6K Photo feature let you select the perfect high quality still. High Resolution mode captures 80 megapixel equivalent shots for brilliantly-detailed macro work, while easy Bluetooth &amp
column7: Wi-Fi connection lets you share your work quickly and wirelessly. With an exceptionally clear OLED viewfinder and free angle touch screen, it&#x27
column8: s built for rugged use out in the field with a splashproof, dust proof and freeze-proof body. All this tech unites to make the G9 the supreme outdoor and wildlife camera.&lt

column1: Its 20.3-megapixel Digital Live MOS Sensor without low-pass filter captures a superb level of detail, colour and brightness. The Venus Engine processor renders high-precision yet natural images with Multipixel Luminance Generation and Intelligent Detail Processing.&lt

Super-fast, high precision DFD (depth from defocus) autofocus achieves staggeringly fast AF speed of just 0.04 seconds, so the G9 locks on and never loses the target. And with burst shooting at 20fps with continuous AF, you&#x27
column2: ll capture amazing shots of even the most fast-moving subjects. With a compatible lens, Dual image stabilisation, a combination of Body and Optical stabilisation, compensates for camera shake and blur, up to 6.5 stops. It&#x27
column3: s ideal for optimising telephoto, night-time, and one-handed shooting.&lt

column1: Shoot the moving image in hyper-detailed 4K UHD. An amazing level of detail is captured in beautifully smooth motion at up to 60p.  With the brilliant 6K Photo mode, shoot continuously at 30 frames per second and then select the perfect still as an up to 18MP jpeg. It&#x27
column2: s a superb way to get that spot-on split second composition when shooting very fast-moving nature, sports or action.&lt

column1: For stunning landscape and close-up macro photography, High Resolution mode delivers 80 megapixel equivalent images in JPEG &amp
column2: RAW format. An incredible level of detail and depth is captured by combining 8 images taken while shifting the sensor.&lt

column1: Integrated Bluetooth and Wi-Fi makes wireless connection with your smart device easy, for instant sharing of your work. A Bluetooth low energy connection maintains a consistent and reliable link with your smart phone or tablet, while using minimal power.&lt

Ideal for shots of the natural world out in the wild, the G9 is built for the outdoor life. Its magnesium alloy body is splash-proof, dust-proof, and freeze-proof down to -10°C. A fully free angle touch screen lets you get the shot no matter how difficult the angle, and provides intuitive touch control. An OLED viewfinder offers an exceptionally clear view with 100% coverage, high magnification ratio of 0.83x (35mm equivalent) and 10,000:1 contrast ratio for supreme visibility.  It also features a double SD card slot supporting high speed UHS-II compatibility. With a smaller and lighter body than a DSLR it&#x27
column2: s ideal for travelling light while not sacrificing image quality.&lt

column1: This kit is supplied with the LUMIX G VARIO 12-60mm F3.5-5.6 ASPH. POWER O.I.S. lens.  A versatile lens with a focal range from wide angle 12mm to telephoto 60mm, it excels at crystal clear macro shots too, and is tough enough to withstand heavy field use.&lt

8,johnlewis-8e8e0256c380caf22ebd8bceb1f1c855,Olympus PEN E-PL8 Compact System Camera with 14-42mm EZ Lens, HD 1080p, 16.1MP, Wi-Fi, 3&quot
column6: Highly stylish and packed full of features, the Olympus PEN E-PL8 compact system camera is brilliant whether you&#x27
column7: re expressing your creativity or taking simple snaps or selfies. With a fresh body redesign, the E-PL8 is classy and impressively capable. Featuring a tiltable LCD touch screen, built-in Wi-Fi and a sensor that will let you take high resolution photos and Full HD video, the E-PL8 exudes sophistication.&lt

column1: The camera body’s aesthetic design has been refined and streamlined for an improved look and feel over previous models. The front, top and grip have been redesigned for better handling, and a premium makeover makes the E-PL8 a camera with highly desirable looks to match its brilliant features.&lt

The E-PL8 uses 81 focus points to quickly and accurately help you focus on the subject of your photo. That means you can get the snap you want much quicker, making it easier to capture fleeting moments or give you more time to concentrate on your framing. It also features continuous video focus, so you can keep on filming without having to manually adjust every time your subject moves.&lt

Olympus’ M.Zuiko 14-42mm EZ Lens is small, smart and portable. With its electronic zoom, you can control it remotely through the ImageShare app and deliver smoother video zoom. Its premium construction features a durable metal lens mount, and a compact size that’s perfect for carrying around.&lt

The 3-inch LCD touch screen on the E-PL8 has a tilt mechanism that rotates 170 degrees, letting you take extra-high and extra-low photos with ease. And it’s perfect for selfies because you have a full preview to frame the shot. An updated configuration also makes it easier to select functions and settings, as well as choosing the subject you want to focus on in your shot.&lt

Take your creativity up a notch – with 9 Effects, including 14 Art Filters designed to turn your photos and movies into striking artworks in an instant on your camera screen. Play around and you’ll be surprised just what visual masterpieces you can create from your photos!
E-PL8 features built-in Wi-Fi, which makes it easier than ever to share your photos. It&#x27
column2: s perfect for posting them on social networking sites or emailing them to friends fast and without any fuss.&lt

column1: Keep things bright with this add-on flash, included with your PEN, which also detaches to make sure things stay light as well.&lt
Reduce camera shake with in-body stabilisation that extends to any lens you use – including wide-angles.&lt

column43: s superb RX10 bridge camera is even further refined for stunningly professional results. A leap forward in autofocus tech to ultra-fast levels combines with an enormous 25x optical zoom range for amazing precision versatility. With legendary optics and powerful image processing, you can shoot extraordinary high resolution photos and 4K movies. Zoom in from afar, shoot in extreme close-up, or capture super slo-mo footage. Triple ring manual control and touch screen focussing make manual operation smooth, intuitive and accurate.  The RX10 IV gives you DSLR-quality results, without the need for multiple lenses. &lt

column2: s groundbreaking Fast Hybrid Autofocus system heightens reaction times to incredible new levels. At speeds of up to just 0.03 seconds, precision focussing is instantaneous, and accurate. 315 detection points ensure tenacious tracking of your subject as it moves through the frame.&lt

column1: The 25x optical zoom  Zeiss lens features a huge 24-600mm extra wide-angle to ultra-telephoto zoom range with macro capability too. A large F2.4-4 aperture floods the sensor with glorious light detail for high resolution results. Advanced aspherical lens elements and ED glass ensures excellent image quality, resolution and contrast, so it’s equally adept at high clarity and lush bokeh. Optical SteadyShot image stabilisation technology ensures clarity for handheld still and movie shooting, especially in low light, or at the ultra-telephoto end of the zoom range.&lt

Capture incredible super slow motion videos with the RX10 IV. Shoot as fast as 250 frames per second at Full HD quality, or 1000 fps in PAL mode, which is a stunning 40x slower than natural motion. With an adjustable shutter speed as fast as 1/32000 second and up to 24fps continuous shooting speed, even with AF/AE tracking, you&#x27

The 20.1MP 1.0 type Exmor RS CMOS sensor delivers outstanding picture quality thanks to a stacked architecture that expands and speeds up signal processing. The BIONZ X image processing engine handles the data with speed and precision.&lt

The RX10 IV can suppress distortion when shooting at up to a shutter speed of 1/32000, so you can capture sharp, undistorted images of fast-moving sports action. Its electronic shutter also allows you to shoot silently so you can get in amongst the wildlife and not disturb the environment.&lt

With high precision 4K recording, the RX10 IV can really take your breath away. Shoot beautiful footage with high-bit-rate recording, and full pixel readout without pixel binning for high-resolution results. A high-speed front-end LSI supports image processing to greatly reduce “rolling shutter”. Together with the Fast Hybrid AF, video footage is beautifully professional.&lt
With high magnification (0.70x), contrast and resolution, the OLED viewfinder features a resolution equivalent to 2359k dots and corner-to-corner visibility to make it easier to see every detail.&lt

Triple manual lens rings for focus, zoom and aperture are designed for natural, comfortable control, especially when looking through the viewfinder. A multi interface shoe makes it easy to connect flash units, microphones and accessories, and a dust and moisture-resistant body ensures the camera withstands rugged conditions. The LCD screen tilts to 109 degrees up and 41 degrees down for easier shooting from more awkward angles. And you can focus with your fingertips too. Tactile focus control means you can slide your finger across the touch screen to shift focus, or simply touch the point of the composition you wish to focus on.&lt

Go anywhere, share anytime. Simply touch the camera against an NFC-enabled smartphone or tablet to activate apps or share photos or movies - no extra cables, no complicated connections. Use built-in Wi-Fi to upload to social networks or connect to a PC or TV, and Sony’s PlayMemories Mobile App is available for iOS and Android devices to download to enhance your creativity.&lt

10,johnlewis-fa54701a6f975fb95d2ce0daef459894,Canon EOS 1300D Digital SLR Camera With 18-55mm Lens, HD 1080p, 18MP, Wi-Fi, NFC,  3&quot
column25: Tailored for beginners and powerful enough for the pros, the Canon EOS 1300D is an top-notch DSLR for anyone who wants to push their abilities further. The powerful CMOS sensor absorbs more detail in every shot while the broad ISO range gives you the freedom to take natural looking low light photos. Full HD recording delivers high quality videos at a push of a button, while the Wi-Fi and NFC make sharing your content immensely easy. This camera comes with a versatile 18-55mm non-IS lens too, so you can get shooting right out of the box.&lt

column9: Shoot photos and video with a quality and character all of their own. 18-megapixel images from the EOS 1300D are packed with detail and are large enough to be printed at sizes up to A2+. Videos have a professional look and feel that looks great played back on your home HDTV.&lt

When you compose a photograph using the EOS 1300D the camera analyses the scene too, looking for brightness, colour and the presence of movement and faces. This information is used to set the most appropriate camera settings for the scene, whether it’s a detail-packed landscape or fast-moving action. A built-in Feature Guide, and supporting app, help you learn more about your camera whenever you want.&lt

column11: An optical viewfinder allows you to compose and anticipate your shot, so you’ll always be ready to capture the emotion behind the moment. With its friendly controls that are instinctive to use, and a large 3-inch LCD screen for image review, the EOS 1300D is a joy to use.&lt

column9: Emphasise the main subject in a photo by isolating it against a soft, blurred background - a look characteristic of DSLR photography. Use one of five Creative filters to add a personal touch to your photography, including Grainy Black &amp
column11: White to Toy Camera and Fish Eye effect.&lt

column9: Keep subjects looking sharp by placing them underneath one of the EOS 1300D’s nine focusing points. These are spread out across the viewfinder, letting you place your subject either in the middle of the frame or off-centre, for a more interesting composition.&lt

The EOS 1300D’s Wi-Fi and NFC lets you share your images instantly. Post your best content onto social networking sites through Wi-Fi in an instant. Or, you can simply tap devices together to review and transfer media to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

Canon’s included 18-55mm lens is an all-round treat that will get you going with fine precision. As the 3x optical zoom gets you closer to your subject wherever you are, the large f3.5 – f5.6 aperture range gives you beautiful landscape and portrait shots.&lt

Tap into your inner-Kubrick with this camera’s sophisticated film-making tool. Shooting in detailed Full HD, the depth-of-field control keeps your subject in focus and background beautifully blurred.&lt

column3: Powerful CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4+ processor&lt
Feature Guide makes it perfect for beginners&amp

column11: One of the biggest advantages of this camera is the sheer shooting flexibility on offer. You can use additional lenses to take wide-angle, telephoto, or close-up shots to suit just about any situation. The shorter the focal length (measured in mm), the wider the view will be – the longer the focal length, the more telescopic the picture. With a selection of interchangeable lenses at your disposal, the creative possibilities are endless. &lt

column6: The Canon Powershot G9 X Mark II marries superb image quality with timeless, retro, ultra-stylish design. Slipping effortlessly into your pocket, and with a host of connection options for easy sharing, it&#x27
column7: s the perfect smartphone companion. An abundance of photography tech is packed into its slimmed-down body, and with an improved processor on the previous model, you&#x27
column8: ll be able to capture superb shots in any light, and faster. Despite its compact size, compelling, smooth Full HD movies are a breeze thanks to its 5 axis Advanced Dynamic Image Stabilisation and dedicated shooting functions. And with a host of creative features, once you’ve accomplished your artistic ambitions, you can effortlessly share them with the world across a wireless connection of your choice, including Bluetooth.&lt

column1: The large 1.0-type 20.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor is backed up by a DIGIC 7 processor for faster results. Burst shooting can capture images at a superfast 8.1 frames per second (up to a whopping 38 shots in one go), while autofocus takes just 0.14sec. Working with premium optics which feature a bright f/2.0 lens and 3x optical zoom, you’ll be capturing crisp, clear shots in any environment. Together with an intelligent Optical Image Stabiliser, stills and frames will display a steady hold too – even when handheld or in low light conditions. And the Smart Auto feature recognises 58 different scene types to optimise your photo based on its style and composition.&lt

The G9 X Mark II boasts the full suite of wireless connectivity options. Using NFC and Wi-Fi, you’ll be able to connect to your Smartphone or tablet, or use Bluetooth to maintain a constant low-level connection. This will enable you to share photos and movies instantly and even shoot remotely. With the Canon Camera Connect app on your Smartphone, you are granted full creative control and Touch AF
column2: it’s ideal for capturing group shots or wildlife. And through Wi-Fi, you can automatically back up your images to cloud services such as Flickr and Google Drive with Image Sync.&lt

column1: Create compelling movies in glorious 1080p Full HD, which are smooth and steady. Thanks to a 5 Axis Advanced Dynamic IS, you’ll be able to shoot quality movies handheld or on the move. Improved tracking capabilities ensure your subjects stay in focus and with various movie shooting modes including Short Clip and Time-Lapse, you can add professional effects to your footage.

The intuitive LCD touch screen on the rear offers full control over all settings. Or if you prefer to be more hands on, the lens ring gives satisfying manual control over aperture, shutter speed and zoom. It&#x27
column2: s completely up to you how manual or automatic you like it set up. And to ensure you don&#x27
column3: t run out of power, the G9 X Mark II conveniently charges via USB.&lt

17,johnlewis-d2d9158b7dacf8678179b8f69fdba043,Nikon COOLPIX B700 Bridge Camera, 20.3MP, 4K UHD, 60x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, 3&quot
column25: Take pictures with superb detail over incredible distances with the 20.3 megapixel super-zoom COOLPIX B700. Whether capturing wildlife on far horizons or reaching for the stars, the extendable zoom function allows you to zero in on the action in amazing clarity from an awe-inspiring range. Equipped with an extra-low dispersion glass lens and High-Performance Autofocus system for precision shooting, the B700’s 60x optical zoom is extendable to 120x Dynamic Fine Zoom. Shoot movies in stunning 4K UHD and capture pictures in RAW file format for supreme image quality, while 5-Stop Dual Detect Optical Vibration Reduction and side zoom control minimise camera shake. Stay connected with your smart device at all times with Nikon’s SnapBridge.&lt

column1: The outstandingly long-range 60x NIKKOR zoom lens is extendable to 120x Dynamic Fine Zoom. Its range covers from 24 mm wide angle to super-telephoto 1440 mm angles of view (equivalent in 35 mm format), aswell as supporting powerful macro photography as close as 1cm from the lens. The super ED glass lens offers top quality chromatic aberration correction.

Nikon’s SnapBridge feature maintains a constant low-power connection between the B700 and your smartphone or tablet to ensure a seamless synchronisation across your devices. This makes instant sharing of your high quality images a breeze, and you can control key camera functions from your phone.&lt

Shoot amazingly smooth moving images in 4K Ultra High Definition (3840x2160/30p), with a directivity adjusting zoom microphone for great sound quality. A dedicated button allows you to start recording in movie mode in a moment. Supporting HDMI, an optional cable allows you to connect to your TV or monitor for easy, instant playback.&lt

Boasting an impressive 20.3 megapixel sensor, the B700 allows in more light to capture the finest detail. An ultra-responsive High-performance AutoFocus feature locks onto your subject to allow ease of tracking. Target Finding Autofocus chooses optimal focus area size and position. When you aim your camera at the subject it will instantly predict the area where focus should be acquired, and is equally as effective with off-centre and central subjects, and with objects both large and small.&lt

column3: 20.3 megapixel CMOS sensor for stunning detail&lt

18,johnlewis-2235c71f96ab2c689c87b4f113b321f2,Nikon D5600 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm VR Lens, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, Optical Viewfinder, 3.2&quot
column4: Nikon’s D5600 is a digital SLR camera that fuels your creative spirit, and makes it easy to share your most inventive works. Capture that fleeting moment of beauty, experiment with light and shadow, or shoot brilliantly detailed full HD movies from any angle with the highly adjustable and responsive touch screen. The D5600 gives you the full scope of DSLR photography in a compact, portable, and ergonomically-designed body. With great in-camera creative features, fast autofocus, SnapBridge connectivity, and the endless variety offered by interchangeable lenses, this is a powerfully capable and connected camera that will satisfy the most artistic photographic instincts.&lt

column1: The design of the D5600 centres you at the heart of the photographic experience. A high-quality optical viewfinder, relating an incredibly clear through-lens viewpoint, lets you frame distinctive compositions and block out light and distractions. With intuitive control, the command dial and multi-selector allow you to change settings while shooting. Or you can transpose controls to the large rear touch screen, all while looking though the viewfinder. A deep grip makes it a joy to handle and a monocoque carbon-reinforced shell makes it tough and lightweight enough to accompany you anywhere.&lt

A 24.2 megapixel DX format sensor captures the image in superbly crisp detail, rendering the finest textures or the widest natural scenes in pin-sharp clarity. Low-light is handled with ease thanks to an expanded ISO sensitivity of 6400 in Night Landscape mode. The EXPEED 4 engine processes the image with superior speed and visual noise reduction, even at high ISOs.&lt

Equipped with super-sharp autofocus, the D5600 will catch everything, locking on to a moving subject and retaining focus. 39 individual focus points give wide AF coverage of the frame, while 9 cross-type sensors enhance accuracy. And when the action’s fast, it can shoot at 5 frames per second so you won’t miss that perfect moment.&lt

Shoot the moving image in fine clarity with the D5600, capturing the action in impressively detailed Full HD 1080p resolution. Continuous Live View autofocus ensures the subjects stay sharp and crisp, while the Time-Lapse movie feature allows you speed up your footage to transform the ambient motion of the natural world, or a bustling crowd scene, into a dramatic high-speed sequence.&lt

A brilliantly flexible 3.2” touch screen allows you to shoot from any angle. Flip, tilt or rotate it to find the perfectly framed shot, so however you need to hold the camera, you’ll always have a clear view. It responds as intuitively as a smart phone screen, with a tap of the screen to focus and shoot, or &#x27
column3: to zoom in and out. During viewfinder shooting, the Touch Fn function allows you to select focus point and adjust settings like aperture and auto sensitivity via the screen.&lt

column2: s supplied with an AF-P DX Nikkor 18-55mm F/3.5-5.6 G VR zoom lens for brilliant everyday photography. Equally good for landscapes or portraits, as well as capturing fast-paced movie action, this compact, light, and easy-to-carry lens has Nikon’s Vibration Reduction for pin-sharp clarity, even in low light settings. The perfect versatile lens to get the best out of the D5600.&lt

column1: The D5600 features a host of in-camera creative options and effects. You can preview them in Live View and adjust intensity before starting to shoot, while enabling Picture Controls enables fine-tuning of settings like contrast and saturation to finesse that perfect image. And a retouch menu offers plenty of refining adjustments to the pictures you’ve already taken.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and NFC, it’s simple to share your photos and movies wirelessly, in an instant. Featuring SnapBridge, the D5600 can maintain a constant connection to your smart phone or tablet, to sync your shots as you take them.&lt

column3: The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

column1: Featuring the X-Trans CMOS III sensor, specifically designed for the X Series, with 24.3MP resolution, the image is spectacularly detailed while visual noise remains controlled. A high ISO of 12800 ensures equally good detail in low light settings. Phase detection auto-focus puts superb speed and accuracy into your hands, so you can react as fast as the action in front of you.&lt

The practical and beautiful analogue controls of the X100F are intuitive and satisfying to use, reminiscent of the film cameras of yesteryear. A built-in ISO Dial is incorporated into the Shutter Speed Dial, while a focus lever gives you instant control over the focus area without taking your eye off the viewfinder. Check exposure setting with just a quick glance at the top plate, and, with most of the controls on the right side of the camera, you can quickly and easily change settings while maintaining a firm and steady grip.&lt

Combining the features of an optical viewfinder and an electronic viewfinder gives you the best of both worlds. Switch between the two with the lever on the front of the body. And you can even apply the electronic display over the OVF screen for more accurate focussing in real time.&lt

1080p resolution captures the moving image with super-sharp detail, with a choice of six different frame rates for supreme smoothness. Adjust aperture, shutter speed and exposure compensation while recording, and add a range of film simulation effects for a touch of artistry.&lt

column9: Nikon’s Coolpix A900 is a small camera with big zoom capability. Its crystal clear Nikkor lens has a mighty 35x Optical Zoom, while a 20.3MP sensor captures the moment in superb clarity. Shoot movies in stunningly detailed 4K Ultra HD and easily create time-lapse sequences. Factor in advanced vibration reduction, high speed autofocus, a tilting screen, easy smart connectivity, all in a sleek, compact body with intuitive control, and you have an impressively powerful compact camera that fits right into your pocket.&lt

column1: The deceptively small A900 compact features the renowned power of a high quality Nikkor lens. Its 35x Optical Zoom is extendable to 70x Dynamic Fine Zoom so you can zero in on far horizons in true detail. Equally good at wide-angle (24mm) and super-telephoto (840mm) shots you can be sure to cover all the action, or choose to study subjects in macro as close as 1cm to the lens.&lt

The backside illumination CMOS image sensor packs in 20.3 megapixels of stunning clarity, delivered with low visual noise. It gives both your stills and movies a fine crispness, and performs equally well in low light conditions.&lt

With a resolution of 3840 x 2160, your movies will be breathtakingly detailed, in fabulous 4K ultra high definition. A dedicated movie record button makes it easy to just start shooting so you won’t miss the action fumbling with settings, and the A900 has editing options in-camera. It’s easy to convert movies into time-lapse sequences, and with the neat Superlapse feature you can record time-lapse footage from different points of view.&lt

Even with such a small camera, even with such zoom capability, your stills and movies will always be stable and sharp, thanks to high quality vibration reduction to reduce camera shake. Lens-shift VR and Electronic VR work together to ensure clarity of stills, while a 5-axis hybrid system makes sure movies are smooth and crisp.&lt

The mode dial and command dial on the top of the camera give you the power of fast manual control so you don’t have to scroll to find the right setting in the menu. It’s more direct, and quicker. Access the right exposure mode and manually adjust shutter speed and aperture, so you can get the perfect shot, fast. And the camera’s high speed autofocus means it’s ready to react as quickly as you. Plus the tilting rear screen means you can experiment with more creative shooting angles.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and NFC, it’s simple to share your photos and movies wirelessly, in an instant. Featuring SnapBridge, the A900 can maintain a constant connection to your smart phone or tablet and syncs your shots as you take them.&lt

column26: The Lumix DMC-FT30 is a casual yet tough camera which can handle whatever life throws at it. Built for active lifestyles, you can enjoy easy shooting in-style both in town and during outdoors adventure pursuits. With credit to the waterproof, shockproof and freezeproof protections, the DMC-FT30 is more than just a camera.&lt

column3: The 16.1 megapixels can capture a world of moments on its expanding 220MB built-in memory card. With 4x optical zoom and 8x intelligent zoom, you can get up close and personal with your surroundings and take down every single detail. With the Creative panorama function, it’s possible to even shoot a horizontal or vertical panoramic image with consequent shots taken by overlaying the previous picture. The Creative Control (recording mode) and the Creative Retouch (playback mode) can then give you the vision of an artist, leveraging the various filter effects.&lt

Even when you are in action, the MEGA O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) can compensate for any blurring caused. Just a slight hand-shake movement is accurately detected by a sampling frequency of 4,000 times per second. The result is a sharp, clear image which is witness to your venturing abilities.&lt

Record videos in high definition, 1280 x 720p MP4 format with the press of an independent motion picture button. Shot in 25 fps, the Motion Picture Recording offers a true-to-life recording of your experiences. Better still, the button is conveniently located on the frame for you to switch between photo and video shooting instantly.&lt

Even in underwater environments or at night, the torch light supports the recordings of beautiful videos. The functionality also has the possibility to only turn the light on, to light up the subject while the camera function is not activated.&lt

The landscape or specific subjects can be recorded over a time period too. The Time Lapse Shot functionality means that you can leave the camera to record a stationary observation. A series of sequent images can then be combined in a camera to produce a time lapse video.&lt

The DMC-FT30 has been designed to withstand an action-packed lifestyle. Capable of diving down in to 8 meters of water, the compact camera is perfect for snapping-up the underwater scenery. Better still, it is dustproof, Shockproof up to 1.5 metres and Freezeproof down to -10 °C, so you can never venture too far.&lt
Creating stunning under water shots, the Red Colour Reproduction of Advanced Underwater Mode compensates for the red colour which is too easily lost. Sports, Snow and Beach &amp
column4: Surf Mode can also be selected easily from the menu so you can get the mode which is just right for your actions.&lt

And with touch functionality, it feels and responds just like your smart phone screen. Alternatively, line up the shot by eye with its bright, lag-free optical viewfinder.&lt

column1: This camera is supplied with two versatile zoom lenses to set you up with a huge range of shooting options, right out of the box. An EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 III is a fantastic all-round lens that&#x27

Both lenses&#x27

column1: 31,johnlewis-876c0a708413ab805c2ccdbf22558baa,"Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ100KITEB-R Digital Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 20.1MP, 10x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, EVF, 3&quot
column2: LCD Touch Screen with Leather Camera Case &amp
column5: Have the power of a professional in your pocket with Panasonic’s super-zoom DMC-TZ100. Boasting 4K video, 20.1MP and stunning 10x optical zoom, this tiny package yields massive results. The brand’s crystal-clear LEICA lens is backed by a mighty 1” MOS sensor so the depth-of-field is pin sharp, and the sophisticated Wi-Fi makes wireless control super-easy. With other features like the post-focus, blur-reducing image stabiliser and intuitive Live View Finder, this camera is a sublime feat of portable photography.&lt

column9: Far larger than most compact cameras, the TZ100’s 1” MOS sensor delivers delightful colour and clarity in any light. Filled with 20.1MPs, your snaps will be rich and beautiful from dusk till dawn. All of this power is channelled with rapid speed through the brand’s state-of-the-art Venus image processor. This way, the pocket-sized camera will supply luscious shots in an instant.&lt

column5: Tailor Your Shots With The LEICA Zoom Lens&lt
column9: With 10x optical zoom, 20x intelligent zoom and 4x digital zoom, you’ll get a crisp shot of your subject wherever you are. The lens’ broad f2.8 – 5.9 aperture range gives you space to experiment with background/subject separation too, letting you tailor your shot to landscapes or portraits. It also features an optical image stabiliser to level out handshake and keep your pictures smooth when you’re on-the-move. Such super-powered flexibility will let you go as far as your creativity will take you.&lt

4K has four-times the pixels of HD and this camera lets you capture your memories in this ultra-crisp resolution. Shoot 4K video at 25fps to give your adventures even more detail and pop-out beauty. There’s even a 4K Photo function so you can give your stills the Ultra-HD treatment.&lt

Before or after you’ve taken your shot, this camera keeps you in the driver’s seat. The innovative Post-Focus mode lets you decide what’s in focus after you’ve taken the photo. This way, you can optimise any part of a picture when you’re reviewing a day’s haul. The 0.2” Live View Finder, which automatically turns on when you hold it up to your eyes, manual control rings and vivid 3” LCD Touch Screen give you complete control as you line up your shots.&lt
With built-in Wi-Fi, this camera can connect to your smart phone or tablet wirelessly, letting you share your shots in an instant. You can even download the Panasonic Image App (iOS &amp
column11: Android) to control the TZ100 remotely.&lt

column9: Give your work added art with this camera’s wealth of effects. Use the Creative Control mode to add such filters as Old Days, Retro or Dynamic Monochrome, or adjust the look with such scene setting as Appetizing Food, Silky Skin or Glistening Water. This is only a snippet of the hours of fun you can have experimenting.&lt

column3: Super-Zoom LEICA lens gives supreme 10x optical zoom&lt
Post-Focus function lets to adjust focus after taking a photo&lt
3” LCD Touch Screen gives you state-of-the-art control&lt
Integrated Wi-Fi lets you pair it up to your smart device&lt

column25: Powerful, professional results with the versatility of interchangeable lenses from Nikon. The D5300 is more than a full size DSLR, it’s also a Full HD camcorder with an advanced image processor to let you shoot sharper and faster than ever. Tough and ergonomically designed, it sits solidly in the hand for confident shooting in any situation. It also features a suite of built-in functions like scene selection, movie modes and high speed shooting so you’ll always be ready to capture those special moments.&lt

column9: Nikon makes outstanding image quality possible with a newly developed Nikon DX-format CMOS image sensor and the new EXPEED 4 image-processing engine for shooting at up to 5fps.&lt

Your pictures are ready to send immediately to smart devices for sharing on sites like Facebook. Remote shooting also lets you release the shutter from a distance, while your smart device can operate like a remote live view monitor to confirm the image before you take the snap.&lt
The D5300 also doubles as a high-performance video camera capable of Full HD D-Movies at 1920 x 1080. With 50/60p capture you get smooth, fluid recording, even with fast-moving subjects. &lt
More focus points quickly and sharply capture action, even when your subject isn&#x27
column10: t in the centre of the frame. The D5300 offers wide-area AF coverage and high-density focus points including 9 cross-type sensor in the canter area, helping you to get everything looking as sharp as possible.&lt

column9: Enhance your pictures and movies with nine easy-to-use effects, including HDR Painting and Toy Camera. You can even check how the effect looks in real time before you shoot.&lt

33,johnlewis-c7e048aaf6f0986a7d4aa31a7734d9d2,Canon EOS 750D Digital SLR with 18-55mm IS STM Lens, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, NFC, 3.0&quot
column2: Vari Angle LCD Screen with Additional Battery Kit",cameras,pound,549.95,Canon,,True,"&lt
column4: The Canon EOS 750D is the ideal DSLR if you’re looking to capture stunning images and Full HD movies of special memories, with the assurance of automatic shooting modes. Effortlessly capture stunning detail in any situation and share along the way with wireless connectivity options.&lt

column3: This camera comes with a quiet and versatile 18-55mm STM lens with a built in image stabilizer to get you shooting right out of the box. The STM motor on this lens provides smooth, near-silent focusing when shooting video.&lt

column1: The EOS 750D features a truly superb 24.2 megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 processor. This delivers detailed, low-noise digital photographs which are ideal for printing.&lt

Better still, with fast shutter speeds you’ll be able to capture great moments even in low light conditions. This is thanks to an ISO range which is expandable to 100-12800. And with a high responsive autofocus system that features 19 cross-type AF points which can be selected individually, in small groups or as a active area depending on your subject, you’ll be able to focus in on your subject with precision and speed.&lt

Assisting with creative shooting is the fully articulating screen. Perfect for capturing ‘selfies’, low or high shots, the vari-angle touchscreen can provide your images with a different perspective.&lt

The EOS 750D’s Wi-Fi and NFC connection enables you to share your images instantly. Post your best shots and frames onto social networking sites via Wi-Fi for direct upload. Or simply tap devices together to review and transfer photographs and videos to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

The Canon EOS 750D DSLR can record brilliant home videos in a Full HD 1080p resolution. You can also shoot frames at 720p with a rate of 50fps to create slow motion clips. The CMOS AF III engine helps to ensure you get smooth tracking movements and responsive focusing when you’re in ‘video’ mode. And keeping you in focus during filming is the Hybrid AF technology which facilitates continuous focusing and activates the near-silent Movie Servo AF with compatible STM lenses.&lt

column3: This kit includes an additional LP-E17 Battery.&lt

column4: The Canon EOS M camera is small enough to carry with you anywhere, and features a range of creative controls and great low-light performance. Enjoy the quality of a digital SLR camera in a compact body and achieve the shots you want with interchangeable lenses.&lt

column3: This camera comes with the EF-M 15-45mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM standard zoom lens which combines Canon’s leading Optical Image Stabilizer and Stepping Motor (STM) technologies to deliver minimal image blur and smooth, near-silent focus in movie making.&lt

column1: Capture images detailed enough to print up to A2 size with vivid clarity. The APS-C sized 18-megapixel sensor shares the same dimensions as those used in EOS DSLR cameras, so you’ll get the same brilliant image quality.&lt

With simple controls, the camera is easy to use so you can take quick, hassle-free photos. The 3-inch touch screen provides intuitive control over the menus, and allows you to focus on your subject and take the picture with a single tap.&lt

You’ll not only be able to take stunning still photography with this camera, but you’ll also be able to shoot Full-HD movies too. Experiment with creative features such as shallow focus. With the Video Snapshot feature, you can shoot several short clips of 2, 4 or 8 seconds in length, edit them and turn them into a video slideshow.&lt

Scene Intelligent Auto technology analyses the subject, brightness, colour and movement in the photo you are composing, and uses the information to pick the optimum camera settings so that you get the best results possible.&lt
Easy-to-use controls let you achieve a range of creative effects on your photos, such as smooth, out-of-focus backgrounds, to create stunningly beautiful images.&lt

Even in low light levels, the EOS M will continue to perform well and deliver high-quality stills and frames. The hybrid autofocus keeps you photographs sharp and evaluative exposure metering will select the best aperture and shutter speed. A maximum sensitivity of ISO 12,800, which is expandable to ISO 25600, allows you to take hand-held photos in low-light conditions without the need for a tripod or flash.&lt

35,johnlewis-630ca2aa60148d21eea186d82ad86783,Panasonic Lumix DC-GH5 Compact System Camera with Leica 12-60mm O.I.S. Interchangeable Lens, 4K UHD , 20.3MP, Wi-Fi, OLED Live Viewfinder, 3.2” LCD Vari-Angle Touch Screen",cameras,pound,"2,099.00",Panasonic,,True,"&lt
column6: s GH5 is an awesomely capable compact system camera. With a larger sensor than its predecessor, refined Venus Engine and more powerful image stabilisation, stills and movies are incredibly detailed and breathtakingly lifelike. Stunning 4K UHD video resolution runs at an ultra-smooth 60p for the first time, and 6K Photo shooting allows you to select that perfect split-second still from a burst file to save as a high-quality image. With super-fast autofocus, a live viewfinder and a highly flexible touch screen, all housed in a rugged body built for the outdoor life, the GH5 delivers unprecedented picture quality in the history of Lumix cameras.&lt

column1: At 20.3 megapixels, the Digital LIVE MOS Sensor is 25% bigger than that of the GH4 benefitting superb resolution, image rendering and colour reproduction, while the removal of the low-pass filter maximises the level of detail possible. The refined Venus Engine processor achieves amazing image quality, especially with Natural Texture Expression for breathtakingly lifelike natural tones. It analyses the characteristic and optimally processes each individual pixel for stunning detail, realism and suppression of false colour. High Precision Multi Process Noise Reduction boasts four times the accuracy on the previous model, so visual noise is countered and detail is retained, meaning low-light photos can be clearly shot at high ISOs of 25600. Stills and movies are blur-free: in conjunction with a compatible lens, powerful 5-axis dual image stabilisation compensates for larger, previously uncontrollable movements, making it equivalent to shooting at a maximum 5 stop slower shutter speed. Perfect for telephoto and single-handed use, and all in stunning 4K.&lt

For the first time, 4K UHD video runs at up to 60p (i.e. frame refreshes per second) for unbelievably smooth and ultra-detailed footage. It also means you can slow your footage down without losing any fine detail. The sensor and venus engine combine to suppress rolling distortion, while faster quality signal reading ensures every single frame is of outstanding quality. Special film characteristic styles (&#x27
column5: for example) are available to give your work that authentic film feel, and with no recording duration limit you can go beyond 30 minutes in all settings.&lt

column1: The 6K Photo feature allows you to extract an 18MP resolution image from a 6K Burst Shooting File running at 30 frames per second, so you will always master that one perfect split-second moment, in beautifully glorious detail.&lt
Using improved Depth from Defocus technology, autofocus is increased on the previous model up to a super-fast 0.05sec at 12 frames per second. So it&#x27
column2: s easy to keep locked onto fast moving subjects and keep them super-sharp. The frame contains 225 focus points, and you can customise a focal group using the thumb joystick. Meanwhile the Post Focus function even makes it possible to select the area of focus after you&#x27

s supplied with a LEICA DG Vario-Elmarit 12-60mm F2.8-4.0 Power O.I.S. lens. A highly flexible lens, equally adept at framing breathtaking landscapes and mid-telephoto portraits, it captures your work with a stunning clarity, right to the edge of the frame. Power optical image stabilisation ensures images are free of blur, even from large camera shake, so every picture is beautifully crisp, and all distortion is prevented. And with stunning autofocus capability it&#x27
column3: s ideal to do justice to 4K video capture. Splash, dust and freeze-proof it&#x27
column4: s just as tough as, and a perfect companion for, the GH5.&lt

column5: Live Viewfinder and Vari-angle Touch Screen&lt

column1: The large OLED Live Viewfinder boasts an amazing magnification ratio of 1.52x (0.76x 35mm camera equivalent), while the rear touch screen achieves approx. 100% field of view and can be positioned at any angle so you can always find the perfect shot, even in the trickiest environment.&lt
Integrated Bluetooth and Wi-Fi makes wireless connection with your smart device easy, for instant sharing of your work.&lt

The GH5 is tough enough to withstand heavy use in the field. Composed of magnesium alloy and joint-sealed, not only is it splash and dust proof, but freeze-proof down to minus 10 degrees celsius. So it&#x27
column2: ll keep delivering incredible imagery through the toughest of photography adventures.&lt

36,johnlewis-ed0dbd5afc38281862750a00f2bffb23,"Fujifilm X-T2 Compact System Camera with XF 18-55mm IS Lens, 4K Ultra HD, 24.3MP, Wi-Fi, OLED EVF, 3” Tiltable LCD Screen",cameras,pound,"1,499.00",Fujifilm,,True,"&lt
column3: With stunning image clarity, SLR-style handling, and intuitive mechanical dials, Fujifilm’s X-T2 is a compact system camera of outstanding performance and build. A weather-resistant body designed for mobility combined with high speed shooting mean it’s ideal for street and on-the-go photography. The X-T2 has updated processing speed, viewfinder, autofocus, and video resolution compared to the previous model for pristine, professional results, super-fast. This is an impressively featured camera that brings renowned Fujifilm picture quality to your stills and movies, in a beautiful-to-use unit.&lt

column1: A 24.3MP X-Trans CMOS III APS-C sensor captures the image in stunning quality. Its highly random pixel array reduces moiré and false colours without the use of an optical low-pass filter. The X-Processor Pro engine, approximately four times faster than the previous model, delivers amazing colour reproduction and tone gradation for stills and videos with high ISO sensitivity and low visual noise, at amazing speed.&lt

The 2.36 million dot high definition electronic viewfinder is perfectly aligned to give you the sense of being at one with the camera. Quality-wise, it’s comparable with an optical viewfinder, but has the advantage of displaying a live view that reflects exposure settings. It also boasts an impressive magnification ratio of 0.77x.&lt

Recording the moving image in 4K Ultra HD video (it’s actually gathering approximately 1.8 times the information needed for 4K) means your videos will be of breathtakingly detailed quality, and future-proofed. Film simulation modes such as monochrome and documentary options are available while filming, so no need for post-production.&lt

The power of the processing engine and improved algorithms combine to significantly improve the auto-focus capabilities of the X-T2 over the previous model. It has a larger high-speed and high-precision phase detection AF area, and copes easily with points of light, low-contrast objects and delicate textures. And it features a new Autofocus Custom setting for even higher accuracy when tracking moving subjects.&lt

It’s supplied with a versatile 18-55mm zoom lens with maximum aperture f2.8 and a broad focal length ranging from 27mm wide angle to 84mm telephoto (35mm format equivalent). Compact and portable, it features fast motor-driven autofocus and four stop image stabilisation for reliably crisp image capture in any shooting environment. An ideal lens to get the very best out of the X-T2.&lt

Manual dials offer direct control over shutter speed, ISO sensitivity, exposure compensation, drive modes and metering modes. The weather resistant structure is sealed in 63 places and is both dust and water resistant. Additionally it’s designed to cope in temperatures as low as -10°C allowing field photography without worries about the weather.&lt

The LCD screen tilts in three directions so you can always find the best angle, whatever you’re shooting. It remains positioned on the optical axis of the lens for easier high-angle and low-angle shots.&lt

Start-up time has been refined to just 0.3 sec. Working in tandem with the high-speed signal readout of the sensor, the processor reduces the shooting interval to 0.17 sec. and shutter time lag to 0.045 sec. so the camera is ready to react as fast as you, and you never miss the shot.&lt
With Film Simulation, you can choose from classic Fujifilm photo styles, and give your pictures varied colour and tone to suit the subject, just like pros did with film. There&#x27
column2: s standard PROVIA, vivid Velvia, and ASTIA with its true-to-life skin tones
column3: PRO Neg.Std and PRO Neg.Hi, which are portrait modes based on professional colour negative film
column4: and Monochrome expression with three different filter effects as well as Sepia.&lt

column3: app, you can focus and trigger the camera release from your smart phone or tablet. The app not only lets you adjust focus, but also control settings like shutter speed, aperture, exposure compensation and ISO sensitivity.
The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

column5: High-spec camera tech packed into a light compact body makes Panasonic&#x27
column6: s super-zoom DC-TZ93 the ideal travel camera, for a professional quality record of all your holidays and adventures. Boasting 4K Video, 20.3MP and amazingly far-reaching 30x optical zoom, this small package yields superb results. The brand&#x27
column7: s crystal-clear LEICA lens is backed by a large 1/2.3&quot
column8: MOS sensor for pin-sharp clarity, with built-in Wi-Fi for easy wireless sharing. A fully flippable rear touch screen means it&#x27
column9: s great for super-quality selfies. And with other features like post-focus, HYBRID optical image stabiliser and intuitive Live View Finder, this camera gives you the power of premium photography ...in your pocket.&lt

column1: Far larger than in most compact cameras, the TZ93’s 1/2.3” MOS sensor delivers delightful colour and clarity. It works just as well in low light settings, capturing sharp imagery with minimum visual noise. Filled with 20.3 megapixels, your snaps will be rich and beautiful, from dusk till dawn. All of this power is channelled with rapid speed through the brand’s state-of-the-art Venus image processor, supplying luscious shots in an instant.&lt

column5: Extreme Flexibility with High-Powered LEICA Zoom Lens&lt

column1: The TZ93 features a stunningly powerful zoom for such a small camera.  With huge 30x optical zoom, 60x intelligent zoom and 2x digital zoom, you’ll get a crisp shot of your subject wherever you are, zeroing in on far horizons with high detail. The lens’ broad f3.3 – 6.4 aperture range gives you space to experiment with background/subject separation too, letting you tailor your shot to landscapes or portraits. It also features HYBRID Optical Image Stabiliser – using 5-axis correction to deliver crisp, blur-free video. Depth from Defocus technology opens up a world of super-quick autofocus so you can capture fast-moving subjects with reliable accuracy. All this powerful tech combines to let you go as far as your creativity will take you.&lt

4K has four times the pixel density of Full HD and this camera lets you capture your memories in this ultra-crisp resolution. Shoot 4K video at 30fps to capture the action in smooth hyper-detail. The 4K Photo function lets you select the perfect split-second moment from your Ultra HD footage to save as an 8MP equivalent still.&lt

Before or after you’ve taken your shot, this camera keeps you in the driver’s seat. The innovative Post-Focus mode lets you decide what’s in focus after you’ve taken the photo. This way, you can optimise any part of a picture when you’re reviewing a day’s haul. The 0.2” Live View Finder is ideal for giving you a perfect view of the frame even in the brightest sunlight. It automatically turns on when you hold it up to your eyes, and with manual control rings and vivid 3” LCD Touch Screen you have complete control as you line up your shots.&lt
With built-in Wi-Fi, this camera can connect to your smart phone or tablet wirelessly, letting you share your shots in an instant. You can even download the Panasonic Image App (available on iOS &amp
column2: Android) to control the TZ93 remotely.&lt

column1: The rear LCD touch screen gives you direct fingertip control. And it flips up fully  to 180° for super-classy selfies. Whether for a group photo abroad, or yourself looking your best, the TZ93 takes the quality of the self-portrait to the next level.&lt

Give your work the artistic touch with this camera’s wealth of effects. Use the Creative Control mode to add such filters as Old Days, Retro or Dynamic Monochrome, or adjust the look with such scene setting as Appetizing Food, Silky Skin or Glistening Water. This is only a snippet of the hours of fun you can have experimenting.&lt

column3: Super-Zoom LEICA lens gives astonishing 30x optical zoom&lt
Post-Focus function lets you adjust focus after taking a photo&lt
3” LCD Touch Screen gives you state-of-the-art control and flips up for easy self-portraits&lt
Integrated Wi-Fi lets you pair it up to your smart device&lt

column5: This kit is supplied with a camera case and additional battery to keep your TZ-93 pristine, protected and shooting for longer.&lt

40,johnlewis-001045cf1c977c5e9c4db4d540662b4b,Panasonic Lumix DC-GH5 Compact System Camera with Lumix 12-60mm O.I.S. Interchangeable Lens, 4K UHD, 20.3MP, Wi-Fi, OLED Live Viewfinder, 3.2” LCD Vari-Angle Touch Screen",cameras,pound,"1,799.00",Panasonic,,True,"&lt
column4: s GH5 is an awesomely capable compact system camera. With a larger sensor than its predecessor, refined Venus Engine and more powerful image stabilisation, stills and movies are incredibly detailed and breathtakingly lifelike. Stunning 4K UHD video resolution runs at an ultra-smooth 60p for the first time, and 6K Photo shooting allows you to select that perfect split-second still from a burst file to save as a high-quality image. With super-fast autofocus, a live viewfinder and a highly flexible touch screen, all housed in a rugged body built for the outdoor life, the GH5 delivers unprecedented picture quality in the history of Lumix cameras.&lt

column1: At 20.3 megapixels, the Digital LIVE MOS Sensor is 25% bigger than that of the GH4 benefitting superb resolution, image rendering and colour reproduction, while the removal of the low-pass filter maximises the level of detail possible. The refined Venus Engine processor achieves amazing image quality, especially with Natural Texture Expression for breathtakingly lifelike natural tones. It analyses the characteristic and optimally processes each individual pixel for stunning detail, realism and suppression of false colour. High Precision Multi Process Noise Reduction boasts four times the accuracy on the previous model, so visual noise is countered and detail is retained, meaning low-light photos can be clearly shot at high ISOs of 25600. Stills and movies are blur-free: in conjunction with a compatible lens, powerful 5-axis dual image stabilisation compensates for larger, previously uncontrollable movements, making it equivalent to shooting at a maximum 5 stop slower shutter speed. Perfect for telephoto and single-handed use, and all in stunning 4K.&lt

For the first time, 4K UHD video runs at up to 60p (i.e. frame refreshes per second) for unbelievably smooth and ultra-detailed footage. It also means you can slow your footage down without losing any fine detail. The sensor and venus engine combine to suppress rolling distortion, while faster quality signal reading ensures every single frame is of outstanding quality. Special film characteristic styles (&#x27
column5: for example) are available to give your work that authentic film feel, and with no recording duration limit you can go beyond 30 minutes in all settings.&lt

column1: The 6K Photo feature allows you to extract an 18MP resolution image from a 6K Burst Shooting File running at 30 frames per second, so you will always master that one perfect split-second moment, in beautifully glorious detail.&lt
Using improved Depth from Defocus technology, autofocus is increased on the previous model up to a super-fast 0.05sec at 12 frames per second. So it&#x27
column2: s easy to keep locked onto fast moving subjects and keep them super-sharp. The frame contains 225 focus points, and you can customise a focal group using the thumb joystick. Meanwhile the Post Focus function even makes it possible to select the area of focus after you&#x27

s supplied with a LUMIX G Vario 12-60mm f/3.5-5.6 ASPH Power O.I.S. lens. With a focal length of 12-60mm (24-120mm 35mm equivalent), Power Optical Image Stabilisation to minimise blur, and fast, accurate focussing, it&#x27
column3: s equally adept at pin-sharp stills and 4K video. Splash and dust-proof, this compact and lightweight lens is ideal for getting the best out of the GH5.&lt

column5: Live Viewfinder and Vari-angle Touch Screen&lt

column1: The large OLED Live Viewfinder boasts an amazing magnification ratio of 1.52x (0.76x 35mm camera equivalent), while the rear touch screen achieves approx. 100% field of view and can be positioned at any angle so you can always find the perfect shot, even in the trickiest environment.&lt
Integrated Bluetooth and Wi-Fi makes wireless connection with your smart device easy, for instant sharing of your work.&lt

The GH5 is tough enough to withstand heavy use in the field. Composed of magnesium alloy and joint-sealed, not only is it splash and dust proof, but freeze-proof down to minus 10 degrees celsius. So it&#x27
column2: ll keep delivering incredible imagery through the toughest of photography adventures.&lt

column1: One of the biggest advantages of this camera is the sheer shooting flexibility on offer. You can use additional lenses to take wide-angle, telephoto, or close-up shots to suit just about any situation. The shorter the focal length (measured in mm), the wider the view will be &amp
column3: the longer the focal length, the more telescopic the picture. With a selection of interchangeable lenses at your disposal, the creative possibilities are endless. &lt

column4: brilliant and popular compact system camera series, you&#x27
column5: re assured of super-sharp shots, stunningly detailed movies, and rapid performance to capture the fastest action. 5-axis image stabilisation keeps hand-held snaps blur-free, while moving footage is recorded in fantastic 4K resolution. A huge host of photo modes include awe-inspiring 4K Timelapse and loads of artistic filters, and your work can be shared in an instant with built-in Wi-Fi. Supplied with a perfectly-suited 14-42mm lens, the imaging quality of the E–M10 Mark III takes your photos to the next level of style and creativity.&lt

column1: A Micro Four Thirds LIVE MOS sensor packs in 16.1 megapixels of extreme detail, while the adjustable lens gives you versatility and clarity across a range of focal lengths. To eliminate hand-shake, Olympus have developed powerful 5-Axis Image Stabilisation (IS) technology so you can leave your tripod at home. Your pictures will always be blur-free, whether  in a low-light setting or on the move. This built-in feature will let you take razor-sharp pictures wherever you go.&lt
The handling of the Mark III is beautifully designed, with manual dials expertly positioned for a classic but thoroughly modern user experience. It&#x27
column2: s light enough to take with you anywhere, fitting snugly in the palm of the hand. An electronic viewfinder with 2.36M dots relays a 100% view to the eye with precision, while a built-in flash offers supplementary lighting in night or low-light shooting. And the titltable LCD touch screen means you can get down low or up high for more inventive shooting angles.&lt

column1: It boasts rapid reaction times. Up to 8.6 frames per second continuous shooting means you&#x27
column2: ll nail that one-off split-second moment. And high speed autofocus with 121 AF points keeps your subject securely defined. Keep control of your autofocus with the highly-intuitive touch function. Simply tap on the viewfinder where you’d like the focus to hone in on, and watch it adjust itself. Perfect for getting that shot in trickier conditions.&lt

column1: No need to fumble with wires to get your latest snaps and videos shared. All you do is link up your E-M10 Mark III to your smart device through Wi-Fi, and then upload images in an instant through the OLYMPUS Image Share (OI.Share) app. You can even toggle a whole range of settings without having to touch your camera. Control your camera with your smartphone, and keep on top of your work when it&#x27

Take advantage of the 4K revolution and make spectacular Time Lapse videos. Just create a series of images over time, like a sunset, then recompile them quickly into a sped-up 4K Time Lapse piece. This brilliant mode will add a new edge to your photography.&lt

The E-M10 Mark III is packed with a huge range of camera modes. Shoot beautiful night-time and low-light compositions with the Live Composite mode and use AE Bracketing to shoot a number of photos in different settings so you can get it just right. Other modes include Panorama, Sports, Sunset and Fireworks, or you can add arty filters like Pop Art, Grainy Film, Soft Focus and Vintage, to make everything you do all the more personalised and inventive.&lt

42,johnlewis-115a6c1bb7d16f6464c198d2e6d2c0ad,Fujifilm X-T2 Compact System Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 24.3MP, Wi-Fi, OLED EVF, 3” Tiltable LCD Screen, Body Only",cameras,pound,"1,249.00",Fujifilm,,False,"&lt
column7: With stunning image clarity, SLR-style handling, and intuitive mechanical dials, Fujifilm’s X-T2 is a compact system camera of outstanding performance and build. A weather-resistant body designed for mobility combined with high speed shooting mean it’s ideal for street and on-the-go photography. The X-T2 has updated processing speed, viewfinder, autofocus, and video resolution compared to the previous model for pristine, professional results, super-fast. This is an impressively featured camera that brings renowned Fujifilm picture quality to your stills and movies, in a beautiful-to-use unit.&lt

column1: A 24.3MP X-Trans CMOS III APS-C sensor captures the image in stunning quality. Its highly random pixel array reduces moiré and false colours without the use of an optical low-pass filter. The X-Processor Pro engine, approximately four times faster than the previous model, delivers amazing colour reproduction and tone gradation for stills and videos with high ISO sensitivity and low visual noise, at amazing speed.&lt

The 2.36 million dot high definition electronic viewfinder is perfectly aligned to give you the sense of being at one with the camera. Quality-wise, it’s comparable with an optical viewfinder, but has the advantage of displaying a live view that reflects exposure settings. It also boasts an impressive magnification ratio of 0.77x.&lt

Recording the moving image in 4K Ultra HD video (it’s actually gathering approximately 1.8 times the information needed for 4K) means your videos will be of breathtakingly detailed quality, and future-proofed. Film simulation modes such as monochrome and documentary options are available while filming, so no need for post-production.&lt

The power of the processing engine and improved algorithms combine to significantly improve the auto-focus capabilities of the X-T2 over the previous model. It has a larger high-speed and high-precision phase detection AF area, and copes easily with points of light, low-contrast objects and delicate textures. And it features a new Autofocus Custom setting for even higher accuracy when tracking moving subjects.&lt

Manual dials offer direct control over shutter speed, ISO sensitivity, exposure compensation, drive modes and metering modes. The weather resistant structure is sealed in 63 places and is both dust and water resistant. Additionally it’s designed to cope in temperatures as low as -10°C allowing field photography without worries about the weather.&lt

The LCD screen tilts in three directions so you can always find the best angle, whatever you’re shooting. It remains positioned on the optical axis of the lens for easier high-angle and low-angle shots.&lt

Start-up time has been refined to just 0.3 sec. Working in tandem with the high-speed signal readout of the sensor, the processor reduces the shooting interval to 0.17 sec. and shutter time lag to 0.045 sec. so the camera is ready to react as fast as you, and you never miss the shot.&lt
With Film Simulation, you can choose from classic Fujifilm photo styles, and give your pictures varied colour and tone to suit the subject, just like pros did with film. There&#x27
column2: s standard PROVIA, vivid Velvia, and ASTIA with its true-to-life skin tones
column3: PRO Neg.Std and PRO Neg.Hi, which are portrait modes based on professional colour negative film
column4: and Monochrome expression with three different filter effects as well as Sepia.&lt

column3: app, you can focus and trigger the camera release from your smart phone or tablet. The app not only lets you adjust focus, but also control settings like shutter speed, aperture, exposure compensation and ISO sensitivity.
The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

column9: One of the biggest advantages of this camera is the sheer shooting flexibility on offer. You can use additional lenses to take wide-angle, telephoto, or close-up shots to suit just about any situation. The shorter the focal length (measured in mm), the wider the view will be – the longer the focal length, the more telescopic the picture. With a selection of interchangeable lenses at your disposal, the creative possibilities are endless. &lt

43,johnlewis-dc1b35f7ccc96f356a90b3ead224f964,Olympus Tough TG-5 GPS Waterproof, Freezeproof, Shockproof, Dustproof Compact Digital Camera, 12MP, 4K UHD, 4x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, RAW Shooting, 3&quot
column25: Tough, technologically advanced and terrific, the Olympus Tough TG-5 is built to go anywhere, providing exceptional quality shots in the harshest of conditions. Happiest in the great outdoors, it&#x27
column26: s a superb camera to capture the classic moments of your most extreme adventures.&lt

column1: The TG-5 is as rugged and durable as they come, rigorously tested by Olympus. Shockproof from heights of up to 2.1 metres. Waterproof down to a depth of 15 meters (or equivalent pressure). Freezeproof down to -10°c. Crushproof up to 100kg. And with a dustproof body incorporating Anti-fog dual pane glass, it&#x27
column2: ll survive the wildest weathers and the harshest environments. The controls and dials are designed for ease-of-use, even when battling the elements.&lt

column1: A super-bright 25-100mm lens works in conjunction with a 12 megapixel sensor for excellent visual quality, handled with exceptional speed by a TruePic VIII image processor. Capture the action with consistent fine detail throughout the frame. It also shoots in RAW format for highest possible resolution and creative control. Lightening-quick AF technology keeps the focus sharp and the Aperture Priority Mode expands your focus range for amazing results.&lt

Capture the moving image in stunning detail. Spectacular 4K UHD resolution means smooth and hyper-detailed movie footage. Or choose Full HD 1080p res running at 120fps for superior slow motion sequences.&lt

Focus in on those tiny details not visible with the naked eye for incredible results. Particularly good for shooting nature, the TG-5 features a four mode Variable Macro system. Choose from Microscope, Microscope Control, Focus Bracketing or Focus Stacking mode for extreme close ups of wildlife, flora and fauna. Focus Stacking mode even works without additional software, which would normally be required in a camera of this class.&lt

The TG-5 is packed with a variety of shooting modes such as Underwater Mode optimised for underwater photography, and Pro Capture for capturing split-second movement. With these features, you can explore a world of heightened creativity.&lt

This Olympus camera features next-gen GPS with Landmark Recognition which pinpoints your location under 10 seconds. The e.Compass tracks barometric pressure, altitude and water depth as it navigates you home.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi and the OI.Share app, you can compose your image, control the camera settings and shoot remotely from your smart device. You’ll then be able to wirelessly upload and share your shots. Better still, the OI.Track app transfers GPS logs and shooting data direct to your Smartphone using the Field Sensor System, so you’ll always be able to keep an accurate record of your expeditions.&lt
