44,johnlewis-a719e9a2323c065a9eb9358a476801c3,Panasonic Lumix DMC-GX8 Compact System Camera With 12-60mm Lens, 5x Optical Zoom, 4K Ultra HD, 20.3MP, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED EVF, 3&quot
column6: Panasonic’s DMC-GX8 is a master-class of modern photography. The 20.3MP sensor is boosted by 4K Video, Wi-Fi and an innovative Dual Image Stabilisation system that will make your action shots look simply extraordinary. Get creative grip of your shots with the ultra-crisp OLED viewfinder and monitor, take it anywhere with the splash-proof design and snap anything you like with the versatile 12-60mm lens. Packed with state-of-the-art technology, this premium camera will be your complete suite of creativity.&lt

column1: Powered by a 20.3MP Live MOS sensor and quick-fire Venus processor, you’ll have the power of a professional in your hands. Not only will you shoot stunning snaps in low-light settings with the huge 25600 ISO, you’ll hone in on your target wherever you are with the lens’ 5x optical zoom. From sweeping landscapes to pin-sharp portraits, you’ll have it all straight out of the box.&lt

4K has four-times the pixels of HD and this camera lets you capture your memories in this ultra-crisp resolution. Shoot 4K video at 25fps to give your adventures even more detail and pop-out beauty. There’s even a 4K Photo function so you can grab stunning stills from a 4K video.&lt

Before or after you’ve taken your shot, this camera keeps you in the driver’s seat. The innovative Post-Focus mode lets you decide what’s in focus after you’ve taken the photo. This way, you can optimise any part of a picture when you’re reviewing a day’s haul. The OLED Live View Finder, which automatically turns on when you hold it up to your eyes, manual control rings and tiltable 3” OLED Touch Screen give you crystal-clear control as you line up your shots.&lt

With Panasonic’s awesome image stabilisation (IS) technology, you’ll never need to lug a tripod around again. The Body IS and Lens IS work at the same time to give unprecedented handshake control. This way, you’ll shoot stunning movement shots with absolutely no blur.&lt

Whether you’re on a night out or a hike, this camera is tough enough to tag along. Bolted with a magnesium alloy full diecast front/rear frame and a splash/dustproof body, you can take it anywhere.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi and one-tap NFC, this camera can connect to your smart phone or tablet wirelessly, letting you share your shots in an instant. You can even download the Panasonic Image App (iOS &amp
column2: Android) to control the DX80 remotely.&lt

column3: Digital Live MOS Sensor delivers professional power&lt
Exceptional stability with the Dual IS&lt

45,johnlewis-9000c623d85fc9fe4782258d30415557,Canon IXUS 285 HS Digital Camera Kit, Full HD 1080p, 20.2MP, 12x Optical Zoom, 24x Zoom Plus, Wi-Fi, NFC, 3&quot
column7: Canon’s IXUS 285 HS takes compact camera technology to another universe of pocket-sized brilliance. Snap stunning 20.2 megapixel shots, shoot crisp Full HD video and share memories wirelessly through Wi-Fi and NFC. Explore the boosted 12x optical zoom to get the right shot near or far, then experiment with the rich range of creative filters to express your arty side. Its DSLR-like CMOS sensor and added Auto-Modes like Creative Shot and Hybrid Auto make this complete photographic suite. This kit comes with a leather soft case and 16GB SD Card too, so you can keep your content safe and stored straight away.&lt

column9: Slim, compact and stylish, the IXUS 285 HS captures the superb quality and detailed images perfect for large-scale prints or creative cropping. This is down to the 20 Megapixel sensor, powerful DIGIC 4+ processor and professional-grade CMOS sensor. These all offer improved speed, performance and functionality. Furthermore, the Intelligent Image Stabiliser irons out blur to ensure ultra-crisp shots every time.&lt

Shoot every moment with ease using the flexibility of a 25mm wide zoom lens. Get nearer to distant subjects using the 12x optical zoom or get even closer, without any loss of quality, with the 24x ZoomPlus.&lt

Anyone can effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and automatically selects the right settings from 32 variables. Press the Auto button to return instantly to Smart Auto from any other mode. There’s also an Auto-Zoom mode, so you can frame the perfect shot in an instant. Use the Creative Shot mode to make the camera emphasise the subject and add special effects or the fun Hybrid Auto mode, which records two 4-second clips before each shot to give each day a short film! Press the Help button to get quick, easy-to-follow guidance on using your camera and its functions.&lt

With this camera’s Wi-Fi and NFC, you’ll never need to fumble with USB cables to share your snaps again. Just connect it to your smart device to get your content shared in an instant. You can even download the Canon Connect app (iOS &amp
column11: Android) on your smartphone or tablet, then link it to your IXUS 180 to access such great features as remote shooting or GPS. This camera also offers Image Sync – a service that lets you back-up images wirelessly to wherever you like, such as Flickr, Google Drive or your smartphone.&lt

column9: Share your captured moments with friends on the 7.5 cm (3”) LCD screen. You can experiment with picture settings such as brightness and colour intensity, and preview the results while framing using Live View Control.&lt

Instantly record high-quality Full HD movies (1080p) with optical zoom by pressing the dedicated movie button. Your footage stays steady too with the Dynamic Image Stabilizer. This way, you precious moments won’t be marred by shakiness. Furthermore, the camera’s nifty HDMI port lets you share such content at the highest quality.&lt

Experiment and have fun with a range of creative modes such as Fish-eye Effect, Super Vivid, Fireworks or Monochrome. Miniature Effect makes scenes in stills or movies look like miniature scale models, giving loads of fun!&lt

The Face Detection feature detects multiple faces in a single frame and ensures they stay in focus, so that you can capture great shots of friends. It ensures they’re captured with optimum brightness and skin tones are natural in all lighting conditions.&lt
Eco Mode reduces battery consumption so that the camera can last longer without needing to be recharged. This makes it great for day trips as you&#x27
column10: ll be able to capture more shots with a single charge.&lt

46,johnlewis-738480d7c9e1858ddc058afa89dccd0b,Canon EOS M5 Compact System Camera with EF-M 15-45mm IS STM lens, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, NFC, 3.2&quot
column10: LCD Tiltable Touch Screen with Lens Mount Adapter",cameras,pound,979.00,Canon,,True,"&lt
column12: Canon’s EOS M5 is a distillation of the best of the brand’s compacts and DSLR cameras. The M5 brilliantly combines the best of both worlds, giving you the quality and speed of a DSLR, housed in the smaller body of a mirrorless compact system camera. Superb image quality. Amazing autofocus and response time. Full HD movies. And all within a comfortable, compact body with intuitive design that gives you full, easy control. The M5 makes a mighty companion to take with you everywhere in pursuit of the perfect shot.&lt

column9: The M5 is packed with expert Canon technologies to give you DSLR speed and quality in a much smaller body. The 24.2 Megapixel CMOS sensor captures the image with stunning clarity, superb dynamic range and low visual noise. It’s backed up with the power of the Digic 7 image processor which includes in-camera diffraction correction, improved noise reduction, and auto lighting optimizer. It utilizes 14-bit RAW format for highest quality reproduction and ease of editing.&lt

The M5 effortlessly records movies in full HD at 60 frames per second for breathtaking detail and a cinematic feel. The high frame rate means fast action is captured smoothly and yields great slow motion results. Exceptional autofocus tracks your subject with consistent precision, while Touch AF and STM (Stepping Motor) focusing technology offer dramatic focal transitions. In-camera 5 axis image stabilisation ensures your footage is steady (even when using non I.S. lenses) which gets further enhanced if using Digital Image Stabilisation compatible lenses. Manual Movie Mode gives you control over aperture, shutter speed and sound while rolling.&lt

Dual Pixel CMOS autofocus maintains DSLR-like speed and precision of tracking moving subjects. Keep up with the action with sustained 7 frames-per-second continuous shooting in RAW with tracking autofocus, or 9fps fixed focus. Start-up and camera response time of just 1 second apiece ensure the M5 is ready to react as quickly as you are.&lt

column10: s supplied with a Canon EF-M 15-45mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM lens for stunning detail and flexibility. Equally good for landscapes or portraits as well as capturing fast-paced movie action, this small, light and easy-to-carry lens has optical image stabilisation for pin-sharp clarity, and fast STM autofocus. The perfect versatile lens to get the best out of the M5.&lt

column3: Kickstart your push for professional photography with Canon’s highly-versatile DSLR. Packed with a high-grade CMOS sensor, top-range Intelligent Viewfinder and nifty wireless features, this camera will thrive in any scene. Crack awkward angles with the touchscreen monitor, hone in on the action with the lightning autofocus then shoot pin-sharp shots with the 24.2MP. This even comes with a powerful 18-135mm lens, letting you snap straight out of the box. Whether you’re an interested amateur or a seasoned specialist, this powerhouse camera would be a limitless outlet of your creativity.&lt

column9: Built to flex your imagination, the EOS 80D has all the state-of-the-art features to make your photos wonderful. The top-shelf APS-C CMOS sensor is packed with 24.2MP to give wide, super-crisp shots, while the broad 16000 ISO and Flicker Detection lets you shoot in low-light scenes with delightful detail. Buoyed by a DIGIC 6 processor and built-in flash, this powerful bit of kit has the versatility to keep up with whatever you want to snap, and pull off photo-after-photo with eye-popping brilliance.&lt

With this camera’s sophisticated auto-features, you don’t need to be an expert to deliver stunning shots. Its seamless 45-point autofocus system detects your subject and surroundings, then optimises the snap in seconds. This way, you’ll pull off professional pictures in an instant. Furthermore, its 7fps continuous shooting will let you capture split-second action then cherry-pick your favourite moments. While these hyper-responsive features make the camera accessible for beginners, experts can flick onto the manual setting to take more control. The power is in your hands.&lt

Canon’s included 18-135mm IS USM lens offers a huge range of creative shooting options. As the 8.3x optical zoom lets you zero in on far horizons, the large f3.5 – f5.6 aperture range is equally adept at handling landscape and portrait shots. To protect your pictures from handshake, this lens has a built-in image stabiliser that steadies blur and keeps your shots sharp. This way, you can leave your tripod at home and take handheld photos without fear of smudge. A highly flexible and powerful lens for getting the best out of the 80D.&lt

column11: There’s nothing more frustrating than a picture not coming out as you imagined it. Canon’s Intelligent Viewfinder keeps the craft in your hands with the 100% frame coverage and instant display of shot settings. So, you’ll be able tinker with your snap easily, and keep creative control throughout. Furthermore, as the crisp 3” touchscreen monitor can be twisted-and-turned, you’ll get into any awkward angle you can muster.&lt

column9: The EOS 80D’s Wi-Fi and NFC lets you share your images instantly. Post your best content onto social networking sites through Wi-Fi in an instant. Or, you can simply tap devices together to review and transfer media to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

Tap into your inner-Kubrick with this camera’s sophisticated film-making tool. In crisp 1080p, you can make smooth-action clips, add slow-motion effects and even play with a range of creative filters. The Autofocus system tracks moving subjects too, so you’ll keep the focus on what’s important. Other settings include the clip-quickening Timelapse mode and colour-popping HDR.&lt

column3: Powerful CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 processor&lt
High 16,000 ISO level gives staggering low-light results&lt
Intuitive Vari-Angle Touchscreen display lets you shoot from tough angles&lt
Wireless sharing through Wi-Fi and NFC&lt
The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

53,johnlewis-9b9029d28592dd6a30f9ddc3c60a112f,Nikon DX D500 Digital SLR Camera With 16-80mm VR Lens, 4K Ultra HD, 20.9MP, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth/NFC, 3.2&quot
column103: Nikon’s fleeting DX flagship is a powerful all-rounder with professional capabilities. Its rugged body is filled with a top-spec CMOS sensor, sky-high ISO levels for exceptional low-light shooting and state-of-the-art Smart sharing features.  Shoot super-sharp 4K video at lightning speed, get in tight angles with the tilting touch screen and shoot what you want right away with the bundled 16-80mm lens. The D500 is an extraordinary bit of kit that will give you free rein to snap anything and everything with magnificent clarity – whether it close-up portraiture, high-octane sports or distant wildlife.&lt

column1: Channel your imagination through the D500’s mighty body. As its large 23.5mm x 15.7mm CMOS sensor captures startling depth and detail, the 20.9MPs will give your photos a pin-sharp finish. Fuelled by the EXPEED 5 image processor, you’ll snap at rapid speeds and get the guile of the moment every time. This is topped off with a zippy 10fps shooting speed and rich 1/8000-30 second shutter speed range, so your creative freedom has no limits.&lt

Nikon’s brand-new Multi-CAM 20K autofocus (AF) system delivers 153 AF points and 99 cross-type points. This means that more areas of the image are honed in on and sharpened, giving all-over clarity perfect for sweeping landscape shots.&lt

The D500 has an incredibly-high 51200 ISO, letting you shoot stunning shots at night or in low-light settings. This can even be expanded to Lo 1 and Hi 5 (50 – 1,640,000 ISO equivalent), giving simply glorious results. This way, your shots won’t be ruined when the sun goes go down, letting you flex your creativity 24 hours a day.&lt

This Nikon’s first DSLR to let you shoot films in 4K Ultra HD. This resolution, with four-times the pixels of Full HD, captures moments with insanely crisp and cinematic results. Recording at up to 30fps, motion has the super-smoothness perfect for sports clips. There’s also a built-in interval timer and 4K UHD time-lapse function, letting you craft spectacular sped-up movies.&lt

You’ll start snapping straight out of the box with the bundled 16-80mm DX NIKKOR lens. The 5x zoom is perfect for wildlife shooting, while the rich f/2.8 - 32 aperture range gives beautiful background blur to make subjects pop-out in portraits or sweeping sharpness in landscape shots. With other clever add-ons like the image stabilising Vibration Reduction, this lens is the perfect professional curtain-raiser for your photographic adventures.&lt

Once you’ve snapped a stunning shot, you can share it with your friends in an instant with the built-in Wi-Fi or Bluetooth. This SnapBridge functionality lets you hook up your smart device in an instant, speeding up wireless photo transfer. To make it even faster, the D500’s Near Field Communication (NFC) lets you link the camera to your device by simply tapping it.&lt

If you’re looking to get your angle just right, it can be a strain to stretch and kneel around your subject. Nikon’s 3.2” touch screen monitor tilts so you can snap high and low angles with remarkable ease. Adjust its position to snap close-ups of budding flora, sweeping over-the-top crowd shots or thrilling sports snaps. This way, your creativity won’t be hampered by discomfort.&lt

Take your D500 anywhere with its sturdy and hardy build. Encased in magnesium alloy and carbon fibre materials with dust and water-drop resistance, this ergonomic DSLR can tackle the toughest environments.&lt

column3: Powerful CMOS sensor and all-new EXPEED 5 image processor&lt
Huge 51200 ISO makes low-light shooting a pleasure&lt
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and NFC connectivity makes wireless sharing seamless.&lt
Shoot videos in incredible 4K Ultra HD detail&lt
Comes with a versatile 16-80mm DX NIKKOR Zoom lens&lt
The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

column6: s G80 is the perfect camera for keeping up with you on life’s adventures. State-of-the-art 4K photo capability is ideal for capturing life on the move, while Dual Image Stabilisation captures crisper, clearer images in a fast-moving environment. Shoot video in stunning 4K, or take super-sharp images in fine detail, with its 16 megapixel sensor. With an OLED Live Viewfinder, a vari-angle touch screen, and a dust-proof, weather-sealed body, you can take amazing shots, from any angle, in any condition.&lt

column1: With 4K Photo you can select an individual frame from a 30 fps video sequence, and save it as a single high resolution image. It’s ideal for capturing unmissable fast-moving action and selecting the single perfect shot later. Simply shoot, select and save.&lt

The G80 features 5-axis Dual Image Stabilisation, steadying both body and lens to compensate and correct handshake. So no more blurry images. It works in wide and telephoto photography, and for movies, including 4K.&lt

The amazing Post Focus feature lets you review an image and select the area you’d like to be pin sharp simply by touching it, even after you’ve taken the photo. With Focus Stacking, you can select numerous focus points in the same picture. And multiple Autofocus modes allow for a huge number of creative options.&lt
A 16-megapixel Digital Live MOS Sensor with low pass filter captures your subject with stunning clarity, so your images are finessed with fine detail, wherever and whatever you are shooting.&lt

At 4 times the resolution of Full HD, the G80 captures the moving image in breathtaking 4K detail. A resolution of 3840 x 2160 ensures you get every twist and turn of the action, and future-proofs your work as 4K becomes standard.&lt
Boasting 2360k-dot high resolution, the G80’s OLED live viewfinder with 0.74x (35mm camera equivalent) magnification allows you to frame the perfect shot and capture everything.&lt
A 1040k dot 3” touch screen is fully adjustable so it’s easy to monitor your work and shoot from all angles.&lt

Use full manual control to show off your creativity, or let the camera do the hard work for you by using Creative Shot mode. This will automatically take six of the same picture and apply a range of effects and filters to five of them so that you can see the different results. 56,johnlewis-c875041d53dfddb2b8bab049dc770e50,Canon EOS M5 Compact System Camera with EF-M 18-150mm IS STM lens, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, NFC, 3.2&quot
column6: Canon’s EOS M5 is a distillation of the best of the brand’s compacts and DSLR cameras. The M5 brilliantly combines the best of both worlds, giving you the quality and speed of a DSLR, housed in the smaller body of a mirrorless compact system camera. Superb image quality. Amazing autofocus and response time. Full HD movies. And all within a comfortable, compact body with intuitive design that gives you full, easy control. The M5 makes a mighty companion to take with you everywhere in pursuit of the perfect shot.&lt

column9: The M5 is packed with expert Canon technologies to give you DSLR speed and quality in a much smaller body. The 24.2 Megapixel CMOS sensor captures the image with stunning clarity, superb dynamic range and low visual noise. It’s backed up with the power of the Digic 7 image processor which includes in-camera diffraction correction, improved noise reduction, and auto lighting optimizer. It utilizes 14-bit RAW format for highest quality reproduction and ease of editing.&lt

The M5 effortlessly records movies in full HD at 60 frames per second for breathtaking detail and a cinematic feel. The high frame rate means fast action is captured smoothly and yields great slow motion results. Exceptional autofocus tracks your subject with consistent precision, while Touch AF and STM (Stepping Motor) focusing technology offer dramatic focal transitions. In-camera 5 axis image stabilisation ensures your footage is steady (even when using non I.S. lenses) which gets further enhanced if using Digital Image Stabilisation compatible lenses. Manual Movie Mode gives you control over aperture, shutter speed and sound while rolling.&lt

Dual Pixel CMOS autofocus maintains DSLR-like speed and precision of tracking moving subjects. Keep up with the action with sustained 7 frames-per-second continuous shooting in RAW with tracking autofocus, or 9fps fixed focus. Start-up and camera response time of just 1 second apiece ensure the M5 is ready to react as quickly as you are.&lt

It’s supplied with a Canon EF-M 18-150mm f/3.5-6.3 IS STM lens for stunning detail and a huge range of creative shooting options. The ideal ‘all-in-one’ lens for the M5, it has 4-stop optical image stabilisation for pin-sharp stills and video, and 8.3x optical zoom for zeroing in on far horizons. A 7 bladed circular aperture is ideal for reproducing smooth background blur to make your subject stand out, it’s adept at handling low light conditions, and its compact size makes it easily transportable. A versatile and powerful lens that’s perfectly matched to the M5.&lt

Camera operation is intuitive and instinctive with customisable controls. The high resolution (approx. 2.36 million dots) OLED electronic viewfinder allows you to frame the perfect shot, with pin-sharp detail right to the edge of the frame. And a mighty 120fps refresh rate effortlessly relates the fastest action.&lt

column4: Canon’s EOS M5 is a distillation of the best of the brand’s compacts and DSLR cameras. The M5 brilliantly combines the best of both worlds, giving you the quality and speed of a DSLR, housed in the smaller body of a mirrorless compact system camera. Superb image quality. Amazing autofocus and response time. Full HD movies. And all within a comfortable, compact body with intuitive design that gives you full, easy control. The M5 makes a mighty companion to take with you everywhere in pursuit of the perfect shot.&lt

column9: The M5 is packed with expert Canon technologies to give you DSLR speed and quality in a much smaller body. The 24.2 Megapixel CMOS sensor captures the image with stunning clarity, superb dynamic range and low visual noise. It’s backed up with the power of the Digic 7 image processor which includes in-camera diffraction correction, improved noise reduction, and auto lighting optimizer. It utilizes 14-bit RAW format for highest quality reproduction and ease of editing.&lt

The M5 effortlessly records movies in full HD at 60 frames per second for breathtaking detail and a cinematic feel. The high frame rate means fast action is captured smoothly and yields great slow motion results. Exceptional autofocus tracks your subject with consistent precision, while Touch AF and STM (Stepping Motor) focusing technology offer dramatic focal transitions. In-camera 5 axis image stabilisation ensures your footage is steady (even when using non I.S. lenses) which gets further enhanced if using Digital Image Stabilisation compatible lenses. Manual Movie Mode gives you control over aperture, shutter speed and sound while rolling.&lt

Dual Pixel CMOS autofocus maintains DSLR-like speed and precision of tracking moving subjects. Keep up with the action with sustained 7 frames-per-second continuous shooting in RAW with tracking autofocus, or 9fps fixed focus. Start-up and camera response time of just 1 second apiece ensure the M5 is ready to react as quickly as you are.&lt

Camera operation is intuitive and instinctive with customisable controls. The high resolution (approx. 2.36 million dots) OLED electronic viewfinder allows you to frame the perfect shot, with pin-sharp detail right to the edge of the frame. And a mighty 120fps refresh rate effortlessly relates the fastest action.&lt

Seamless connection with your smart devices is built in. Bluetooth low energy technology maintains a constant link with your phone or tablet, meaning full Wi-Fi is easily activated, for easy sharing of your image and movie data. Android devices link instantly with one touch NFC connection.&lt

column132: Capture your favourite moments in 4K with the Panasonic LUMIX DMC-FZ2000 Bridge Camera. Its state-of-the-art lens makes it possible to take in the landscape or close in on your subject without losing any detail. The OLED live viewfinder will keep your shot on screen, even when the eye is not focusing in on the centre. And its ability to shoot in any light condition makes this a versatile camera which you can take with you on your next big adventure.&lt

column9: Boasting a F2.8-4.5 24-480cm LEICA DC Vario-ELMARIT lens, the DMC-FZ2000 delivers a high optical performance for both your video and photos. The lens system features an inner zoom structure with guide-pole mechanism. This makes for smooth, stable zooming and dramatically suppresses image shift. A coreless DC motor also enable slow continuous zooming from spans from 24mm wide-angle to 20x optical zoom. And catching up with sudden changes of brightness is a galvanometer drive iris which assures seamless control during zooming.&lt

column1: Equipped with the capability to record in 4K and ultra high bitrate Full HD, you&#x27
column2: ll be able to shoot incredible moments as they unfold. A resolution of 3840 x 2160 ensures you get every twist and turn of the action, and future-proofs your work as 4K becomes standard. Better still, 4K PHOTO technology allows you to capture the perfect moment in 30fps and select your best still after shooting. With this mode, moments become truly unmissable.&lt

column1: The Post Focus feature lets you review an image and select the area you’d like to be pin sharp simply by touching it, even after you’ve taken the photo. And with Focus Stacking you can combine multiple focal planes within the same image for perfectly sharp clarity across the whole frame.&lt

column9: The DMC-FZ2000 features a large 1-inch 20.1 megapixel High Sensitivity MOS sensor which improves the signal-to-noise ratio. This makes capturing clear images with minimal disruption, even in low light, achievable. By allowing more light in, the sensor produces an impressive defocus with a shallow depth of field.&lt

A large OLED Live Viewfinder with 2,360k-dot allows greater visibility thanks to 10, 000:1 contrast and perfect framing under direct sunlight. Complete with 0.74x magnification and a wide viewing angle, you&#x27
column10: ll be able to see image details even when the eye is not focusing on the centre of the viewfinder.&lt

column3: The rear monitor is on hand to find unusual perspectives to shoot with the ability to tilt or swivel. What&#x27

64,johnlewis-47af22a001d644f5213fc219708c54dd,Panasonic Lumix DMC-LX15 Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 20.1MP, 3x Optical Zoom, 3” LCD Tiltable Touch Screen, Black",cameras,pound,499.00,Panasonic,,True,"&lt
column24: For a compact camera that fits into your palm, Panasonic’s LX15 is equipped with an extremely fast lens. Combined with a 1-inch sensor it gives you amazing creative control over your photography. With 4K video you can shoot incredibly detailed movies, while the 4K Photo, Post Focus and Focus Stacking features ensure you capture the perfect high quality still. With direct, intuitive controls and a tiltable monitor for flexibility, the LX15 is a supremely sleek and finely featured premium compact.&lt

column1: The LX-15 boasts a large sensor for shooting life in stunningly vivid detail. And because the 1-inch, 20.1 megapixel High Sensitivity MOS sensor captures more light, it helps to produce a rich bokeh effect. Backed up with the Venus Engine processor, the camera achieves maximum ISO12800 (extended ISO25600) to record a high quality image normally beyond the reach of compacts.&lt

At the heart of all photography is the lens and the LX-15 is equipped with a fast and crystal-clear 24-72mm Leica lens. It lets in more light and copes brilliantly in low lighting environments. An impressively capable lens for such a small camera, it’s perfectly equipped to capture life in all its beauty.&lt

The LX-15 puts you in easy control. An aperture ring gives you direct control over aperture size, while the rear dial and control ring give you intuitive management of shutter speed, zoom and focus. And you can customise settings to handle your preferred shooting options.&lt

With a resolution of 3840 x 2160, 4K Video captures four times as much detail as Full HD, so whether shooting, watching or editing your movies, the level of detail is stunning. With 4K Photo you can select an individual frame from a 30 frame-per-second video sequence, and save it as a single high resolution image. It’s ideal for capturing unmissable fast-moving action and selecting the perfect shot later. Simply shoot, select and save.

The Post Focus feature lets you review an image and select the area you’d like to be pin sharp simply by touching it, even after you’ve taken the photo. And with Focus Stacking you can combine multiple focal planes within the same image for perfectly sharp clarity across the whole frame.&lt
The 3 inch, 1040k dot LCD touch screen on the rear of the body angles upwards by 180 degrees. So with that level of flexibility you can take the shot from any angle. And it’s perfect for selfies
column2: as soon as you flip up the monitor, the camera automatically enters optimal selfie mode.&lt

65,johnlewis-efaab069c2a355bff04bb985c0cbb8c6,Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ1000 Bridge Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 20.1MP, 16x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED Viewfinder, 3&quot
column5: re looking for an uncompromising DSLR replacement, check out the Lumix FZ1000. Featuring a large 1-inch sensor and a new bright LEICA lens with 16x optical zoom, it brings everything up close with premium image quality. Choose photo or video recording in crisp 4K resolution to capture the world around you in a its natural beauty.&lt

column9: Besides its incredibly detailed 4K video recording capability the new FZ1000 is also proposing a new way of photo creation. 4K PHOTO allows you to extract a 3840x2160 8 Megapixel equivalent still image from the 4K video footage so you can photograph the spur-of-the-moment which is often missed in still image photography.&lt
The incorporated HYBRID O.I.S.+ with 5-axis correction enables blur-free one-handed video recording. It detects and compensates for the camera&#x27
column10: s 5 types of movement – horizontal, vertical, axis of rotation, vertical rotation and horizontal rotation. The Level Shot Function of the FZ1000 detects the image&#x27
column11: s horizontal line and maintains it even if the camera is tilted.&lt

column9: The FZ1000 boasts a 2.359K-dot OLED LVF (Live View Finder) that assures stable framing and superb visibility even at high magnification and under strong sunlight. The OLED display achieves high-speed response with minimum time lag while enhancing the resolution, as well as 10,000:1 high contrast for superior color reproduction. A free-angle 921K-dot LCD also enables artistic framing.&lt

column43: Tailored for beginners and powerful enough for the pros, the Canon EOS 1300D is an top-notch DSLR for anyone who wants to push their abilities further. The powerful CMOS sensor absorbs more detail in every shot while the broad ISO range gives you the freedom to take natural looking low light photos. Full HD recording delivers high quality videos at a push of a button, while the Wi-Fi and NFC make sharing your content immensely easy. This camera comes with a versatile 18-55mm IS lens too, so you can get shooting right out of the box.&lt

column9: Shoot photos and video with a quality and character all of their own. 18-megapixel images from the EOS 1300D are packed with detail and are large enough to be printed at sizes up to A2+. Videos have a professional look and feel that looks great played back on your home HDTV.&lt

When you compose a photograph using the EOS 1300D the camera analyses the scene too, looking for brightness, colour and the presence of movement and faces. This information is used to set the most appropriate camera settings for the scene, whether it’s a detail-packed landscape or fast-moving action. A built-in Feature Guide, and supporting app, help you learn more about your camera whenever you want.&lt

column11: An optical viewfinder allows you to compose and anticipate your shot, so you’ll always be ready to capture the emotion behind the moment. With its friendly controls that are instinctive to use, and a large 3-inch LCD screen for image review, the EOS 1300D is a joy to use.&lt

column11: White to Toy Camera and Fish Eye effect.&lt

column9: Keep subjects looking sharp by placing them underneath one of the EOS 1300D’s nine focusing points. These are spread out across the viewfinder, letting you place your subject either in the middle of the frame or off-centre, for a more interesting composition.&lt

The EOS 1300D’s Wi-Fi and NFC lets you share your images instantly. Post your best content onto social networking sites through Wi-Fi in an instant. Or, you can simply tap devices together to review and transfer media to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

Canon’s included 18-55mm lens is an all-round treat that will get you going with fine precision. As the 3x optical zoom gets you closer to your subject wherever you are, the large f3.5 – f5.6 aperture range gives you beautiful landscape and portrait shots. To protect your pictures from handshake, this lens has a built-in image stabiliser that steadies blur and keeps your shots sharp. This way, you can leave your tripod at home and take handheld photos without fear of smudge.&lt

Tap into your inner-Kubrick with this camera’s sophisticated film-making tool. Shooting in detailed Full HD, the depth-of-field control keeps your subject in focus and background beautifully blurred.&lt

76,johnlewis-3c3f8af88ad55ddaa9c0d398bec32298,Fujifilm X-A10 Compact System Camera with XC 16-50mm OIS Lens, HD 1080p, 16.3MP, Wi-Fi, 3” Tiltable LCD Screen, Silver",cameras,pound,299.00,Fujifilm,,True,"&lt
column3: With quality retro design, the X-A10 is a feature packed compact system camera that brings you superb Fujifilm image quality, Full HD video and a huge versatility of shooting styles. It’s equipped with a perfectly suited lens, and button functions can be customised to tailor operation to your own ease of use. The 180° tilting screen means it’s just as good for selfies as normal shots, while Wi-Fi connectivity makes sharing your pictures instantly a breeze.&lt

column1: A 16.3 megapixel APS-C sensor combines with the image processing engine for the excellent image quality that Fujifilm are renowned for. Fujinon lenses offer ultimate image resolution, combining with Fujifilm’s own colour reproduction technology for premium quality pictures in any shooting condition. The X-A10 offers Fujifilm’s advanced skin tone reproduction capability so it’s particularly good for portraits. Additionally, the pop-up flash supports the Super Intelligent Flash system which automatically adjusts to light the scene in the most appropriate way.&lt

Using a slide and tilt mechanism, the 3” LCD screen is always 100% visible, even when lifted to a full 180 degree angle, so the X-A10 is perfect for selfies. Placing the screen in this position activates the eye detection autofocus, so it automatically enters selfie mode, and the grip is specially designed to be just as comfortable in self-portrait orientation as well as normal shooting.&lt

From wide angle to mid range telephoto, this 16-50mm lens offers a great range of focal lengths for a multitude of shooting styles. It easily focuses on subjects as close as 7cm to the lens so you can experiment with close up and macro photography. And Optical Image Stabilisation reduces camera shake in hand-held stills and videos, so your images are blur-free.&lt
With Film Simulation, you can choose from classic Fujifilm photo styles, and give your pictures varied colour and tone to suit the subject, just like pros did with film. There&#x27
column2: s standard PROVIA, vivid Velvia, and ASTIA with its true-to-life skin tones, two chrome expressions (Classic and Mono), as well as Sepia. Film Simulation mode can also be applied to Full HD 1080p video too.&lt

column1: Compact and lightweight, the X-A10 sports a classic retro design. Aperture, shutter speed and exposure are easily adjusted via two command dials and frequently used functions can be customised to standalone buttons, so no need to trawl through menu screens.&lt

column3: app, it’s easy to share your pictures instantly with your smart device. You can focus and trigger the camera release from your phone or tablet, and even adjust the focus and control settings like shutter speed, aperture, exposure compensation and ISO sensitivity. And with Wi-Fi connectivity it’s easy to send your pictures straight to your home computer.&lt
The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

column9: One of the biggest advantages of this camera is the sheer shooting flexibility on offer. You can use additional lenses to take wide-angle, telephoto, or close-up shots to suit just about any situation. The shorter the focal length (measured in mm), the wider the view will be – the longer the focal length, the more telescopic the picture. With a selection of interchangeable lenses at your disposal, the creative possibilities are endless. &lt

column27: The Canon EOS 5D Mark VI boasts a staggering 30.4 megapixel resolution and ultra-crisp 4K video recording, enclosed within a super sleek and sturdy magnesium alloy body. This comes with built-in Wi-Fi and NFC too, delivering state-of-the-art wireless functionality. This makes it the perfect DSLR choice for the passionate professional or amateur photographer.&lt

column1: Capture high-quality images that are full of detail with a 30.4 megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6+ image processor. Colours are bright but natural, and fine detail is preserved even in dark shadow areas and bright highlights. The EOS 5D Mark VI delivers superb picture quality whatever the lighting conditions. Keep shooting hand-held even after the sun goes down, thanks to an ISO 100–32,000 sensitivity range (extendable to ISO 102,400).&lt

Focus quickly and accurately, even on off-centre subjects, with a 61 point wide-area autofocus system. 41 cross-type points (five of which are extra sensitive double-cross type) ensure highly accurate tracking of moving objects. Keep up with the action at 7fps recording too, giving lightning quick reflexes.&lt

At four-times the resolution of Full HD, this 4K camera will give you unbelievable videos. Use manual controls and Canon’s comprehensive EF lens range to achieve cinematic visual effects. Give your video footage the soundtrack it deserves. The EOS 5D Mark VI records digital stereo sound at 48KHz and offers manual control over audio level. A standard 3.5mm mic socket enables the use of third-party microphones
column2: a headphone socket permits audio monitoring while recording.&lt

column1: Hook this camera up to your smart device through Wi-Fi and channel all your photos and videos wirelessly in an instant. You can also pair your device through one-tap NFC, where you simply tap it on the camera to get it linked.&lt
A magnesium chassis provides strength and durability without adding weight. Weather sealing offers protection against dust and moisture.&lt

column3: The X-T20 inherits many of the great features of its X-T2 big brother to bring you the superb image clarity and intuitive manual handling of a high-performing compact system camera. A top quality sensor, high speed shooting, sparkling 4K UHD video resolution and fast autofocus make it great for professional quality shots on-the-go. It&#x27
column4: s housed in a more compact, lighter body and finished with an OLED viewfinder and mechanical dials for hands-on control. This is a brilliantly capable camera for superior quality portable photography.&lt

column1: A 24.3MP X-Trans CMOS III APS-C sensor captures the image in stunning quality. Its highly random pixel array reduces moiré and false colours without the use of an optical low-pass filter. The X-Processor Pro engine, approximately four times faster than the previous model, delivers amazing colour reproduction and tone gradation for stills and videos with high ISO sensitivity and low visual noise, at amazing speed.&lt

The 2.36 million dot high definition electronic viewfinder lets you capture the shot exactly as you see it, automatically adjusting brightness for ease of viewing, and boasts a magnification ratio of 0.62x.&lt

Recording the moving image in either Full HD or spectacular 4K Ultra HD video means your videos will be of breathtakingly detailed quality. Film simulation modes such as monochrome and documentary options are available while filming, so no need for post-production.&lt

The power of the processing engine and improved algorithms combine to significantly improve the auto-focus capabilities of the X-T20 over the previous model. It has a larger high-speed and high-precision phase detection AF area, and features a host of autofocus presets to suit the style of shot.&lt

It’s supplied with a versatile 16-50mm zoom lens with maximum aperture f3.5 and a broad focal length ranging from 24mm wide angle to 76mm telephoto (35mm format equivalent). Lightweight and portable, it features fast and silent motor-driven autofocus and optical image stabilisation for reliably crisp handheld image capture. An ideal lens to get the very best out of the X-T20.&lt
The LCD screen tilts upwards and downwards so you can find the best angle and features touch control for ease-of use.&lt

Start-up time has been refined to just 0.4 sec. Working in tandem with the high-speed signal readout of the sensor, the processor reduces the shooting interval to 0.25 sec. and shutter time lag to 0.050 sec. so the camera is ready to react as fast as you, and you never miss the shot.&lt
With Film Simulation, you can choose from classic Fujifilm photo styles, and give your pictures varied colour and tone to suit the subject, just like pros did with film. There&#x27
column2: s standard PROVIA, vivid Velvia, and ASTIA with its true-to-life skin tones
column3: PRO Neg.Std and PRO Neg.Hi, which are portrait modes based on professional colour negative film
column4: and Monochrome expression with three different filter effects as well as Sepia.&lt

82,johnlewis-aabdd980a8b2c09f2337e9bf9e120c70,Canon EOS 80D Digital SLR Camera With 18-55mm Lens, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, NFC, 3&quot
column25: Kickstart your push for professional photography with Canon’s highly-versatile DSLR. Packed with a high-grade CMOS sensor, top-range Intelligent Viewfinder and nifty wireless features, this camera will thrive in any scene. Crack awkward angles with the touchscreen monitor, hone in on the action with the lightning autofocus then shoot pin-sharp shots with the 24.2MP. This even comes with a versatile 18-55mm lens, letting you snap straight out of the box. Whether you’re an interested amateur or a seasoned specialist, this powerhouse camera would be a limitless outlet of your creativity.&lt

column1: Built to flex your imagination, the EOS 80D has all the state-of-the-art features to make your photos wonderful. The top-shelf APS-C CMOS sensor is packed with 24.2MP to give wide, super-crisp shots, while the broad 16000 ISO and Flicker Detection lets you shoot in low-light scenes with delightful detail. Buoyed by a DIGIC 6 processor and built-in flash, this powerful bit of kit has the versatility to keep up with whatever you want to snap, and pull off photo-after-photo with eye-popping brilliance.&lt

With this camera’s sophisticated auto-features, you don’t need to be an expert to deliver stunning shots. Its seamless 45-point autofocus system detects your subject and surroundings, then optimises the snap in seconds. This way, you’ll pull off professional pictures in an instant. Furthermore, its 7fps continuous shooting will let you capture split-second action then cherry-pick your favourite moments. While these hyper-responsive features make the camera accessible for beginners, experts can flick onto the manual setting to take more control. The power is in your hands.&lt

Canon’s included 18-55mm lens is an all-round treat that will get you going with fine precision. As the 3x optical zoom gets you closer to your subject wherever you are, the large f3.5 – f5.6 aperture range gives you beautiful landscape and portrait shots. To protect your pictures from handshake, this lens has a built-in image stabiliser that steadies blur and keeps your shots sharp. This way, you can leave your tripod at home and take handheld photos without fear of smudge.&lt

There’s nothing more frustrating than a picture not coming out as you imagined it. Canon’s Intelligent Viewfinder keeps the craft in your hands with the 100% frame coverage and instant display of shot settings. So, you’ll be able tinker with your snap easily, and keep creative control throughout. Furthermore, as the crisp 3” touchscreen monitor can be twisted-and-turned, you’ll get into any awkward angle you can muster.&lt

The EOS 80D’s Wi-Fi and NFC lets you share your images instantly. Post your best content onto social networking sites through Wi-Fi in an instant. Or, you can simply tap devices together to review and transfer media to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

Tap into your inner-Kubrick with this camera’s sophisticated film-making tool. In crisp 1080p, you can make smooth-action clips, add slow-motion effects and even play with a range of creative filters. The Autofocus system tracks moving subjects too, so you’ll keep the focus on what’s important. Other settings include the clip-quickening Timelapse mode and colour-popping HDR.&lt

column3: Powerful CMOS sensor and DIGIC 6 processor&lt
High 16,000 ISO level gives staggering low-light results&lt
Intuitive Vari-Angle Touchscreen display lets you shoot from tough angles&lt
Wireless sharing through Wi-Fi and NFC&lt

83,johnlewis-ee74c89b8274c5934fc381ce8ec52c6b,Sony Cyber-shot RX-100 IV Camera, 4K, 20.1MP, 2.9x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED EVF, 3&quot
column6: The Sony RX100 IV enters a new world of super-speed shooting. Featuring a breakthrough in cutting edge functions including a 1.0-type stacked CMOS sensor, 40x super slow motion and Anti-Distortion Shutter, the pocket-sized camera holds super potential.&lt

column1: The DSC-RX100 IV sports an all new bright f/1.8-2.8 Carl Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T lens with 24-70mm zoom. This lens is perfect for portraits and macro shots with beautiful defocused backgrounds. A premium multi-layered T coating also dramatically reduces ghosting and flare caused by light reflection.&lt

Boasting the world’s first 1.0-type stacked CMOS image sensor with DRAM chip, 40x super slow motion and up to 1/32000 sec. Super-high-speed shutter is enabled. The extended circuit features a higher signal processing capacity and more than five times faster high-speed readout than conventional models.&lt

column3: Better still, the RX100 IV features the high-speed BIONZ X processor for more natural details, more realistic images, richer tonal gradations and lower noise while shooting photos and movies. And thanks to the new super-high-speed image sensor, the camera features accelerated readout speed that helps to achieve continuous shooting up to 16fps.&lt

column1: Capable of recording in 4K Ultra HD for up to five minutes, the RX100 IV is ideal for capturing memorable frames. Pro-grade XAVC S codec ensures beautiful footage with high bitrate so the recording is second to none, even when viewed on a Full HD TV.&lt

column3: The camera can even shoot high-quality still images of 17MP while recording a movie. The new Auto Dual Rec release function lets the camera automatically take the photographs in a choice off frequency release – high/standard/low settings.&lt

column1: View every scene in rich detail with the bright and retractable electronic viewfinder (EVF). The viewfinder delivers a high resolution equivalent to 2359k dots to display the subtlest details for precise composition. EVF eye piece optics are treated with ZEISS T coating to reduce unwanted reflections for a clear corner-to-corner visibility.&lt
Selfies and framing have never been easier with a 3” tiltable LCD screen. High and low positions are now in shooting distance which offers greater flexibility in capturing creative compositions.&lt

When the RX-100 IV is connected to a computer, you can use Remote Camera Control to capture pictures or change settings on the camera. Simply download the application of a version which supports your PC.&lt

column3: The first SQUARE format Instax camera, a hybrid of analogue and digital technology, gives you the best of both worlds. It combines the fun, style and immediacy of the self-printing instant with the creative power and editing control of digital photography. Capturing those once in a lifetime moments in stylish &#x27
column5: format, this fantastic instant allows you to edit and add creative features to your photos before printing. With superior image quality thanks to digital technology, the SQ10 lets you express your creativity ...in an instant.&lt

column1: Having a digital image sensor and digital processing tech improves the picture quality and allows editing features not normally possible in an instant. You can take brighter shots in low light conditions (e.g. indoors or at night), or shoot as close as 10cm away from the subject. 89,johnlewis-0ad9e7c4de528bce7c778576973a2ad7,"Canon EOS 80D Digital SLR Camera, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, NFC With 3&quot
column4: Kickstart your push for professional photography with Canon’s highly-versatile DSLR. Packed with a high-grade CMOS sensor, top-range Intelligent Viewfinder and nifty wireless features, this camera will thrive in any scene. Crack awkward angles with the touchscreen monitor, hone in on the action with the lightning autofocus then shoot pin-sharp shots with the 24.2MP. Whether you’re an interested amateur or a seasoned specialist, this powerhouse camera would be a limitless outlet of your creativity.&lt

column1: Built to flex your imagination, the EOS 80D has all the state-of-the-art features to make your photos wonderful. The top-shelf APS-C CMOS sensor is packed with 24.2MP to give wide, super-crisp shots, while the broad 16000 ISO and Flicker Detection lets you shoot in low-light scenes with delightful detail. Buoyed by a DIGIC 6 processor and built-in flash, this powerful bit of kit has the versatility to keep up with whatever you want to snap, and pull off photo-after-photo with eye-popping brilliance.&lt

With this camera’s sophisticated auto-features, you don’t need to be an expert to deliver stunning shots. Its seamless 45-point autofocus system detects your subject and surroundings, then optimises the snap in seconds. This way, you’ll pull off professional pictures in an instant. Furthermore, its 7fps continuous shooting will let you capture split-second action then cherry-pick your favourite moments. While these hyper-responsive features make the camera accessible for beginners, experts can flick onto the manual setting to take more control. The power is in your hands.&lt

There’s nothing more frustrating than a picture not coming out as you imagined it. Canon’s Intelligent Viewfinder keeps the craft in your hands with the 100% frame coverage and instant display of shot settings. So, you’ll be able tinker with your snap easily, and keep creative control throughout. Furthermore, as the crisp 3” touchscreen monitor can be twisted-and-turned, you’ll get into any awkward angle you can muster.&lt

The EOS 80D’s Wi-Fi and NFC lets you share your images instantly. Post your best content onto social networking sites through Wi-Fi in an instant. Or, you can simply tap devices together to review and transfer media to a Smartphone, Tablet or Canon Connect Station.&lt

Tap into your inner-Kubrick with this camera’s sophisticated film-making tool. In crisp 1080p, you can make smooth-action clips, add slow-motion effects and even play with a range of creative filters. The Autofocus system tracks moving subjects too, so you’ll keep the focus on what’s important. Other settings include the clip-quickening Timelapse mode and colour-popping HDR.&lt

91,johnlewis-a9192cd93a3571942c740182216c8913,Nikon D5600 Digital SLR Camera with 18-140mm VR Lens, HD 1080p, 24.2MP, Wi-Fi, Optical Viewfinder, 3.2&quot
column4: Nikon’s D5600 is a digital SLR camera that fuels your creative spirit, and makes it easy to share your most inventive works. Capture that fleeting moment of beauty, experiment with light and shadow, or shoot brilliantly detailed full HD movies from any angle with the highly adjustable and responsive touch screen. The D5600 gives you the full scope of DSLR photography in a compact, portable, and ergonomically-designed body. With great in-camera creative features, fast autofocus, SnapBridge connectivity, and the endless variety offered by interchangeable lenses, this is a powerfully capable and connected camera that will satisfy the most artistic photographic instincts.&lt

column1: The design of the D5600 centres you at the heart of the photographic experience. A high-quality optical viewfinder, relating an incredibly clear through-lens viewpoint, lets you frame distinctive compositions and block out light and distractions. With intuitive control, the command dial and multi-selector allow you to change settings while shooting. Or you can transpose controls to the large rear touch screen, all while looking though the viewfinder. A deep grip makes it a joy to handle and a monocoque carbon-reinforced shell makes it tough and lightweight enough to accompany you anywhere.&lt

A 24.2 megapixel DX format sensor captures the image in superbly crisp detail, rendering the finest textures or the widest natural scenes in pin-sharp clarity. Low-light is handled with ease thanks to an expanded ISO sensitivity of 6400 in Night Landscape mode. The EXPEED 4 engine processes the image with superior speed and visual noise reduction, even at high ISOs.&lt

Equipped with super-sharp autofocus, the D5600 will catch everything, locking on to a moving subject and retaining focus. 39 individual focus points give wide AF coverage of the frame, while 9 cross-type sensors enhance accuracy. And when the action’s fast, it can shoot at 5 frames per second so you won’t miss that perfect moment.&lt

Shoot the moving image in fine clarity with the D5600, capturing the action in impressively detailed Full HD 1080p resolution. Continuous Live View autofocus ensures the subjects stay sharp and crisp, while the Time-Lapse movie feature allows you speed up your footage to transform the ambient motion of the natural world, or a bustling crowd scene, into a dramatic high-speed sequence.&lt

A brilliantly flexible 3.2” touch screen allows you to shoot from any angle. Flip, tilt or rotate it to find the perfectly framed shot, so however you need to hold the camera, you’ll always have a clear view. It responds as intuitively as a smart phone screen, with a tap of the screen to focus and shoot, or &#x27
column3: to zoom in and out. During viewfinder shooting, the Touch Fn function allows you to select focus point and adjust settings like aperture and auto sensitivity via the screen.&lt

column1: It’s supplied with an AF-S DX Nikkor 18-140mm F/3.5-5.6 G ED VR zoom lens for stunning clarity and a huge range of creative shooting options. The ideal ‘all-rounder’ lens for the D5600, it has Vibration Reduction to minimise camera shake, Nikon’s Silent Wave Motor to enable fast, quiet autofocus, and 7.8x optical zoom for zeroing in on far horizons. One ED glass element and one aspherical lens element ensure high resolution and contrast while minimising colour dispersion and aberrations, while its compact build makes it easily transportable. A versatile and powerful lens that’s perfectly matched to the creative power of the D5600.&lt

The D5600 features a host of in-camera creative options and effects. You can preview them in Live View and adjust intensity before starting to shoot, while enabling Picture Controls enables fine-tuning of settings like contrast and saturation to finesse that perfect image. And a retouch menu offers plenty of refining adjustments to the pictures you’ve already taken.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and NFC, it’s simple to share your photos and movies wirelessly, in an instant. Featuring SnapBridge, the D5600 can maintain a constant connection to your smart phone or tablet, to sync your shots as you take them.&lt

column3: The image stabilisation on this camera is Lens Only. &lt

column36: This 8-18mm wide angle lens achieves superb  LEICA quality resolution across the whole frame, with versatility from breathtaking ultra-wide landscapes to standard snapshots. Specifically designed for reliable and superior quality shooting in all weather conditions, this brilliantly nimble lens is the ideal lens for shooting large-scale nature out in the field.&lt

column3: Expand your horizons. Ultra Wide 16mm (35mm equivalent) capability allows you to capture stunningly wide vistas for dramatic large-scale imagery of the natural world and the elements.&lt

Incorporates 15 lens elements in 10 groups including 1 aspherical Extra-Low Dispersion lens, 3 aspherical lenses, 2 Extra-Low Dispersion lenses and 1 Ultra High Refactive Index Lens. The result is high resolution, high contrast imagery right to the very edges of the frame, while chromatic aberrations and distortions are reduced, and all from a light and compact design.&lt
Seven aperture blades create a circular diaphragm for beautifully smooth defocussing.&lt
Splash-proof, dust-proof and freeze-proof, this lens is specially designed to be tough and resilient enough to excel in outdoor field use, in all conditions.&lt
Nano Surface Coating has been applied to lenses within the system, reducing reflection and interference across the complete light spectrum. Great for shooting light sources in the dark.&lt
Advanced autofocus performance enables superb quality video footage. Focus transitions are smooth and near-silent, with a precision that makes hyper-detailed 4K resolution sparkle.&lt
This lens meets the strict quality standards set by LEICA Camera AG. It assures a quality of resolution, precision and distortion reduction for professional standard results.&lt

101,johnlewis-c73f7f77518f42c37fa4b6b8371c7586,Canon LEGRIA HF R806 Camcorder, HD 1080p, 3.28MP, 57x Advanced Zoom, Optical Image Stabiliser,  3&quot
column14: Discover new realms of creativity with Canon’s LEGRIA HF R806 camcorder. Explore its delightful Full HD resolution, mammoth zoom range and rich suite of creative modes to film cinema-standard footage. This state-of-the-art camcorder has an intuitive touch screen display and souped up image stabilisers to keep your work shake-free. Whether you want to capture precious home videos or become the next Stanley Kubrick, this versatile shooter would be a top-notch investment. The R806&#x27
column15: s maximum recording time has been increased over the previous model to 3 hours and 15 minutes.&lt

column1: This camcorder’s 1/4.85” CMOS sensor, DIGIC DV 4 and stunning HD resolution deliver vivid shots with rapid speed. Backed by a 1/2000 sec shutter speed, this super-powered tech will give you smooth, finely-detailed footage that you’ll be proud to call your own. The lens’ f1.8-f4.5 aperture range lets you adjust the subject/background too, giving you control over the focus of your shots.&lt

For a handheld camcorder, the HF R806’s zoom options are staggering. The 32x Optical Zoom, 1140x Digital Zoom and 57x Advanced Zoom let you capture your subject wherever you are. You can hone in on wildlife, get a better view of some sports action or go for a cinematic close-up, and keep up the shooting quality. Other features like the Zoom Framing Assist button make it easier-than-ever to make the most of Canon’s expansive zoom range. This accessible versatility will free you of any inhibitions when you work. &lt

If you don’t have time to set up your tripod, handheld shooting can do the trick, but results can be marred with shake. The HF R806’s built-in Optical and Intelligent Image Stabilisers work to iron this out and automatically deliver steady, blur-free footage. Such tech will make sure your shots are as crisp as they can be.&lt
Explore the HF R806’s rich range of features with this vibrant display. The intuitive touch screen can be tilted too, letting you adjust its angle while you’re on-the-move.&lt

If you want to inject your shots with a bit of flair, there’s a mass of exciting features to explore. These include the 0.5x speed slow motion, 2x – 1200x fast motion and cinema-look filters. You can even adjust  the variable speed during recording. This way, you can break the mould in your movie-making and flex your creativity fully. Furthermore, the advanced Baby Mode automatically sorts footage of up to three children into albums, so you can keep tabs of your precious home movies.&lt

It’s a shame when stunning shots are let down by not-so-stunning sound. With this camcorder’s Audio Scene Select mode, it will automatically optimise audio settings so your work is both aurally and visually brilliant.&lt

column3: 32x Optical Zoom, 57x Advanced Zoom and 1140x Digital Zoom give exceptional shooting range&lt
1.4.85” CMOS sensor and rapid DIGIC DC 4 processor give professional quality&lt
Zoom Framing Assist mode keeps you in control of your shots &lt
Image Stabilisers keep your footage blur-free&lt
Baby Mode automatically organises your children’s footages, so your family videos are kept together.&lt
Its vari-angle touch screen display make the functions simple to navigate&lt
The fluid Audio Scene Select mode keeps the sound crisp, whatever your shooting&lt

103,johnlewis-da39ca445a53ae4567e11210d4f3f923,Sony CX625 Handycam With Exmor R CMOS Sensor, Full HD 1080p, 9.2MP, 30x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, NFC, 3&quot
column17: Put the power of a professional in your hands with Sony’s spectacular CX625. Shoot seriously-smooth footage with its DSLR-like CMOS sensor, crisp Full HD and all-capturing wide-angle lens. Equipped with a large 30x optical zoom, you’ll hone in on precious moments wherever you’re standing and get fabulous footage to last a lifetime. Once you’ve shot something wonderful, you can share it in an instant too with this camcorder’s state-of-the-art Wi-Fi and NFC. Whether you’re making family, sports or creative footage, Sony’s tour-de-force will knock your socks off.&lt

column1: Sitting behind the lens is a large Exmor R CMOS sensor. This powerful asset makes images pin-sharp and deeply-detailed, while the BIONZ X processor ensures rapid recording. These blend beautifully with Sony’s G wide-angle lens, which lets you dip down to 26.8mm and capture everything in front of you. Complemented by a 30x optical, and 350x digital, zoom, you’ll have the tools to shoot anything with top-quality. Such versatility is perfect for a rich and varied family life.&lt

This camcorder has built-in image stabilising to free your footage of blur from hand-shake. Sony’s Balanced Optical SteadyShot tech evens out shake from five different directions, so your shots will be smooth in the rockiest conditions. This way, you can leave the tripod at home and film like a pro.&lt

Tap into the heart of every shot with the CX625’s whip-smart autofocus (AF). Sony’s fluid Fast Intelligent AF uses contrast-detection to latch onto fast movements. This way, sports and action footage will have even more pop-out brilliance. Furthermore, the Intelligent Auto detects the type of shot (up to 180) you’re going for and optimises settings depending on the scene – even at night. So, you won’t need to tinker with menus to adjust the shot to your surroundings, the camcorder will do it for you.&lt

With its high-grade still imaging, the CX625 can be your camera as well as your camcorder. Get stunning 9.2MP snaps and fill your albums with memories of resplendent quality. Use the Dual Record mode to save stills as you shoot HD video, or snap a series of photos to put together in a time-lapse movie. With such adaptability, this does far more than shoot videos.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi and NFC, you’ll shoot and share with seamless ease. Hook up the camcorder to your smart device and use it as a remote viewfinder, or share your content at the touch of a button. Just tap your NFC-enabled phone or tablet on the CX625, then use the PlayMemories Mobile app (Android) to set-up sequences from otherwise unreachable angles. You can also live-stream events through USTREAM, so you can share special moments in real-time.&lt

Far too often, beautiful clips are let down by tinny sound. Sony makes sure that never happens with the 5.1 channel surround sound microphone. Taking in deep, rich audio, you’ll capture the atmosphere of each scene and enjoy engrossing surround-sound playback on your home cinema system. Also, with the My Voice Cancelling feature, the user’s voice is made less intense. This way, you can cheer on or talk to subjects without overwhelming the scene’s sound.&lt

Want to give your clip a smoky black-and-white effect? Or maybe a old-school sepia-style filter? Whatever your vision, this camcorder’s built-in effects will let you add your personal touch without lengthy editing on a computer. There are seven creative effects (Partial Colour, Retro Photo, Soft High-Key, High Contrast Mono, Toy Camera, Pop Colour and Posterisation) to sink your teeth into, adding another dimension to your footage.&lt

column3: DSLR-like Exmor R CMOS sensor gives rich, crisp shots&lt
Lens’ 30x optical zoom and 26.8mm wide-angle view will take you anywhere&lt
Balanced Optical SteadyShot irons out blur from hand-shake&lt

column4: NFC enables seamless sharing and remote-controlling&lt

column17: Dive into an realm of rich colour, sharp clarity and dizzying detail with Sony’s 4K Ultra HD-ready FDR AX53 Handycam. Powered by an advanced Exor R CMOS sensor, this exceptional camcorder will make your home videos look like they came from Hollywood. 4K features four times the pixels as regular Full HD, giving eye-popping recording results. With Sony’s Balanced Optical Steadyshot function, 5.1ch microphone and Wi-Fi compatibility, the FDR AX53 is an awe-inspiring feat for amateur film-makers.&lt

column1: Break new ground in video vibrancy with 4K Ultra HD. With 3840 x 2160 pixels quadrupling Full HD’s 1920 x 1080, the resolution has detail you’ll scarcely believe. 4K opens up other features like Trimming Playback, where you select a specific portion of a clip and play it in Full HD, and Super-Scaled Full HD Playback, where 4K content is down-graded to sparkling Full HD on non-4K TVs.&lt

With its cutting-edge Exmor R CMOS Sensor, you’ll get sumptuous image clarity, reduced noise in dark settings and soft background defocusing for sharper focus on the subject. Beside that is the lightning-fast BIONZ X image processor, which delivers vibrant colours and lifelike textures. Its 5.1ch microphone gives brilliantly balanced sound that would embrace the atmosphere of your scene.&lt
As well as being fine-tuned for 4K, the 29.8mm Wide-Angle ZEISS Vario-Sonnar T Lens gives 10x optical zoom and a focal range large enough to capture sweeping landscapes with delightful detail.
This doesn’t just record crisp video, it also takes high-grade pictures. The 8.29 megapixel capture will give your pictures astounding depth&lt

Sony’s advanced Balanced Optical SteadyShot technology ensures blur-free and steady footage, so you can leave your tripod at home. Even in shaky situations like car rides, the camcorder will level out the footage for a crisply-level clip. Other features like the Auto Wind Noise Reduction, which eliminates wind noise for better outdoor shooting, Lock-on Autofocus for subject tracking, and My Voice Cancelling to clamp down on behind-camera noise, will give your videos incredible quality.&lt

This feature-rich camcorder will be your platform for creativity of all kinds. Use NIGHTSHOT for superb night shooting, trace every second of a scene with a Motion Shot Video or analyse your swing with the Golf Shot mode.

Link up your camcorder to the internet and share your content instantly. You can live-stream videos through Ustream, so your family and friends can watch whatever event that you’re recording in real time.&lt
At just 635g, this little and lightweight item will be simple to carry around on trips or days out. It stands as one of the most mobile 4K camcorders on the market.&lt

column3: Balanced Optical SteadyShot gives blur-free footage.&lt
EXOR R CMOS sensor and BIONZ X processor give lifelike colours and clarity.&lt
XAVC S format based on professional XAVC platform, ensuring high-grade results.&lt
8.29MP still image quality give brilliantly detailed photos.&lt
Xtra Fine 3” LCD Screen with WhiteMagic ensures a fine display.&lt
Edit your movies in the Highlight Movie Maker.&lt
Lightweight and compact shape is perfect to carry around.&lt

105,johnlewis-d0be554ebd4ad2f0cbb1bad173bbe27f,Panasonic HC-VXF990EBK 4K Ultra HD Camcorder, 8.29MP, 20x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, Cinema Effects &amp
column18: Get the footage of your dreams with Panasonic’s sublime camcorder. Blending beautiful 4K Ultra HD and the brand’s top-line optics with a host of cinema effects, this unit puts professional power in your hands. Topped by such features as the tilting EVF, 5-axis image stabiliser and state-of-the-art Wi-Fi, you’ll be amazed at what you can do. Whether you’re nature-watching, short-film producing or memory-capturing, the HC-VXF990EBK will deliver outstanding results.&lt

column1: Not only can you shoot in four-times the resolution of Full HD, you’ll create super-crisp images with Panasonic’s LEICA Dicomar lens. As the 8M sensor clamps down on distortion, the Crystal Engine 4K gives rapid processing speeds, making for a perfect storm of optical brilliance. The huge 20x optical zoom lets you hone in on your subjects, such as a faraway animal or sportsperson, without blur. Whatever you shoot, your results will look ready for the cinema.&lt

Before or after your shot, the editing options are extraordinary.  With post-zooming, you can zoom in on subjects after the shot’s taken while, with the post-panning, you can select the start and end points of the clip to pan. Use post-tracking to select a person for the camcorder to follow and, backed by Panasonic’s 5-axis image stabiliser, you can even iron out blur with the post-stabiliser feature.&lt
Have a clear view at any time of the day with Panasonic’s pro-grade Electronic Viewfinder (EVF). It features a slide-and-tilt mechanism too, so you can shoot with comfort on a tripod or by hand.&lt
Channel your inner-Kubrick with a host of stunning cinematic effects. Speed up or slow-down footage with the Slow &amp
column2: Quick Video feature, build suspense with the Dolly Zoom, load on the drama with the Slow Zoom. There&#x27
column3: s even an HDR Movie mode that blends two images to deliver a clip with added lustre and clarity. With all these features, it’s never been easier to make Hollywood-like movies.&lt

column1: Using Wi-FI, you can hook this camcorder up as many as 3 smartphones and record different angles. Once linked, each smartphone’s view is shown as a sub-window on the camcorder’s touch screen. This way, you’ll shoot a scene from multiple viewpoints.&lt

column3: Professional LEICA Dicomar Lens with 20x Optical Zoom&lt
Host of post-editing features such as pan-zooming&lt

column17: Discover new realms of creativity with Canon’s LEGRIA HF R86 camcorder. Explore its delightful Full HD resolution, mammoth zoom range and rich suite of creative modes to film cinema-standard footage. This state-of-the-art camcorder has Wi-Fi and NFC compatibility to make sharing easy, an intuitive touch screen display and souped up image stabilisers to keep your work shake-free. And with 16GB of internal flash storage there&#x27
column18: s plenty of room to save your work too. Whether you want to capture precious home videos or become the next Stanley Kubrick, this versatile shooter would be a top-notch investment.&lt

column1: This camcorder’s 1/4.85” CMOS sensor, DIGIC DV 4 and stunning HD resolution deliver vivid shots with rapid speed. Backed by a 1/2000 sec shutter speed, this super-powered tech will give you smooth, finely-detailed footage that you’ll be proud to call your own. The lens’ f1.8-f4.5 aperture range lets you adjust the subject/background too, giving you control over the focus of your shots.&lt

For a handheld camcorder, the HF R86’s zoom options are staggering. The 32x Optical Zoom, 1140x Digital Zoom and 57x Advanced Zoom let you capture your subject wherever you are. You can hone in on wildlife, get a better view of some sports action or go for a cinematic close-up, and keep up the shooting quality. Other features like the Zoom Framing Assist button make it easier-than-ever to make the most of Canon’s expansive zoom range. This accessible versatility will free you of any inhibitions when you work. &lt

Hook up this camcorder to your smartphone or tablet through Wi-Fi or one-tap NFC to shoot remotely. Get your scene from all sorts of awkward angles and ensure you capture your vision as it was intended. Furthermore, this makes sharing your films quick, easy and near-instant.&lt

If you don’t have time to set up your tripod, handheld shooting can do the trick, but results can be marred with shake. The HF R86’s built-in Optical and Intelligent Image Stabilisers work to iron this out and automatically deliver steady, blur-free footage. Such tech will make sure your shots are as crisp as they can be.&lt
With 16GB of internal flash memory you have plenty of space to store your movies. That&#x27
column2: s over eight hours in MP4 format, or over six hours in AVCHD. You can also store directly onto external hard disc. And you still have the option to save your masterpiece on SD card (not included).&lt

column1: Explore the HF R86’s rich range of features with this vibrant display. The intuitive touch screen can be fully tilted too, letting you adjust its angle while you’re on-the-move.&lt

If you want to inject your shots with a bit of flair, there’s a mass of exciting features to explore. These include the 0.5x speed slow motion, 2x – 1200x fast motion, cinema-look filters and fade and wipe. You can even adjust the variable speed during recording. This way, you can break the mould in your movie-making and flex your creativity fully. Furthermore, the advanced Baby Mode automatically sorts footage of up to three children into albums, so you can keep tabs of your precious home movies.&lt

It’s a shame when stunning shots are let down by not-so-stunning sound. With this camcorder’s Audio Scene Select mode, it will automatically optimise audio settings so your work is both aurally and visually brilliant.&lt

column22: s easy to carry around with you, but it has an extensive manual control which is intuitive and simple to use so you can customise settings according to the shooting conditions.&lt
column32: Balanced Optical SteadyShot controls the optical path from lens to sensor as one floating unit to effectively reduce camera shake and blur so that your recording is incredibly stable and your movies remain clear and smooth. Balanced Optical SteadyShot makes this Handycam up to 13x more effective at reducing camera shake than a camera using standard Optical Steadyshot.&lt
column42: Sony uses 4K technology to take your images up to a professional quality. The XAVC S format enables extended 4K high-bitrate recording of up to 100Mbps through clever digital compression, so you can capture movement without details in the shot becoming blurred or blocky.&lt
column46: The Handycam combines a 29.8mm ZEISS Vario-Sonnar T* lens, Exmor R CMOS sensor to absorb ample light even in low-light situations, and BIONZ X image processing engine to quickly transform data from the sensor into quality videos and photos.&lt
column56: Use Multi Camera Control to shoot from multiple angles by setting up and wirelessly connecting up to five cameras, using this camera as a control unit. You can then manage and edit all the footage using PlayMemories home software. This is a great way to shoot from multiple perspectives.&lt
column66: The camera includes features such as the Highlight Movie Maker which lets you share movies with transition effects and background music. Using USTREAM, you can live stream your footage so it can be watched online as it&#x27

column102: TomTom’s pocket-sized action camera blends pin-sharp 4K quality with a range of awesome on-the-move features. Not only can you make this camcorder waterproof with the included Dive Lens, you can use Wi-Fi and Bluetooth to edit and share your footage. Use the built-in sensors to measure the likes of speed and G-force, then charge it up quickly with the innovative Batt-stick design. Whether you’re a scuba diver or a cyclist, this state-of-the-art camcorder will keep tabs of all your epic moments.&lt

column1: With 16 megapixel stills and 4K or Full HD, 1080p frames, you’ll get unbelievably clear results. Additional features such as Time Lapse and Slow Motion will let you shoot stunning transitions like glowing sunsets from the peak and emphasize your biggest moments in smooth slow motion.&lt

Shake to share your edited highlights with the TomTom Bandit mobile app. Simply pair your TomTom Bandit Action Camera to the iPhone or Android app through Wi-Fi, and shake your phone for a ready-to-share edit of your highlights. The in-camera sensors – detecting Speed, G-force, Altitude, Acceleration, Rotation and more - mark big moments so you can find them easily again. Add music and data overlays, manually mark 6-second highlights and even share your work instantly on social networking sites.&lt

Make charging cables a thing of the past with TomTom’s clever Batt-Stick. Just slide it out and plug it directly into a computer or laptop’s USB port. This way, on-the-move charging has never been easier.&lt

Make your Bandit waterproof (to 40M) with the included Dive Lens, so you can make awesome underwater movies. The adventure pack also comes with a backpack mount, GoPro mount adapter, anti-rotation clip, microphone windshield and some basic surface mounts.&lt
