column6: Panasonic’s HC-V380 is an outstanding HD camcorder that can capture close-ups, group photos and landscapes from afar in dizzying detail. Its built-in Wi-Fi will revolutionise your recording, with such functions as Real Time Broadcasting and Remote Shooting. Other optic boosters like the top-notch image stabiliser, ultra-wide angle view and suite of creative controls will make your videos personal and blur-free.&lt

column1: This camcorder’s state-of-the-art MOS sensor packs in 2.5MP of movie resolution and 10MP of still photo resolution. This way, your shots will be pin-sharp and processed speedily.&lt

By hooking up this camcorder to your Wi-Fi, you can explore a rich range of fun features. Link up as many as 3 smartphones, then use up to 2 of them as recording sub-windows. These sub-windows can then be interchanged, letting you shoot from a whole new range of angles. Other Wi-Fi features include the app-driven Remote Shooting, Real Time Broadcasts on live-stream platform USTREAM, Baby Monitoring and Home Monitoring.&lt

The HC-V380 enables ultra-telephoto Intelligent 90x zoom shooting, from within a compact body. This powerful zoom brings faraway subjects closer so you can capture dynamic images that fill the whole frame.&lt

The HYBRID Optical Image Stabiliser+ uses 5-axis correction to clamp down on hand-shake in any situation, leaving your shots consistently sharp. Furthermore, the Level Footage function automatically corrects image tilt, so snaps are always straight. Tinker with the OFF, Normal and Strong settings to suit your situation.&lt

The 28mm wide angle function can fit more into your frame. This is especially useful if you want to record a group photo in a small room, which even works on close-ups. This makes it possible for the 2 channel zoom microphone to pick up the slightest sound, too.&lt
The HC-V380’s BSI sensor improves light sensitivity performance, letting you record easy-to-see, clear images in low-light locations.&lt

Shoot impressive video recordings that are matched to the situation with an array of filter effects. Choose from Miniature Effect, 8mm Movie, Silent Movie and Time Lapse Recording to capture the very best of the moment.&lt

column17: Capture life in amongst the action, in incredible 360° perspective, with Samsung’s Gear 360 2017 camera. It&#x27
column18: s compatible with Android, iOS, Windows and Mac, so you can pair up with practically any device. Or relive the action on your Gear VR Virtual Reality Headset for the total immersive experience. Live stream your 360 life to friends and family: with in-built Bluetooth and Wi-Fi it&#x27
column19: s never been easier to share your amazing footage on social platforms, or customise your content into a unique masterpiece with the Gear 360 app. With a new sleek and slim handheld design, and rugged build, it&#x27
column20: s an effortless and exhilarating joy to have the Gear 360 filming at the heart of your adventures, anywhere.&lt

column1: The Gear 360 2017 uses two Bright F2.2 lenses, front and rear, which each capture 180 degrees horizontally and vertically, creating a flawless 360° field of view in amazing clarity. And if you want a more conventional shot, you can still use one of the cameras on its own for a wide-angle video or still image. &lt

Armed with two CMOS sensors, 360° videos are shot in hyper-detailed 4K ultra high definition (4096 x 2048 resolution), so movies are stunningly realistic. And, at 15 megapixels, 360° still photos are brilliantly vivid.&lt

Able to pair with an expanded range of technology you can enjoy your footage on an Android (v5 or later) or iOS (v10 or later) smart device, a Windows PC, or Mac. Connect by Bluetooth and use Wi-Fi direct to transform a phone’s screen into a remote viewfinder, and to transfer your finished files.&lt
The 2017 model has been redesigned for supreme handheld use. At just 130g, it&#x27
column2: s lighter, smaller, and effortlessly portable, with a sleek and slim grip that makes it comfortable to capture the action anywhere. The grip also doubles up as a stand for a sturdy base for your shooting. Dust and splash resistant, it’s built for the outdoor life, so you can take it with you and record your adventures like never before.&lt

column6: Edit Amazing Moments with the Gear 360 App&lt

column1: Live streaming has never been easier
column2: link it up with your device, choose a social platform and share your amazing moments with friends and family. The Gear 360 app helps you turn your footage into a unique masterpiece. Choose from multiple viewing modes when taking a 360° video, and stretch and bend your content with ease. You can even create more depth or mix up the mood by adding logos, stickers or over 20 filters to your 360° photos. And it’s simple to convert your content into a standard video format when it’s ready to share. &lt

column5: The Samsung Gear 360 2017 is compatible with Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+, S7, S7 edge, Note5, S6 edge+, S6, S6 edge, A5 (2017), A7 (2017), Android 5.0 or later, iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 6s, 6s Plus, SE, iOS 10.0 or later&lt

column194: Have the power of a professional in your pocket with Panasonic’s super-zoom DMC-TZ80. Boasting 4K video, 18.1MP and extraordinary 30x optical zoom, this tiny package yields massive results. The brand’s crystal-clear LEICA lens is backed by a mighty MOS sensor so the depth-of-field is pin sharp, and the sophisticated Wi-Fi makes wireless control super-easy. With other features like the post-focus, HYBRID optical image stabiliser and intuitive Live View Finder, this camera is a sublime feat of portable photography.&lt

column1: The TZ80’s 1/2-3-type MOS sensor delivers delightful colour and clarity in any light. Filled with 18.1MPs, your snaps will be rich and beautiful from dusk till dawn. All of this power is channelled with rapid speed through the brand’s state-of-the-art Venus image processor. This way, the pocket-sized camera will supply luscious shots in an instant.&lt

column5: Tailor Your Shots With The LEICA Zoom Lens&lt

column1: With 30x optical zoom, 60x intelligent zoom and 4x digital zoom, you’ll get a crisp shot of your subject wherever you are. The lens’ f3.3 – 6.4 aperture range gives you space to experiment with background/subject separation too, letting you tailor your shot to landscapes or portraits. It also features the HYBRID Optical Image Stabiliser – using 5-axis correction to deliver crisp, blur-free video. Such super-powered flexibility will let you go as far as your creativity will take you.&lt

4K has four-times the pixels of HD and this camera lets you capture your memories in this ultra-crisp resolution. Shoot 4K video at 25fps to give your adventures even more detail and pop-out beauty. There’s even a 4K Photo function so you can give your stills the Ultra-HD treatment. &lt

Before or after you’ve taken your shot, this camera keeps you in the driver’s seat. The innovative Post-Focus mode lets you decide what’s in focus after you’ve taken the photo. This way, you can optimise any part of a picture when you’re reviewing a day’s haul. The 0.2” Live View Finder, which automatically turns on when you hold it up to your eyes, manual control rings and vivid 3” LCD Touch Screen give you complete control as you line up your shots.&lt
With built-in Wi-Fi, this camera can connect to your smart phone or tablet wirelessly, letting you share your shots in an instant. You can even download the Panasonic Image App (iOS &amp
column2: Android) to control the TZ80 remotely.&lt

118,johnlewis-2500b03597381c1983c8ca661792ceb1,Olympus Tough TG-5 GPS Waterproof, Freezeproof, Shockproof, Dustproof Compact Digital Camera, 12MP, 4K UHD, 4x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, RAW Shooting, 3&quot
column4: Tough, technologically advanced and terrific, the Olympus Tough TG-5 is built to go anywhere, providing exceptional quality shots in the harshest of conditions. Happiest in the great outdoors, it&#x27
column5: s a superb camera to capture the classic moments of your most extreme adventures.&lt

column1: The TG-5 is as rugged and durable as they come, rigorously tested by Olympus. Shockproof from heights of up to 2.1 metres. Waterproof down to a depth of 15 meters (or equivalent pressure). Freezeproof down to -10°c. Crushproof up to 100kg. And with a dustproof body incorporating Anti-fog dual pane glass, it&#x27
column2: ll survive the wildest weathers and the harshest environments. The controls and dials are designed for ease-of-use, even when battling the elements.&lt

column1: A super-bright 25-100mm lens works in conjunction with a 12 megapixel sensor for excellent visual quality, handled with exceptional speed by a TruePic VIII image processor. Capture the action with consistent fine detail throughout the frame. It also shoots in RAW format for highest possible resolution and creative control. Lightening-quick AF technology keeps the focus sharp and the Aperture Priority Mode expands your focus range for amazing results.&lt

Capture the moving image in stunning detail. Spectacular 4K UHD resolution means smooth and hyper-detailed movie footage. Or choose Full HD 1080p res running at 120fps for superior slow motion sequences.&lt

Focus in on those tiny details not visible with the naked eye for incredible results. Particularly good for shooting nature, the TG-5 features a four mode Variable Macro system. Choose from Microscope, Microscope Control, Focus Bracketing or Focus Stacking mode for extreme close ups of wildlife, flora and fauna. Focus Stacking mode even works without additional software, which would normally be required in a camera of this class.&lt

The TG-5 is packed with a variety of shooting modes such as Underwater Mode optimised for underwater photography, and Pro Capture for capturing split-second movement. With these features, you can explore a world of heightened creativity.&lt

This Olympus camera features next-gen GPS with Landmark Recognition which pinpoints your location under 10 seconds. The e.Compass tracks barometric pressure, altitude and water depth as it navigates you home.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi and the OI.Share app, you can compose your image, control the camera settings and shoot remotely from your smart device. You’ll then be able to wirelessly upload and share your shots. Better still, the OI.Track app transfers GPS logs and shooting data direct to your Smartphone using the Field Sensor System, so you’ll always be able to keep an accurate record of your expeditions.&lt

119,johnlewis-fe48cf46df0b9dcd8eff372c6aff3c31,Panasonic Lumix DC-GH5 Compact System Camera, 4K UHD, 20.3MP, Wi-Fi, OLED Live Viewfinder, 3.2” LCD Vari-Angle Touch Screen, Body Only",cameras,pound,"1,599.00",Panasonic,,True,"&lt
column4: s GH5 is an awesomely capable compact system camera. With a larger sensor than its predecessor, refined Venus Engine and more powerful image stabilisation, stills and movies are incredibly detailed and breathtakingly lifelike. Stunning 4K UHD video resolution runs at an ultra-smooth 60p for the first time, and 6K Photo shooting allows you to select that perfect split-second still from a burst file to save as a high-quality image. With super-fast autofocus, a live viewfinder and a highly flexible touch screen, all housed in a rugged body built for the outdoor life, the GH5 delivers unprecedented picture quality in the history of Lumix cameras.&lt

column1: At 20.3 megapixels, the Digital LIVE MOS Sensor is 25% bigger than that of the GH4 benefitting superb resolution, image rendering and colour reproduction, while the removal of the low-pass filter maximises the level of detail possible. The refined Venus Engine processor achieves amazing image quality, especially with Natural Texture Expression for breathtakingly lifelike natural tones. It analyses the characteristic and optimally processes each individual pixel for stunning detail, realism and suppression of false colour. High Precision Multi Process Noise Reduction boasts four times the accuracy on the previous model, so visual noise is countered and detail is retained, meaning low-light photos can be clearly shot at high ISOs of 25600. Stills and movies are blur-free: in conjunction with a compatible lens, powerful 5-axis dual image stabilisation compensates for larger, previously uncontrollable movements, making it equivalent to shooting at a maximum 5 stop slower shutter speed. Perfect for telephoto and single-handed use, and all in stunning 4K.&lt

For the first time, 4K UHD video runs at up to 60p (i.e. frame refreshes per second) for unbelievably smooth and ultra-detailed footage. It also means you can slow your footage down without losing any fine detail. The sensor and venus engine combine to suppress rolling distortion, while faster quality signal reading ensures every single frame is of outstanding quality. Special film characteristic styles (&#x27
column5: for example) are available to give your work that authentic film feel, and with no recording duration limit you can go beyond 30 minutes in all settings.&lt

column1: The 6K Photo feature allows you to extract an 18MP resolution image from a 6K Burst Shooting File running at 30 frames per second, so you will always master that one perfect split-second moment, in beautifully glorious detail.&lt
Using improved Depth from Defocus technology, autofocus is increased on the previous model up to a super-fast 0.05sec at 12 frames per second. So it&#x27
column2: s easy to keep locked onto fast moving subjects and keep them super-sharp. The frame contains 225 focus points, and you can customise a focal group using the thumb joystick. Meanwhile the Post Focus function even makes it possible to select the area of focus after you&#x27

column5: Live Viewfinder and Vari-angle Touch Screen&lt

column1: The large OLED Live Viewfinder boasts an amazing magnification ratio of 1.52x (0.76x 35mm camera equivalent), while the rear touch screen achieves approx. 100% field of view and can be positioned at any angle so you can always find the perfect shot, even in the trickiest environment.&lt
Integrated Bluetooth and Wi-Fi makes wireless connection with your smart device easy, for instant sharing of your work.&lt

The GH5 is tough enough to withstand heavy use in the field. Composed of magnesium alloy and joint-sealed, not only is it splash and dust proof, but freeze-proof down to minus 10 degrees celsius. So it&#x27
column2: ll keep delivering incredible imagery through the toughest of photography adventures.&lt

120,johnlewis-d35afffecb66fae56b769cc3cae6d862,"Olympus PEN E-PL8 Compact System Camera with 14-42mm EZ Lens, HD 1080p, 16.1MP, 3&quot
column4: Highly stylish and packed full of features, the Olympus PEN E-PL8 compact system camera is brilliant whether you&#x27
column5: re expressing your creativity or taking simple snaps or selfies. With a fresh body redesign, the E-PL8 is classy and impressively capable. Featuring a tiltable LCD touch screen, built-in Wi-Fi and a sensor that will let you take high resolution photos and Full HD video, the E-PL8 exudes sophistication.&lt

column1: The camera body’s aesthetic design has been refined and streamlined for an improved look and feel over previous models. The front, top and grip have been redesigned for better handling, and a premium makeover makes the E-PL8 a camera with highly desirable looks to match its brilliant features.&lt

The E-PL8 uses 81 focus points to quickly and accurately help you focus on the subject of your photo. That means you can get the snap you want much quicker, making it easier to capture fleeting moments or give you more time to concentrate on your framing. It also features continuous video focus, so you can keep on filming without having to manually adjust every time your subject moves.&lt

Olympus’ M.Zuiko 14-42mm EZ Lens is small, smart and portable. With its electronic zoom, you can control it remotely through the ImageShare app and deliver smoother video zoom. Its premium construction features a durable metal lens mount, and a compact size that’s perfect for carrying around.&lt

The 3-inch LCD touch screen on the E-PL8 has a tilt mechanism that rotates 170 degrees, letting you take extra-high and extra-low photos with ease. And it’s perfect for selfies because you have a full preview to frame the shot. An updated configuration also makes it easier to select functions and settings, as well as choosing the subject you want to focus on in your shot.&lt

Take your creativity up a notch – with 9 Effects, including 14 Art Filters designed to turn your photos and movies into striking artworks in an instant on your camera screen. Play around and you’ll be surprised just what visual masterpieces you can create from your photos!
E-PL8 features built-in Wi-Fi, which makes it easier than ever to share your photos. It&#x27
column2: s perfect for posting them on social networking sites or emailing them to friends fast and without any fuss.&lt

column1: Keep things bright with this add-on flash, included with your PEN, which also detaches to make sure things stay light as well.&lt
Reduce camera shake with in-body stabilisation that extends to any lens you use – including wide-angles.&lt

column42: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 9 is a camera which delivers instant photos, and instant fun. With its Fujinon lens, Instax Mini Film and flash, the camera produces attractive and accurate images which can be printed instantly using Fujifilm’s integrated film and its very own developing technology. The Mini 9 features a Selfie Mirror, a close-up lens, and a &#x27
column44: mode for brighter pictures, as well as all the same fab features as the previous model.&lt

column1: Using the Fujifilm Instax Mini Instant colour film, your printed photos will be bold and vibrant. And better still, a distinctive white frame around the photo gives you the opportunity to write a personalised message to a loved one. Complete with the Electronic Shutter which has a shutter speed of 1/60 seconds, moments can effortlessly be captured, printed and shared right from the word ‘go’. You can even shoot up-close, as near as 35cm to your subject.&lt
Brilliant for selfies, you can check your framing before snapping using the mirror next to the lens.&lt

Operating the Instax Mini 9 is simple. All that you need to do is to check the LED exposure indicator and press down the shutter. Boasting an Auto Flash/ Focus Free, the camera enables bold and vibrant pictures to be taken, even in low lighting. What’s more, the brightness adjustment dial automatically determines the most suitable setting by lighting the corresponding mode.&lt

column3: mode produces brighter pictures with a gorgeous, softer tone, ideal for portraits.&lt

column2: s compact design means that you can take it anywhere with you. Even the film is easy to carry in your purse or wallet.&lt

column6: Hark back to the instant photo days with this camera’s blend of retro and modern tech. Take stunning snaps with the 60mm, ISO 800 lens, watch them print instantly out of the slot, then have a blast with the focused Selfi mode. Build a pin-board of friends, family and fun action shots with Fujifilm’s Instax Mini 70’s versatile imaging. 10 shots of film are thrown in too, so you can get going immediately.&lt

column1: The Mini 70 has a dedicated Selfi Mode so you can get the crispest results when you self-snap.  When the mode’s on, it adjusts brightness and shooting distance for apt subject/background separation. There’s even a selfie mirror at the front, so you can make sure you’re in the right position before you shoot and print.&lt

If you’re snapping in dark settings, the Mini 70’s advanced flash calculates surrounding brightness and adjusts shutter speed accordingly. This means that if you take it on a night out, you’ll get the full picture regardless of lighting or camera mode. It also uses fill-in flash to brighten shadows on sunny days, for example.&lt

column5: Catch Resplendent Skin Tones On Hi-Key Mode&lt

column1: Using the special Hi-Key mode, you can amplify a subject’s skin tones with glistening results. This would make selfies or portraits more flattering, and instil a similar creative freedom to what you have when fiddling with an electronic photo’s effects.&lt

Fujifilm’s camera features the traditional Macro mode (0.3m – 0.6m) to make close-up shots even sharper, while the 3m Landscape mode enhances sweeping long shots. There’s also a self-timer mode (1 frame/ 2 frames continuous shooting) so everybody can get in group snaps!&lt

Coming in at a super-light weight of 600g, this pack comes with a hand strap so you can carry it around with heavenly ease and security. The long-lasting lithium batteries (included) can be replaced easily, so it’s simple to keep on snapping when you’re on the move. Capture moments at work, on the train, on holiday, on long trips, or anywhere that takes your fancy.&lt

column6: A brilliant way to shoot unforgettable high-definition photos and movies, this small and lightweight 24.2-megapixel DSLR is powerful, comfortable to carry around, and incredibly simple to operate. Adding Bluetooth and SnapBridge for seamless wireless sharing with your smart device, this package is perfect for beginners.&lt

column9: Specifically designed without an optical low-pass filter (OLPF), the D3400’s image sensor makes the most of its 24.2-megapixel resolution to sharply capture even the finest textures and render images with incredibly crisp detail.&lt

Use the built-in Guide Mode to get step-by-step instructions on how to use the camera. Your first DSLR can be daunting, but, with this nifty mode, you’ll be shooting like a pro in no time.&lt

With 13 different effects like panorama and colour pop to choose from, the D3400 makes it easy to add a touch of artistry to your photos and movies. Simply select Effects Mode and choose the option you want to apply before shooting.&lt

column1: You can share your images quickly and easily with friends and family thanks to built-in Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and NFC which lets you transfer images and videos to your smartphone, tablet or to the Canon Connect Station. You can even upload your photos to social networks directly from the camera, so you can share your work instantly.&lt

A 20.3 megapixel HS system ensures beautifully crisp and clear image quality, day or night. Fast continuous shooting allows you to capture that perfect spontaneous one-off moment. Digic 6 with iSAPS processing technology drives the camera speedily and effortlessly, delivering pictures of gorgeously natural colour and low noise, without the need for a flash, thanks to a high 3200 ISO level.&lt

Full HD 1080p resolution allows you to shoot footage that is sharp and delightfully detailed. Running at 60fps, even the fastest action is rendered with exceptional smoothness. One Touch Movie Record button gets you rolling in an instant, while the camera&#x27
column2: s advanced image stabilisation features keep everything steady and blur-free.&lt

column1: With 11 shooting modes and a wide range of &#x27
column3: photo effects, the creative possibilities are endless. Use full manual control to show off your creativity, or let the camera do the hard work for you by using Creative Shot mode. This automatically takes six of the same picture and applies a range of effects and filters to five of them so that you can select the best. Meanwhile, Hybrid Auto mode records four second clips before each shot to create a fun and interesting movie which takes viewers on a journey through your day.&lt

column2: rear LCD monitor accurately and clearly relays the camera viewpoint, with 100% coverage of the frame. Plus it&#x27
column3: s fully tiltable up to 180°, so you can shoot from tough angles. Fully-flipped, it makes the SX730 ideal for taking superb quality selfies!&lt

column1: With a compact body, weighing just 300g, the SX730 is designed for supreme portability. It&#x27
column2: s perfect for keeping with you every day, taking on holiday, or long travel assignments.&lt

column43: , the perfect gear to let you get the best out of the SX730 on the go.&lt

141,johnlewis-3dba92b75f1a05ec95489bad38bbeaec,Nikon DX D500 Digital SLR Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 20.9MP, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth/NFC With 3.2&quot
column6: Nikon’s fleeting DX flagship is a powerful all-rounder with professional capabilities. Its rugged body is filled with a top-spec CMOS sensor, sky-high ISO levels for exceptional low-light shooting and state-of-the-art Smart sharing features.  Shoot super-sharp 4K video at lightning speed, get in tight angles with the tilting touch screen and enjoy even sharpness with the 153-point Autofocus. The D500 is an extraordinary bit of kit that will give you free rein to snap anything and everything with magnificent clarity – whether it close-up portraiture, high-octane sports or distant wildlife.&lt

column1: Channel your imagination through the D500’s mighty body. As its large 23.5mm x 15.7mm CMOS sensor captures startling depth and detail, the 20.9MPs will give your photos a pin-sharp finish. Fuelled by the EXPEED 5 image processor, you’ll snap at rapid speeds and get the guile of the moment every time. This is topped off with a zippy 10fps shooting speed and rich 1/8000-30 second shutter speed range, so your creative freedom has no limits.&lt

Nikon’s brand-new Multi-CAM 20K autofocus (AF) system delivers 153 AF points and 99 cross-type points. This means that more areas of the image are honed in on and sharpened, giving all-over clarity perfect for sweeping landscape shots.&lt

The D500 has an incredibly-high 51200 ISO, letting you shoot stunning shots at night or in low-light settings. This can even be expanded to Lo 1 and Hi 5 (50 – 1,640,000 ISO equivalent), giving simply glorious results. This way, your shots won’t be ruined when the sun goes go down, letting you flex your creativity 24 hours a day.&lt

This Nikon’s first DSLR to let you shoot films in 4K Ultra HD. This resolution, with four-times the pixels of Full HD, captures moments with insanely crisp and cinematic results. Recording at up to 30fps, motion has the super-smoothness perfect for sports clips. There’s also a built-in interval timer and 4K UHD time-lapse function, letting you craft spectacular sped-up movies.&lt

Once you’ve snapped a stunning shot, you can share it with your friends in an instant with the built-in Wi-Fi or Bluetooth. This SnapBridge functionality lets you hook up your smart device in an instant, speeding up wireless photo transfer. To make it even faster, the D500’s Near Field Communication (NFC) lets you link the camera to your device by simply tapping it.&lt

If you’re looking to get your angle just right, it can be a strain to stretch and kneel around your subject. Nikon’s 3.2” touch screen monitor tilts so you can snap high and low angles with remarkable ease. Adjust its position to snap close-ups of budding flora, sweeping over-the-top crowd shots or thrilling sports snaps. This way, your creativity won’t be hampered by discomfort.&lt

Take your D500 anywhere with its sturdy and hardy build. Encased in magnesium alloy and carbon fibre materials with dust and water-drop resistance, this ergonomic DSLR can tackle the toughest environments.&lt

column3: Powerful CMOS sensor and all-new EXPEED 5 image processor&lt
Huge 51200 ISO makes low-light shooting a pleasure&lt
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and NFC connectivity makes wireless sharing seamless.&lt
Shoot videos in incredible 4K Ultra HD detail&lt

142,johnlewis-7e6e62638da818b05dedc4d9f57fa812,Sony Cyber-shot RX-100 V Camera, 4K, 20.1MP, 2.9x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED EVF, 3&quot
column6: The Sony RX100 V is a brilliantly featured compact camera built for super fast image and movie capture, with amazing autofocus capability. It inherits the RX100 series’ renowned sensor for superb image quality, can shoot continuously at 24 frames per second, and has 4K resolution for incredibly detailed movies. Pocket-sized, packed with features including silent shooting, and with sleek and intuitive design, it’s a superb compact designed for quality, rapid reaction and ease-of use.&lt

column1: The RX100 V autofocus has been refined with cutting edge technology so you can react instantly to capture the action. It can lock onto and capture a moving subject in just 0.05 seconds. And with 315 individual autofocus points it has amazing phase detection for consistency of autofocus and motion tracking.&lt
Continuous shooting mode has been improved on the previous model, allowing for up to 24 frames per second with AF/AE tracking for up to 150 shots.&lt
The DSC-RX100 V sports an f/1.8-2.8 Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T lens with 24-70mm zoom. It’s a perfect lens for portraits and macro shots with beautiful defocused backgrounds.&lt

The RX100 V features the high-speed BIONZ X processor for more natural details, more realistic images, richer tonal gradations and lower noise while shooting photos and movies. It combines with The 20.1 megapixel Exmor RS® CMOS sensor with focal plane phase-detecting AF sensor to achieve such fast results. Plus up to 1/32000s Anti-Distortion Shutter minimises visual noise.&lt

Capable of recording in 4K Ultra HD, the RX100 V is ideal for capturing memorable frames in stunning clarity. So your movies look second to none, even when viewed on a Full HD TV. The camera can even shoot high-quality still images of 17MP while recording a movie. And the Auto Dual Rec release function lets the camera automatically take the photographs in a choice of frequency release – high/standard/low settings.&lt
Slow motion movies are a breeze with the RX100 V. It can record the action at up to 960 fps (40x normal frame rate), and for twice as long as the previous model.&lt

View every scene in rich detail with the bright and retractable electronic viewfinder (EVF). The viewfinder delivers a high resolution equivalent to 2359k dots to display the subtlest details for precise composition. EVF eye piece optics are treated with ZEISS T coating to reduce unwanted reflections for a clear corner-to-corner visibility.&lt
Selfies and framing have never been easier with a 3” tiltable LCD screen. High and low positions are now in shooting distance which offers greater flexibility in capturing creative compositions.&lt
column3:

143,johnlewis-b3d199de261752a8dfccc5c853081dd5,Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-RX10 III Bridge Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 20.1MP, 25x Optical Zoom, Wi-Fi, NFC, EVF, 3&quot
column6: Capture more captivating stills and movies from every perspective and greater distance with the Sony Cyber-shot RX10 III. With a 1.0-type Exmor RS CMOS sensor and Zeiss lens with f/2.4-4 large aperture and an impressive 24-600mm range, you can shoot stunning high resolution photos and 4K movies. Zoom in from amazing distances and capture pin-sharp images, even in extreme close-up, or take movies in super slow motion. With great flexibility, and designed for completely natural control in all situations, the RX10 III gives you DSLR-quality results, without the need for multiple lenses.&lt

column1: The first 25x optical zoom in a RX series camera features 24-600mm extra wide-angle to ultra-telephoto zoom range with a large F2.4-4 aperture. Aspherical lens elements and super-ED glass ensures excellent image quality, resolution and contrast, so it’s equally adept at high clarity and lush bokeh. Optical image stabilisation technology ensures clarity for handheld still and movie shooting, especially in low light or at the ultra-telephoto end of the zoom range.&lt

You can capture incredible super slow motion videos with the RX10 III. Shoot as fast as 240 frames per second at near Full HD quality, or 1000 fps at a lower resolution. Plus, with an adjustable shutter speed as fast as 1/32000 second and up to 14fps continuous shooting speed, you&#x27

The 20.1MP 1.0 type Exmor RS CMOS sensor delivers outstanding picture quality thanks to a stacked architecture that expands and speeds up signal processing. Back illumination technology increases light collection efficiency and reduces noise, and an attached memory chip enable faster large-volume output for in-camera 4K super slo-mo recording. The BIONZ X image processing engine handles the data with speed and precision.&lt

The RX10 III can suppress distortion when shooting at up to a shutter speed of 1/32000, so you can capture sharp, undistorted images of fast-moving sports action. Its electronic shutter also allows you to shoot silently so you can get in amongst the wildlife and not disturb the environment.&lt

With high precision 4K recording, the RX10 III can really take your breath away. Shoot beautiful footage with high-bit-rate recording, and full pixel readout without pixel binning for high-resolution results. A high-speed front-end LSI supports image processing to greatly reduce “rolling shutter”.&lt

With Fast Intelligent Auto Focus, The RX10 III focuses at speeds of up to 0.09 seconds. A subject detection algorithm accurately predicts the point of focus before the shutter is pressed halfway, so the camera focuses at the very moment the button is pressed. So it’s easier for you to pick up the camera, press the shutter and get that shot.&lt

With high magnification (0.70x), contrast and resolution, the OLED viewfinder features a resolution equivalent to 2359k dots and corner-to-corner visibility to make it easier to see every detail of your subject.&lt

Manual lens rings for focus, zoom and aperture are designed for natural, comfortable control, especially when looking through the viewfinder. A multi interface shoe makes it easy to connect flash units, microphones and accessories. A dust and moisture-resistant body ensures the camera withstands rugged conditions. And an adjustable screen gives you the flexibility to capture the shot from more angles.&lt

Go anywhere, share anytime. Simply touch the camera against an NFC-enabled smartphone or tablet to activate apps or share photos or movies - no extra cables, no complicated connections. Use built-in Wi-Fi to upload to social networks or connect to a PC or TV, and Sony’s PlayMemories Apps are available to download to enhance your creativity.&lt

144,johnlewis-1a98110ce49f1b59b85f0abdaf75de25,Olympus OM-D E-M1 Mark II Compact System Camera with 12-40mm PRO Lens, 4K UHD, 20.4MP, Wi-Fi, EVF, 3&quot
column25: The E-M1 Mark II is a revolutionary update of Olympus&#x27
column26: s brilliant compact system camera. With a new image processor, speed is of the essence, shooting at up to 60 frames per second, while a 20.4MP sensor provides stunning image quality. 121 focus point AF takes autofocus speed, precision and performance to the next level, and movies shoot in scintillating 4K resolution. Tough, but amazingly lightweight, packed with innovative technology and features, it advances the power of portable photography.&lt

column1: Renowned Olympus engineering provides stunning image quality for a compact. A 20.4MP Live MOS sensor boosts pixel optics to deliver rich detail and smooth gradations. And an AR coating applied directly to the sensor reduces ghosting and flare. You can even shoot in 50M High Res mode, which combines eight images to produce detail equivalent to a staggering 50MP. The TruePic VIII image processor with double quad-core system and dedicated autofocus processing effortlessly ensures the camera&#x27

Experience sequential shooting that surpasses SLR capability. With Single autofocus shooting at 60fps and continuous autofocus at 18fps, even fast moving objects are clear and sharp. With Pro Capture Mode you can set a buffer to capture up to 14 frames in full resolution, giving you the chance to go &#x27
column3: and select the perfect composition. On-Chip Phase Detection AF uses 121 focus points for precise tracking across the whole screen. Meanwhile, Subject Tracking Cluster Display keeps focus on moving objects, with tracking fields shown directly on the monitor.&lt

column1: 5 axis image stabilisation reliably corrects camera shake. Perfect for hand-held shooting in any lighting condition.&lt
With gloriously detailed 4K UHD resolution movie shooting, your footage is staggeringly detailed, smooth and naturally realistic. And as 4K becomes standard, your movies are future-proof too. &lt

The E-M1 Mark II has the technology to take High Dynamic Range (HDR) images. And you can even preview your HDR images through the electronic viewfinder, enabling you see your HDR image prior to taking your shot and make any adjustments before you release the shutter. &lt
Produce incredible time lapse sequences on film where time appears to move faster than reality, thanks to the E-M1 Mark II&#x27
column2: s powerful interval shooting and time lapse movie features.&lt

column1: Enhance your shots with your own creativity: Play around with different effects by adding one of 13 Art Filters, or tell a story with your shots by combining several shots in a single-frame collage composition.&lt
Adjust aperture and exposure using the two dials, then flick the lever to adjust ISO and white balance with precisely the same action. All in a fraction of a second.&lt

At only 500g, the E-M1 Mark II is brilliantly lightweight and compact. Durable weatherproof construction gives you the confidence to take it on all assignments, and a long battery lifetime of up to 440 images keeps you clicking all day, while it recharges in just 2 hours.&lt

This camera is supplied with the M.ZUIKO DIGITAL ED 12 40mm 1:2.8 PRO lens. With a constant bright aperture of 2.8 at all focal lengths, it delivers high-grade image quality in a wide range of photography styles, regardless of lighting and distance. Robust, compact and lightweight, it&#x27
column2: s the perfect lens to get the best out of the E-M1 Mark II.&lt

145,johnlewis-b24c66f7cb2b26a40e788213a635acf9,Sony A6300 Compact System Camera With 16-50mm Power Zoom Lens, 4K Ultra HD, 24.2MP, 4D Focus, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED EVF, 3&quot
column43: Latch on to your subject at the speed of sight and pull-off pictures of outstanding beauty with Sony’s A6300. Whether it the lightning-fast 4D Focus system, standout image sensor or DSLR-like CMOS sensor, this camera is packed with industry-leading innovation. Use the OLED Electronic Viewfinder to craft your pictures, make pin-sharp movies in 4K, then share your ravishing results wirelessly through Wi-Fi and NFC. Backed by a super-lightweight frame, this is perfect for everything from point-and-shoot holiday snaps to creative-and-complex pro shots. This is bundled with a 16-50mm Power Zoom Lens too, so you can get shooting straight out-of-the-box.&lt

column1: The A6300’s large Exmor CMOS sensor, giving 24.2MPs to play with, blends beautifully with the revamped BIONZ X processor.  The engine’s new design improves light collection efficiency and lets you shoot at up to ISO 51200 with far-less distortion. This way, your shots will look beautiful regardless of how well-lit your scene is. Sony’s mix of power and finesse is a photographic triumph that’s certain to pique your creative interest.&lt

Sharpen your subject at the blink of an eye with Sony’s top-notch autofocus (AF) system. Their 4D Focus software packs a massive 425 phase-detection AF points in the image area, so nothing escapes its attention. Furthermore, the insanely-fast 0.05 second AF speed ensures you get your shot every time – even in sudden or fast-moving scenes. With this awesome technology, an amateur can pick up this camera and take photos like a professional with ease.&lt

Do yourself a favour and join the 4K Ultra HD revolution. With four-times the resolution of Full HD, you’ll shoot super-sharp clips perfect to play on the big screen. Your shots will get a colour boost too, with Sony’s S-Gamut/S-Log feature. This system amplifies all the different shades to make each frame more expressive and eye-popping. If you take a step-back to Full HD, you’ll be able to shoot at a rapid 120fps with AF tracking, or make fun slow-motion clips.&lt

With the LCD screen flipping up 90-degrees and down 45, you’ll get into tight angles easier without losing compactness. Furthermore, the OLED viewfinder features real-time data and 100% coverage. This way, you’ll plan, track and preview your shots with remarkable accuracy.&lt

The sturdy magnesium alloy body has a nifty ergonomic grip so your hand will mould around it comfortably. You’ll have no problem using large lenses either with the A6300’s super-strong mount. Furthermore, all 9 of the buttons can be assigned to any of the 64 functions, so you can tailor the set-up to your needs.&lt

With built-in Wi-Fi and NFC, you’ll hook this up to your smart device and share your content wirelessly at the touch of a button. Simply tap your device on the camera, or generate a QR code for non NFC-ready devices, to get your photos shared seamlessly. Furthermore, you can download Sony’s cloud service, PlayMemories Online and a rich range of PlayMemories Camera Apps to add even more functions to your camera.&lt

With the included 16-50mm Super Zoom lens, you’ll be shooting anything from intimate portraiture to sweeping cityscapes in an instant. Hone in on your subject with the 3x optical zoom and iron out the blur of handshake with the built-in Optical SteadyShot image stabiliser. Whether you’re a beginner or an expert, this lightweight lens is the perfect jack-of-all-trades accessory to get you started.&lt

column3: CMOS sensor and BIONZ X processor gives large 100-51200 ISO&lt

146,johnlewis-ea89e9a5e4ef81f85765f03813ea9a71,Olympus Pen F Compact System Camera With M.ZUIKO 17mm Prime Lens, HD 1080p, 20.3MP, Wi-Fi, Front Creative Dial, 5-Axis IS, 3&quot
column6: Finished with fine vintage charm, Olympus’ Pen F culminates 80 years of excellence. With its retro body and state-of-the-art features, this magnificent camera marries old and new like never before. Take high-spec snaps with the 20.3MP MOS sensor, share seamlessly through Wi-Fi and flex your imagination with the liberating Creative Dial. Backed by decades of pedigree, Olympus will let you relive the advent of portable photography with beastly quality.&lt

column1: Armed with 20.3MP and the TruePic VII image processor, you’ll shoot sharp, eye-popping pictures at lightning speed. To complement still-life work, the 50M HiRes-Shot mode combines 8 shots in one to serve searing clarity. The included M.ZUIKO 17mm Prime Lens boasts a huge 1.8 aperture, giving striking depth-of-field blur for portraiture. Furthermore, the sky-high 25600 ISO delivers top low-light performance, without the noise. All in all, the Pen F is the instrument of a professional.&lt
The Pen F’s 5-axis image stabiliser makes it much easier to iron out blur in on-the-move shots. This way, you’ll capture fast-moving action or spur-of-the-moment snaps with pin-sharp clarity.&lt

This camera’s unique Creative Dial is a fresh take on picture customisation. At a flick of the front switch, you can explore 4 modes. The Monochrome Profile Control lets you tinker with classic photo filters, the Colour Profile Control lets you toggle the saturation of 12 colours, the Art Filters mode gives a range of 14 effects and the Colour Creator lets you create a new hue to tinge your photo with. Such modes open up on-the-spot creativity so you can make your shots personal in an instant.&lt

Frame your shots with finite efficiency through the High Visibility Viewfinder. Filled with 2.36MP resolution, your previews will be crisp, vivid and fluid. Apply effects in real-time to check if it works and track the sophisticated autofocus. Whatever you shoot, this is the ideal platform for pre and post production.&lt
Using the OLYMPUS Image Share app (iOS &amp
column2: Android), you can control your Pen F and share content wirelessly. Once you link your smart device through Wi-Fi, you can import your shots at the touch of the ‘share’ icon on the monitor. Once imported, sharing on social media platforms is quick and easy. You can also use your smart device as a remote. Perfect for a nature shooting, you can use it as a live view to snap shots from your sofa. Other features include GPS tagging and in-depth photo editing.&lt

column1: Take advantage of the 4K revolution and make spectacular Time Lapse videos. Just create a series of images over time, like a sunset, then recompile them quickly into a sped-up 4K Time Lapse piece. This brilliant mode will add a new edge to your photography.&lt

The 3” Touch Screen on the camera’s rear lets you get into the most awkward of angles with its tiltable design. Just pull the screen toward you for it to tilt down, giving you a whole new avenue of possibility.&lt
Gloriously textured and ergonomically shaped, the Pen F is a masterpiece of design. Its light aluminium body will mould in your hand as it becomes a portal of your imagination.&lt

column3: Top notch 25600 ISO delivers staggering low-light performance&lt
TruePic VII Processor and 5-Axis Image Stabiliser give stunning results&lt
Innovative Creative Dial opens up new photographic avenues&lt
Electronic 2.36MP Viewfinder makes shooting crisp and fluid&lt
Seamless sharing and remote control through the app&lt
Ravishingly retro look and premium build&lt

147,johnlewis-8ed9531aa7739495684d72f1c3028f35,Sony A6500 Compact System Camera, 4K Ultra HD, 25MP, OLED Viewfinder, Wi-Fi, NFC, 3&quot
column12: Shoot detailed stills and frames, up close and from afar, with the Sony a6500 E-mount APS-C Camera. Its autofocus gives unprecedented accuracy which can track your subject and even spring into action when enlarging a selected image area on the view finder. The 5-axis image stabilization will provide a steady hand even on the most treacherous of land. And with wireless connectivity built-in, you can share your favourite snaps of the day with friends and family.&lt

column9: Boasting an APS-C image sensor with 24.2 effective megapixels plus thin wiring layer and large photodiode substrate for light collection efficiency, the a6500 will capture your favourite moments with super sharp clarity. It even has a BIONZ X™ image processing engine so the image sensor achieves a wide sensitivity range of ISO 100-512002 with low noise. Its quick-transmission copper wiring layer helps to shoot movies in 4K and Full HD at 120fps (100fps3) too.&lt

The α6500 focuses accurately, efficiently and reliably on subjects throughout the frame thanks to its 425 focal plane phase-detection. High-density Tracking AF Technology seamlessly activates AF points to cover and track subjects moving within frame with unerring precision. And with an AF speed of 0.05 seconds, the camera conducts itself impressively fast which gives an accurate AF and tracking performance when shooting movies or stills.&lt
column11: Lock-on AF maintains focus on a moving subject automatically. It can even come into play after shooting when enlarging a selected image area on the viewfinder or LCD screen.&lt

column9: Equipped with an in-body 5-axis image stabilization, you&#x27
column10: ll be able to shoot steadier images and movies. A high-accuracy gyro sensor holds the camera at a steady level which is equivalent to a 5-steps-faster shutter speed. This will enable you to zoom in on faraway subjects, snap detailed close-ups and capture night scenes all with minimum blur.&lt

column9: Record rich data in a 4K resolution with full pixel readout and no pixel binning. This allows for 2.4 times (approximately) more information what is basically required for 4K. In turn, you&#x27
column10: ll be able to take an exceptionally high resolution snap shot of your recording and make it into an image.&lt

column9: A high-contrast, high-resolution, high-visibility XGA OLED Tru-Finder™ reproduces darkness and colour in very fine detail. This makes for clear, smooth views of scenes and tracking of subjects.&lt

column11: Go anywhere, share anytime. Simply touch the camera against an NFC-enabled smartphone or tablet to activate apps or share photos or movies - no extra cables, no complicated connections. Use built-in Wi-Fi to upload to social networks or connect to a PC or TV, and Sony’s PlayMemories Apps are available to download to enhance your creativity.&lt

column9: With a tough magnesium alloy body and robust lens mount, the a6500 delivers solid reliability and steady handling when you are out shooting. Water and dust is also prevented from entering the camera body thanks to sealing around the buttons and dials, as well as a protective double-layered structure that tightly interlocks panels and components.&lt

148,johnlewis-fef93fd0fbb308506a2612cf4ae9f8af,Nikon D7200 DSLR Camera, 24.2 MP, HD 1080p, Built-in Wi-Fi, NFC, 3.2&quot
column25: The Nikon D7200 is ready for your next challenge. With an image quality which is second to none, low-light capabilities and the speed of a Nikon DSLR, the D7200 goes beyond the extremes. Coupled with the convenience of built-in Wi-Fi and Near Field Communication (NFC), the DSLR is the first of its kind to offer shoot and share capabilities for your 24.2 megapixel photos and Full HD videos.&lt

column9: The D7200 is free of an optical low-pass filter so it produces remarkably pure, sharp photos and videos. Its 24.2 MP DX-format CMOS image sensor works together with EXPEED 4 image processing and NIKKOR lenses to enhance detail and tonality. The picturesque image quality is maintained all the way up to ISO 25, 600 for amazing low-light images. You can now also expand the ISO range up to BW1 (51, 200) and BW2 (102,400) to shoot monochromatic photos, even in challenging light situations. Whether you are shooting stills or videos, selecting the 1.3x crop mode extends the reach of NIKKOR DX and FX-format lenses so you get more involved with all the action, sports, wildlife and more.&lt

Connect your DSLR to your Smartphone wirelessly with Nikon snapbridge. Quickly and easily share by email, texting or posting online, wherever you are – no hotspot needed. You can even share your photographs on the move, or use a Smartphone or tablet to control your camera.&lt

column5: High-speed frame rate and increased buffer&lt
column9: With a shooting capacity of 6fps, the Nikon DSLR camera is an outstanding choice for sports, wildlife and other fast action. It also has a large buffer capacity that can handle, approximately
column10: 100 shots of continuous shooting when in JPEG/fine/large file formats
column11: up to 27 shots in 12-bit lossless compressed RAW or up to 18 shots when using 14-bit lossless compressed RAW and DX-format image size. Alternatively, switch to 1.3x image size and capture 7fps (approx) in continuous high-speed mode.&lt

column9: The D7200’s superb AF system means that you can capture moments in daylight or after dark. Its Advanced Multi-CAM 3500 II autofocus sensor module achieves outstanding focus detection, even at a very dim -3 EV (ISO 100, 20ºC/68ºF). Its high-density 51 focus points cover a wide area of the frame in DX format and most of the frame in 1.3x Crop Mode, while 15 cross-type sensors in the centre provide higher detection strength. One centre AF point can even work all the way to f/8, which is great when using teleconverters.&lt

Capture HD video at a frame rate of 60p with tack-sharp details, vibrant colours and high-fidelity stereo sound. The improved full-time autofocus will keep moving subjects sharp. And, the advanced Picture Controls like Flat and Clarity make it easier to perfect your movies in post-production.&lt

Experiment and create beautifully rendered time-lapse movies with smooth exposure variations entirely in camera. Make smooth exposure transitions with Auto ISO while monitoring with Highlight Display (Zebra Stripes) and even apply Flat Picture Control for easier colour grading in post.&lt

Turn your images into artistic master pieces with next-generation Picture Controls and a collection of Image Effects – the latter can even be applied to photos and videos in real time. Preserve the details in highlights and shadows, even when the scene includes moving subjects with Active D-lighting and, set white balance simply by selecting the area of the frame that should be white.&lt

column11: One of the biggest advantages of this camera is the sheer shooting flexibility on offer. You can use additional lenses to take wide-angle, telephoto, or close-up shots to suit just about any situation. The shorter the focal length (measured in mm), the wider the view will be – the longer the focal length, the more telescopic the picture. With a selection of interchangeable lenses at your disposal, the creative possibilities are endless. &lt

Built-in Wi-Fi makes it simple to share your impressive photos in an instant.&lt

153,johnlewis-62606a6c5e6fce6c5cba9c8be3a068cc,Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark II Compact System Camera with 14-42mm EZ Lens, HD 1080p, 16.1MP, Wi-Fi, OLED EVF, 3” LCD Touch Screen, Silver",cameras,pound,549.00,Olympus,,True,"&lt
column7: Olympus’ all-new entry to the E-M10 series raises the bar with its exceptional photo quality, lightweight frame and fantastic 5-axis image stabiliser. Record video in Full HD, explore a dizzying range of photo modes including 4K Time Lapse, then share instantly with the built-in Wi-Fi. Coming with a high-end 14-42 EZ Lens, this ultra-light camera punches above its weight with its professional, wide-ranging and simply beautiful results.&lt

column1: Packing in an eye-popping 16.1 megapixels, this Micro Four Thirds sensor delivers delightful snaps with extreme detail. The included lense’s f3.5 (wide) - f5.6 (tele) aperture gives stunning range to calibrate your pictures with, while its 14-42mm focal length ensures long-shot clarity to do the camera’s high-specs justice. Furthermore, the E-M10’s hyper-fast Autofocus keeps your snapping seamless.&lt

In a bid to eliminate hand-shake, Olympus has developed powerful 5-Axis Image Stabilisation (IS) technology so you can leave your tripod at home. Your pictures will always be blur-free, whether it in low-light setting or on-the-move. The built-in feature will let you take razor-sharp pictures wherever you go.&lt

No need to fumble with wires to get your latest snaps and videos shared. All you do is link up your E-M10 Mark II to your smart device through Wi-Fi, and then upload images in an instant through OLYMPUS Image Share (OI.Share). You can even toggle a whole range of settings without having to touch your camera. Control your camera with your smartphone, and keep on top of your work when its out-of-reach.&lt
Weighing in at a measly 390g, this camera is a doddle to carry around. Its ergonomic design, metal-body build quality and classic shape, keep it simple to take with you everywhere you go.&lt

The 3” Touch Screen on the camera’s rear lets you get into the most awkward of angles with its tiltable design. Just pull the screen toward you for it to tilt down, giving you a whole new avenue of possibility.&lt
The convenient Silent Shutter Mode ensures the shutter release doesn’t make a sound when pressed – so your shooting is absolutely silent.

Construct awe-inspiring snaps with the 2.36M dot, ultra-clear Electronic Viewfinder (EVF). This automatic image optimiser give real-time settings monitoring, giving the wealth of detail you need for top-notch photography.&lt

Take advantage of the 4K revolution and make spectacular Time Lapse videos. Just create a series of images over time, like a sunset, then recompile them quickly into a sped-up 4K Time Lapse piece. This brilliant mode will add a new edge to your photography.&lt

Keep control of your autofocus with this highly-intuitive touch function. Simply tap on the viewfinder where you’d like the focus to hone in on, and watch it adjust itself for a truly bespoke experience.&lt

The wealth of modes in this camera is simply staggering. You can make sensational clips with the smooth 4x slow-motion playback, shoot beautiful night-time and low-light compositions with the Live Composite mode and use the Focus Bracketing to shoot a number of photos in different settings so you can get it just right. Other modes include Panorama, Sports, Sunset and Fireworks, or you can add arty filters like Pop Art, Grainy Film, Soft Focus and Vintage, to make everything you do all the more personalised.&lt

column3: Wi-Fi connectivity lets you share instantly, and control the camera with your smart device.&lt
It’s small, ergonomic, lightweight and highly portable.&lt

154,johnlewis-39ac156313008606609bafdb3de9dae3,Fujifilm X-Pro 2 Compact System Camera, HD 1080p, 24.3MP, Wi-Fi, EVF, OVF, 3&quot

column3: Shoot top-of-the-line snaps with Fujifilm’s sublime X-Pro 2 Compact System Camera. Loaded with an all-new expertly-engineered X-Trans CMOS III sensor, X Processor Pro and Advanced Hybrid Multi Viewfinder, this pocket-sized product gives professional quality without the bulk. The 24MPs deliver vigorous detail, while the vintage, weather-resistant build make it perfect to combat the elements on your trips. Navigate the wealth of features on the pin-sharp 3” screen, and share content instantly through Wi-Fi. Whether you’re a budding photographer, family snapper or seasoned pro, the X-Pro 2 is versatile, state-of-the-art kit.&lt

column1: Fujifilm are premiering their X-Trans CMOS III sensor and X Processor Pro for sharper photography at obscene speeds. The 24.3MP sensor has the highest pixel count in the brand’s X-series, delivering finite detail perfect for sweeping cityscapes. Running approximately four-times faster than a conventional Fujifilm model, the X Processor Pro allows for quicker, more whimsical photography. The EVF’s 85fps display speed lets you track a moving subject with more efficiency, while compressed RAW films are now supported for greater versatility. Together with other features like the low-light shot enhancing 51200 ISO, this camera is incredibly powerful.&lt

Snapping pictures as you want them takes a top-quality viewfinder. Fujifilm have engineered not just one, but three options – an Electronic viewfinder (EVF), Optical Viewfinder (OVF) and Electronic Rangefinder (ERF). The EVF shows the image information on the LCD screen and the OVF on the optical image. The unique ERF enlarges the focus area on the optical viewfinder, giving you a clearer view on the subject. This way, you can enjoy optical and electronic benefits simultaneously, getting your snap perfect before you’ve even taken it. You can flick between these three options with the super-simple OVF/EVF switch lever, too.&lt

The X-Pro 2 features a joystick-like Focus Lever on the back, so you can adjust focus instantly. Whether you’re on Autofocus (AF) or Manual Focus (MF) mode, you’ll be able to tinker your subject on-the-move, letting you work fluidly with your surroundings. Not only is the AF super-fast, Fujifilm have expanded the Phase Detection area from 49 points to 77. This way, 40% of the image area is covered, so you keep track of fast-moving action like sports. And it features a new Autofocus Custom setting for even higher accuracy when tracking moving subjects.&lt

With its ergonomic design and practical dial placement, this camera will feel like another limb. Adjust shutter speed and ISO at the same time with the lifting Dual Function ISO dial, use the Front Command dial to set intermediate shutter speeds or Exposure Compensation if the feature’s switch is set to ‘C’. Together with this convenient hardware design, the software lets you save up to 16 quick-actions in a ‘My Menu’ section. This way, the LCD display is as intuitive as the body’s dials.&lt

Hook your X-Pro 2 up with the FUJIFILM Camera Remote app on your smart device to share your content seamlessly. This Wi-Fi link lets you transfer up to 2GB of photos and films at once, so your friends and family can see your snaps almost instantly. You can even control your camera remotely on your smart phone or tablet, so you can jump in group shots, capture wildlife or shoot outside from the comfort of your sofa! This top-notch wireless also lets you send location data from your smart device to geo-tag your content.&lt
Capture precious moments in glorious Full HD with the X-Pro 2’s 1080p film-recording. Select from 60, 50, 30, 25 and 24fps frame rates, to get the right look for your clip.&lt

Get creative with the myriad of filters and effects the X-Pro 2 has to offer. Make colour especially eye-popping with the Dynamic Range Bracketing, add otherworldly hues with the White Balance Bracketing and make smoky mono-masterpieces with the new ACROS Film Simulation mode. Furthermore, filters like the Miniature, Grain Effect, Pop Color, Soft Focus and Low-Key, give you an exciting toy box to express yourself with.&lt

column3: Powerful 24.3MP X-Trans CMOS III sensor and X Processor Pro&lt
Versatility from Advanced Hybrid Multi Viewfinder &lt
Rapid and rich Autofocus settings, including 7x7 expansion&lt
Shoot videos in stunning Full HD&lt

column1: The built-in five sensor tracking has a GPS, compass, acceleration sensor, barometer and thermometer. This way, you’ll not only shoot your adventures, you’ll capture the scene. This is perfect for logging personal achievement in tough outdoor challenges too.&lt

With four-times the pixels of Full HD, this camera’s 4K movie-making is a cut above the rest. Record top-quality 4K films by pressing the dedicated movie button. It even senses when you’re underwater and shifts to an optimal mode. This way, you can shoot clips of marine life with unbelievable detail.&lt

Get everyone in the pictures with the ultra-wide-angle lens, steady shots with the 5-axis Image Stabilisation and then enjoy pin-sharp with the 7.2MP CMOS sensor. The rapid Olympus TruePic VII processor makes sure no time is wasted between shots, while the fixed focal length keeps the 204° angle of view extra-refined. Topped off by an advanced autofocus system, you&amp
column3: ll build a library of pro-level shots and videos.&lt

column10: s G80 is the perfect camera for keeping up with you on life’s adventures. State-of-the-art 4K photo capability is ideal for capturing life on the move, while Image Stabilisation captures crisper, clearer images in a fast-moving environment. Shoot video in stunning 4K, or take super-sharp images in fine detail, with its 16 megapixel sensor. With an OLED Live Viewfinder, a vari-angle touch screen, and a dust-proof, weather-sealed body, you can take amazing shots, from any angle, in any condition.&lt

column1: With 4K Photo you can select an individual frame from a 30 fps video sequence, and save it as a single high resolution image. It’s ideal for capturing unmissable fast-moving action and selecting the single perfect shot later. Simply shoot, select and save.&lt

With a compatible image-stabilising lens attached (sold separately), the G80 has 5-axis Dual Image Stabilisation capability to compensate and correct handshake. So no more blurry images. It works in wide and telephoto photography, and for movies, including 4K.&lt

The amazing Post Focus feature lets you review an image and select the area you’d like to be pin sharp simply by touching it, even after you’ve taken the photo. With Focus Stacking, you can select numerous focus points in the same picture. And multiple Autofocus modes allow for a huge number of creative options.&lt
A 16-megapixel Digital Live MOS Sensor with low pass filter captures your subject with stunning clarity, so your images are finessed with fine detail, wherever and whatever you are shooting.&lt

At 4 times the resolution of Full HD, the G80 captures the moving image in breathtaking 4K detail. A resolution of 3840 x 2160 ensures you get every twist and turn of the action, and future-proofs your work as 4K becomes standard.&lt
Boasting 2360k-dot high resolution, the G80’s OLED live viewfinder with 0.74x (35mm camera equivalent) magnification allows you to frame the perfect shot and capture everything.&lt
A 1040k dot 3” touch screen is fully adjustable so it’s easy to monitor your work and shoot from all angles.&lt
Wi-Fi allows for wireless connection to your smart device for quick, easy and seamless sharing of your imaging data.&lt

Built to withstand tough assignments in all environments, the G80’s compact and user-friendly design is housed in a splash and dust-proof body so it can be at your side through all your photo adventures.&lt

One of the biggest advantages of this camera is the sheer shooting flexibility on offer. You can use additional lenses to take wide-angle, telephoto, or close-up shots to suit just about any situation. The shorter the focal length (measured in mm), the wider the view will be &amp

157,johnlewis-151da854c83a14311db3f6915a4522aa,Sony Alpha 7 II Compact System Camera With HD 1080p, 24.3MP, Wi-Fi, NFC, OLED EVF, 5-Axis Image Stabiliser &amp
column9: Sony’s photographic masterclass gives mighty 24.3MP quality and a super-sharp OLED viewfinder. Building upon the Alpha 7’s fine design, this Alpha 7 II has a 5-axis image stabiliser and a reworked shape to make this powerhouse easier on the hand. When you combine that with returning features like the Fast Hybrid Autofocus and 3 inch tiltable LCD screen, you have the perfect compact system to catch any scene.&lt

With a 24.3MP 35mm full-frame Exmor CMOS sensor, you can really express your creativity. Shoot beautiful defocus effects, capture highly-realistic detail, even in low-light, and wow friends. Ensure every shade and tone comes to life with a wide sensitivity range of ISO 100 to 25600.&lt

column3: Super-Stable Work Never let camera blur ruin a shot again with the sophisticated 5-axis image stabiliser. Clamping down on five types of camera shake, you’ll snap from a distance, close-up or at night with absolute confidence. This feature works in both photo and video modes so whatever you make will have captivating clarity.&lt

column13: It’s the finer details that really make a difference in photography. The advanced, high-speed BIONZ X image processing engine ensures that every aspect of the scene is faithfully reproduced even when you’re shooting with deep focus and a high pixel count.&lt

Sony has made the design more ergonomic and intuitive. The front-facing grip makes it a doddle to hold, while the repositioned shutter button gives it’s a sleeker edge. Other interface changes like the slimmer front-and-rear dials, two customisable buttons on the top plate and dedicated dial to adjust exposure, ensure absolute convenience. The robust build also has dust and moisture resistant seals, so you’re ready for any assignment.&lt

column4: The world is your canvas with Canon’s potent and professional PowerShot G5 X. With a bunch of DSLR-grade features packed into its small frame, this Wi-Fi-enabled camera delivers stunning images, Full HD videos and mind-boggling versatility. Whether you’re a keen traveller or just a budding snapper, this easy-to-use piece will bring pathos to your photography and let you flex your creativity.&lt

column1: With its 1.0 type CMOS sensor and mighty DIGIC 6 processor, the G5 X ensures a professional performance in all settings. The 12,800 ISO level gives staggering results in low-light scenes, so you won’t have to worry about shooting outside at night. You’ll capture each moment rapidly with the 5.9fps shooting speed and accurately with the 0.12 second autofocus. Its smart Optical Image Stabiliser steadies shots for crisp and clear results in any setting, and the Electronic View Finder gives responsive, DSLR-like handling.&lt

Its f/1.8-2.8 wide-angle lens delivers expert subject sharpness, depth of field control, and the opportunity for enchanting bokeh shots. It features a 4.2x Optical Zoom to give you a greater grasp of your scene, and, beside the 4x Digital Zoom, you can use Canon’s 8.4x ZoomPlus to double depth without the graininess.&lt

Once you’ve snapped to your heart’s content, you can link this G5 X with your smartphone or tablet with just one tap. The Dynamic NFC and Wi-Fi will let you share your photos and videos instantly, shoot remotely using the Canon Camera Connect app and back-up your images with cloud services like Flickr, Google Drive and irista.&lt
The 3-inch LCD display features intuitive touch interface and a 5-point brightness adjustor. It also swivels so you can shoot from otherwise hard-to-reach angles and discover new ways to snap.&lt

Make your photography bespoke with the powerful Lens Control Ring and extensive range of dials and modes. Craft spectacular stellar shots with the Enhanced Star Mode, shoot eye-popping pictures with the High Dynamic Range setting and give a premium artistic touch with the myriad of in-camera effects.&lt

Tap in to your inner Kubrick with the high-grade film-making options. Not only can you film in Full HD 60p, you have control over the aperture, shutter speed and ISO with the Manual setting so you can dictate the tenor of your clip. With the high 35 Mbit/sec bitrate, you’ll enjoy smooth tonal gradations and crisp detail. You can even shoot as you run with the 5 Axis Advanced Dynamic IS, which steadies shake for remarkably composed movie footage.&lt

With its low weight of 377g and compact size, you’ll have no problem carrying this camera around or holding it up for a long time. Its versatile USB port lets you easily charge with a standard smartphone charger or via your PC while working or surfing the internet.&lt

column9: With the RX10 II, beautiful super slow motion videos aren&#x27
column10: t a problem. Shoot as fast as 240 frames per second at near Full HD quality, or 1000fps at a lower resolution. Plus, with an adjustable shutter speed as fast as 1/32000 second and up to 14fps continuous shooting speed, you&#x27
column11: ll always e able to catch the action.&lt

column9: The 20.2MP 1.0 type back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS delivers outstanding picture quality thanks to its stacked structure with memory attached and Anti-Distortion Shutter. The stacked structure with integrated memory allows for faster recording and reading of huge image data. The high speed readout, in turn, greatly reduces image distortion that can be caused by rolling shutters.&lt

Pin-sharp clarity or beautiful bokeh – the RX10 has it covered. A Carl Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T lens with a constant max f/2.8 aperture and 24–200mm zoom range ensures natural-looking results in every shot. T coating reduces ghosting and flare, so you get the exact picture you want.&lt

With high precision 4K recording, the RX10 II can really take your breath away. Shoot beautiful footage with high-bit-rate recording, and full pixel readout without pixel binning for high-resolution results.&lt

With Fast Intelligent Auto Focus, the RX10 II uses contrast detection to focus at speeds of up to 0.09 seconds, making it easier for you to pic up the camera, press the shutter and get the shot you want.&lt

column26: The Canon EOS 7D Mark II digital SLR camera is designed to meet the demands of photographers and videographers who want a camera that can provide a wide range of artistic opportunities. With a winning combination of cutting-edge operations and a robust, ergonomic design, it is optimized to make even the most challenging photography simple and easy. The EOS 7D Mark II features a refined APS-C sized 20.2 Megapixel CMOS sensor with Dual DIGIC 6 Image Processors for gorgeous imagery. It shoots up to 10 frames per second at ISOs ranging from 100–16000 (expandable to H1: 25600, H2: 51200), has a 65-point all cross-type AF system and features Canon&#x27
column27: s amazing Dual Pixel CMOS AF for brilliant Live-View AF. It has dual card slots for both CF and SD cards, USB 3.0 connectivity and even has built-in GPS for easy location tagging, automatically. Compatible with an ever-expanding collection of EF and EF-S lenses plus a host of EOS accessories, the EOS 7D Mark II is an ideal tool for creative and ambitious photography.&lt

column9: The EOS 7D Mark II has a newly designed 20.2 Megapixel sensor that delivers high-resolution image files with stunning detail and impressive clarity. Optimized for low-light shooting, the EOS 7D Mark II&#x27
column10: s sensor captures images at up to ISO 16000 (expandable to H1: 25600, H2: 51200) with remarkably low noise, thanks to its improved, higher sensitivity design. Phenomenal for stills, the EOS 7D Mark II&#x27
column11: s sensor is equally up to the task for movies, delivering Full HD capture even at rates of up to 60p.&lt

column9: With a new, rugged shutter designed for 200,000 cycles, the EOS 7D Mark II can shoot up to 10 frames per second to capture all the action. With super quick AF and exposure systems complementing the shutter&#x27
column10: s 55 msec shutter release time lag, the EOS 7D Mark II is tailored to meet and even exceed the speed of the action. Refined mechanics like a newly designed, more efficient shutter-drive motor and a vibration dampened mirror drive mean impressive performance for high caliber image quality, fast.&lt

column9: An EOS first, the EOS 7D Mark II features 65 all cross-type AF points for high precision AF at remarkable speed. Cross-type AF points ensure stable AF that is not influenced by the subject&#x27
column10: s shape or color. On theEOS 7D Mark II, the AF points are spread over a wide area of the frame, enabling faster AF, wherever the subject lies. With a central dual cross-type AF point of f/2.8, AF is enhanced with lenses faster than f/2.8. And thanks to this new system, AF is possible even in dim lighting as low as EV-3 (center point only).&lt

column9: While offering performance improvements across the board for still photography, the EOS 7D Mark II is also an incredibly capable HD movie camera. Taking advantage of its Dual Pixel CMOS AF capabilities, the EOS 7D Mark II has customizable Movie Servo AF options: not only can AF location be defined, AF speed and tracking intervals can be specified too, for fluid, smooth focus transitions. The EOS 7D Mark IIdelivers refined and detailed image quality with Full HD 60p recording at ISO values up to 16000, has an HDMI output and records to both SD and CF cards for versatility and security during important shoots.&lt

column10: s Intelligent Viewfinder II makes it easy to both shoot, change and confirm camera settings and shooting modes all without looking away from the viewfinder. Displaying approximately 100% of the composition, the viewfinder can show settings like shooting mode, exposure level, white balance, drive mode, AF operation, metering mode, recording format, even an electronic level and more. All of this information can be displayed by or superimposed easily over the image for review while shooting, and multiple views are customizable through the EOS 7D Mark II&#x27

column9: Ideal for travel or nature photography, the EOS 7D Mark II&#x27
column10: s built-in GPS can record longitude, latitude and altitude data as EXIF data, can track movement at set intervals with its logging function, and can even set the camera&#x27
column11: s internal clock to local time! When using the logger function on a computer, you will see the exact route you travelled, and the map will show you where and when you took each image.&lt

column1: Simultaneously photo capture while shooting a Full HD movie. Shoot stills with 16.1 million effective pixels and enjoy high-speed burst shooting to capture fast-moving subjects in a sequence so you never miss a moment.&lt

The E-M10 Mark II supports full high-definition (1920 x 1080) pixels for more beautiful movies. Its compact design facilitates hand-held recording, and it also solves the problem of large sized video files with the innovative CLIPS feature. This means that you can shoot short clips, edit them into a single portable video and share at leisure.&lt

Delivering one of the most refined forms of image stabilization is the Olympus 5-axis Image Stabilization. This neutralises camera movement by producing razor sharp images, flawless hand-held low light shots and super smooth video.

Holding the first OLED viewfinder in the OM-D family, this Olympus camera offers up ease of use. The OM-D E-M10 Mark II’s OLED electronic viewfinder allows you to see any changes to the camera settings, such as the new AF targeting pad. With this you can keep your eye on the viewfinder as you trace your thumb on the rear touchscreen to adjust focus points.&lt
The intuitive 3-inch tilting touchscreen can release the camera’s shutter with just a ‘tap’. It can even let you alter settings and add creative effects while you’re recording.&lt

Built-in Wi-Fi enables you to share your work with friends and family, instantly. It also means that you can take wireless control of your photography. Adjust aperture, shutter speed, shooting modes, release the shutter, set the self timer and more from your Smartphone, all with live framing. With the M.ZUIKO Digital 14-42mm lens, even zoom level ins controllable. When you’re done, backup, share and geotag with ease.&lt

Encasing all the components to take a quality image is a sturdy metal body, wrapped up in refined leather. Metal dials with classic design elements set the OM-D E-M10 Mark II apart from the rest. While controls and other features such as a prominent thumb pad, have been carefully considered so you can operate the camera without taking your eye of the subject.&lt

Experiment with one of 14 Art Filters including Grainy Film and Partial Colour, or use Photo Story to combine multiple images using one of five layouts. Apply the effects before you shoot with Live View or to a finished image.&lt
