column3: With the Olympus OM-D E-M5 Mark II, you’ll be able to shoot high-quality images without blur thanks to the most advanced image stabilisation technology and a high-speed image processor and sensor. Autofocus and Manual Focus options allow you shoot anything from beautiful portraits to extreme sports. And to top it all off, you can then share your captured moments instantly on social networking sites.&lt

column1: Olympus has raised its game with image stabilisation technology in the E-M5 Mark II, and you’ll be able to shoot images with an industry-leading five-axis IS. This means that no matter how you move the camera, you’ll get total compensation to leave you with sharp, clear results every time. Because the IS system in included in the body, it will work with any lens.&lt

A combination of a high-speed 16-megapixel Live MOS sensor and a TruePic VII image processor gives this camera its excellent imaging performance. And to heighten your experience even further, you can turn to the new 40-megapixel High Res Shot which is ideal for landscapes and studio shots
column2: a maximum shutter speed of 1/8000 sec
column4: and an electronic shutter which makes shooting totally silent.&lt

column1: Capture new perspectives with the 360° Vari-angle LCD which can be flipped to any angle so you can get creative with your shots. You can even control the microphone and time code on the LCD or use the digital level with ease too.&lt

With its compact size and 5-axis image stabilisation, this is an ideal camera for recording hand-held video. High bit rate recording, variable frame rate and focus peaking during filming all help you to record professional-quality videos.&lt

The E-M5 Mark II boasts built-in Wi-Fi which allows you to adjust aperture, shutter speeds and other settings without ever touching the camera. What’s more, with OLYMPUS Image Share on your Smartphone, you can then instantly share your photos on social networking sites.&lt

The E-M5 Mark II’s body is constructed from durable metal so it is completely sealed for protection against dust and moisture. Ergonomic and easy to shoot with all day, the camera features diamond textured dual control dials, and direct function buttons to let you make quick changes to settings when you need to.&lt

The Olympus M.ZUIKO DIGITAL 14-42mm is an ultra compact electronic pancake zoom lens which lets you shoot stills and record actions. With the outcome of stunning crisp edge-to-edge image quality, the lens allows you to shoot still images quickly and smoothly and perform constant zooming when shooting movies. What’s more, the M.ZUIKO DIGITAL 14-42mm lens has a broad focal length range which is equivalent to a 28mm wide angle, right through to an 84mm telephoto in 35mm film terms. And you can even zoom in and out with your Smartphone, thanks to the electronic zoom mechanism.&lt

column43: The Nikon D7200 is ready for your next challenge. With an image quality which is second to none, low-light capabilities and the speed of a Nikon DSLR, the D7200 goes beyond the extremes. Coupled with the convenience of built-in Wi-Fi and Near Field Communication (NFC), the DSLR is the first of its kind to offer shoot and share capabilities for your 24.2 megapixel photos and Full HD videos.&lt
column53: The D7200 is free of an optical low-pass filter so it produces remarkably pure, sharp photos and videos. Its 24.2 MP DX-format CMOS image sensor works together with EXPEED 4 image processing and NIKKOR lenses to enhance detail and tonality. The picturesque image quality is maintained all the way up to ISO 25, 600 for amazing low-light images. You can now also expand the ISO range up to BW1 (51, 200) and BW2 (102,400) to shoot monochromatic photos, even in challenging light situations. Whether you are shooting stills or videos, selecting the 1.3x crop mode extends the reach of NIKKOR DX and FX-format lenses so you get more involved with all the action, sports, wildlife and more.&lt
column63: Connect your DSLR to your Smartphone wirelessly with Nikon snapbridge. Quickly and easily share by email, texting or posting online, wherever you are &amp

It features a 20.2MP Exmor R CMOS sensor and class-leading Carl Zeiss Vario-Sonnar T lens with f/2.8 aperture and 24-200mm range. Combined with optical image stabilisation images stay crisp and with the accessory shoe, adding new gear and expanding your shooting options is easy.&lt

column34: Get the shot you want, even in low light with the Sony α7S interchangeable lens camera. The Alpha 7S packs an incredibly sensitive full-frame sensor, allowing for the ISO to be set at up to 409600 while capturing very little noise, so that a lack of light will no longer limit your vision.&lt

column1: The Alpha 7S uses an ultra sensitive 12.2 megapixel 35mm Exmor CMOS sensor to deliver ultra-wide dynamic range for brilliant stills and movies. Combined with the BIONZ X image processing engine, the α7S will faithfully reproduce textures and details in real time, ensuring that your shots are clear and full of detail.&lt
With a phenomenal ISO range from 50 to 409600, the α7S will help you capture the shot you desire, even in deep darkness. The Alpha 7S is perfect for capturing night shots with low noise.&lt

The Alpha 7S packs cutting edge technology into a small, lightweight body. Made from magnesium alloy, the body on the Alpha 7S provides comprehensive dust and moisture resistance combined with unparalleled mobility so you can comfortably take it wherever you go.&lt

Record your movies in high definition and high bitrate with the XAVC S format. Built on the XAVC format used by professional movie makers and broadcasters, XAVC S captures excellent quality while employing intelligent data compression to ensure consumer-friendly editing and file sizes. The Exmor CMOS sensor will help you capture video, even in low light thanks to a full pixel readout. Support for 120fps at HD resolution can help you create stunning slow motion movies when played back at 24p.&lt
Thanks to its supreme sensitivity and an advanced Spatial Detection algorithm, the Alpha 7S can deliver ultra-high autofocus speed and precision, even in low light.&lt

Instantly transfer your photos and movies to your Android smartphone or tablet, with NFC connectivity making it as easy as tapping the two devices together. Download additional functionality with PlayMemories Camera apps like Smart Remote Control (control the shutter release on your smartphone) or Direct Upload to share your work on social networks.&lt
Frame your shots like a pro, thanks to the high contrast, high resolution XGA OLED Tru-Finder and even monitor peaking a bokeh in the viewfinder.&lt
